original: RV_09.001.01.1{16} svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā pavasva soma dhārayā
analyzed: svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā pavasva soma dhārayā

original: RV_09.001.01.2{16} indrāya pātave sutaḥ
analyzed: indrāya pātave sutaḥ

original: RV_09.001.02.1{16} rakṣohā viśvacarṣanirabhi yonimayohatam
analyzed: rakṣaḥ hā viśvacarṣaniḥ abhi yonim ayaḥ hatam

original: RV_09.001.02.2{16} druṇā sadhasthamāsadat
analyzed: druṇā sadhastham āsadat

original: RV_09.001.03.1{16} varivodhātamo bhava maṃhiṣṭho vṛtrahantamaḥ
analyzed: varivaḥ dhātamaḥ bhava maṃhiṣṭhaḥ vṛtra hantamaḥ

original: RV_09.001.03.2{16} parṣi rādhomaghonām
analyzed: parṣi rādhaḥ maghonām

original: RV_09.001.04.1{16} abhyarṣa mahānāṃ devānāṃ vītimandhasā
analyzed: abhyarṣa mahānām devānām vītim andhasā

original: RV_09.001.04.2{16} abhi vājamuta śravaḥ
analyzed: abhi vājam uta śravaḥ

original: RV_09.001.05.1{16} tvāmachā carāmasi tadidarthaṃ dive-dive
analyzed: tvām achā carāmasi tat id artham dive dive

original: RV_09.001.05.2{16} indo tve na āśasaḥ
analyzed: indo tve naḥ āśasaḥ

original: RV_09.001.06.1{17} punāti te parisrutaṃ somaṃ sūryasya duhitā
analyzed: punāti te parisrutam somam sūryasya duhitā

original: RV_09.001.06.2{17} vāreṇa śaśvatā tanā
analyzed: vāreṇa śaśvatā tanā

original: RV_09.001.07.1{17} tamīmaṇvīḥ samarya ā gṛbhṇanti yoṣaṇo daśa
analyzed: tamīmaṇvīḥ samarye ā gṛbhṇanti yoṣaṇaḥ daśa

original: RV_09.001.07.2{17} svasāraḥ pārye divi
analyzed: svasāraḥ pārye divi

original: RV_09.001.08.1{17} tamīṃ hinvantyagruvo dhamanti bākuraṃ dṛtim
analyzed: tamīm hinvanti agruvaḥ dhamanti bākuram dṛtim

original: RV_09.001.08.2{17} tridhātu vāraṇaṃ madhu
analyzed: tri dhātu vāraṇam madhu

original: RV_09.001.09.1{17} abhīmamaghnyā uta śrīṇanti dhenavaḥ śiśum
analyzed: abhi imam aghnyāḥ uta śrīṇanti dhenavaḥ śiśum

original: RV_09.001.09.2{17} somamindrāya pātave
analyzed: somam indrāya pātave

original: RV_09.001.10.1{17} asyedindro madeṣvā viśvā vṛtrāṇi jighnate
analyzed: asya id indraḥ madeṣvā viśvā vṛtrāṇi jighnate

original: RV_09.001.10.2{17} śūro maghā ca maṃhate
analyzed: śūraḥ maghā ca maṃhate

original: RV_09.002.01.1{18} pavasva devavīrati pavitraṃ soma raṃhyā
analyzed: pavasva deva vīrati pavitram soma raṃhyā

original: RV_09.002.01.2{18} indramindo vṛṣā viśa
analyzed: indram indo vṛṣā viśa

original: RV_09.002.02.1{18} ā vacyasva mahi psaro vṛṣendo dyumnavattamaḥ
analyzed: ā vacyasva mahi psaraḥ vṛṣā indo dyumnavattamaḥ

original: RV_09.002.02.2{18} ā yoniṃ dharṇasiḥ sadaḥ
analyzed: ā yonim dharṇasiḥ sadaḥ

original: RV_09.002.03.1{18} adhukṣata priyaṃ madhu dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ
analyzed: adhukṣata priyam madhu dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ

original: RV_09.002.03.2{18} apo vasiṣṭa sukratuḥ
analyzed: apaḥ vasiṣṭa sukratuḥ

original: RV_09.002.04.1{18} mahāntaṃ tvā mahīranvāpo arṣanti sindhavaḥ
analyzed: mahāntam tvā mahīḥ anu apaḥ arṣanti sindhavaḥ

original: RV_09.002.04.2{18} yad gobhirvāsayiṣyase
analyzed: yat gobhiḥ vāsayiṣyase

original: RV_09.002.05.1{18} samudro apsu māmṛje viṣṭambho dharuṇo divaḥ
analyzed: samudraḥ apsu māmṛje viṣṭambhaḥ dharuṇaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_09.002.05.2{18} somaḥ pavitre asmayuḥ
analyzed: somaḥ pavitre asmayuḥ

original: RV_09.002.06.1{19} acikradad vṛṣā harirmahān mitro na darśataḥ
analyzed: acikradat vṛṣā hariḥ mahān mitraḥ na darśataḥ

original: RV_09.002.06.2{19} saṃ sūryeṇa rocate
analyzed: sam sūryeṇa rocate

original: RV_09.002.07.1{19} girasta inda ojasā marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ
analyzed: girastaḥ indo ojasā marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ

original: RV_09.002.07.2{19} yābhirmadāya śumbhase
analyzed: yābhiḥ madāya śumbhase

original: RV_09.002.08.1{19} taṃ tvā madāya ghṛṣvaya u lokakṛtnumīmahe
analyzed: tam tvā madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ u loka kṛtnum īmahe

original: RV_09.002.08.2{19} tava praśastayo mahīḥ
analyzed: tava praśastayaḥ mahīḥ

original: RV_09.002.09.1{19} asmabhyamindavindrayurmadhvaḥ pavasva dhārayā
analyzed: asmabhyam indo indrayuḥ madhvaḥ pavasva dhārayā

original: RV_09.002.09.2{19} parjanyo vṛṣṭimāniva
analyzed: parjanyaḥ vṛṣṭimān iva

original: RV_09.002.10.1{19} goṣā indo nṛṣā asyaśvasā vājasā uta
analyzed: go sāḥ indo nṛ sāḥ asi aśva sāḥ vāja sāḥ uta

original: RV_09.002.10.2{19} ātmā yajñasya pūrvyaḥ
analyzed: ātmā yajñasya pūrvyaḥ

original: RV_09.003.01.1{20} eṣa devo amartyaḥ parṇavīriva dīyati
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ amartyaḥ parṇa vīḥ iva dīyati

original: RV_09.003.01.2{20} abhi droṇānyāsadam
analyzed: abhi droṇāni āsadam

original: RV_09.003.02.1{20} eṣa devo vipā kṛto 'ti hvarāṃsi dhāvati
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ vipā kṛtaḥ ti hvarāṃsi dhāvati

original: RV_09.003.02.2{20} pavamāno adābhyaḥ
analyzed: pavamānaḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_09.003.03.1{20} eṣa devo vipanyubhiḥ pavamāna ṛtāyubhiḥ
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ vipanyubhiḥ pavamānaḥ ṛtāyubhiḥ

original: RV_09.003.03.2{20} harirvājāya mṛjyate
analyzed: hariḥ vājāya mṛjyate

original: RV_09.003.04.1{20} eṣa viśvāni vāryā śūro yanniva satvabhiḥ
analyzed: eṣa viśvāni vāryā śūraḥ yan iva satvabhiḥ

original: RV_09.003.04.2{20} pavamānaḥsiṣāsati
analyzed: pavamānaḥ siṣāsati

original: RV_09.003.05.1{20} eṣa devo ratharyati pavamāno daśasyati
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ ratharyati pavamānaḥ daśasyati

original: RV_09.003.05.2{20} āviṣ kṛṇoti vagvanum
analyzed: āvis kṛṇoti vagvanum

original: RV_09.003.06.1{21} eṣa viprairabhiṣṭuto 'po devo vi gāhate
analyzed: eṣa vipraiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ devaḥ vi gāhate

original: RV_09.003.06.2{21} dadhad ratnānidāśuṣe
analyzed: dadhat ratnānidāśuṣe

original: RV_09.003.07.1{21} eṣa divaṃ vi dhāvati tiro rajāṃsi dhārayā
analyzed: eṣa divam vi dhāvati tiras rajāṃsi dhārayā

original: RV_09.003.07.2{21} pavamānaḥkanikradat
analyzed: pavamānaḥ kanikradat

original: RV_09.003.08.1{21} eṣa divaṃ vyāsarat tiro rajāṇsyaspṛtaḥ
analyzed: eṣa divam vyāsarat tiras rajāṇsya spṛtaḥ

original: RV_09.003.08.2{21} pavamānaḥ svadhvaraḥ
analyzed: pavamānaḥ su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_09.003.09.1{21} eṣa pratnena janmanā devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: eṣa pratnena janmanā devaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_09.003.09.2{21} hariḥ pavitrearṣati
analyzed: hariḥ pavitre ṛṣati

original: RV_09.003.10.1{21} eṣa u sya puruvrato jajñāno janayanniṣaḥ
analyzed: eṣaḥ u sya puru vrataḥ jajñānaḥ janayan iṣaḥ

original: RV_09.003.10.2{21} dhārayā pavate sutaḥ
analyzed: dhārayā pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_09.004.01.1{22} sanā ca soma jeṣi ca pavamāna mahi śravaḥ
analyzed: sana ca soma jeṣi ca pavamāna mahi śravaḥ

original: RV_09.004.01.2{22} athā no vasyasas kṛdhi
analyzed: athā naḥ vasyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_09.004.02.1{22} sanā jyotiḥ sanā svarviśvā ca soma saubhagā
analyzed: sana jyotiḥ sana svar viśvā ca soma saubhagā
athā

original: RV_09.004.03.1{22} sanā dakṣamuta kratumapa soma mṛdho jahi
analyzed: sana dakṣam uta kratum apa soma mṛdhaḥ jahi
athā

original: RV_09.004.04.1{22} pavītāraḥ punītana somamindrāya pātave
analyzed: pavītāraḥ punītana somam indrāya pātave
athā

original: RV_09.004.05.1{22} tvaṃ sūrye na ā bhaja tava kratvā tavotibhiḥ
analyzed: tvam sūrye naḥ ā bhaja tava kratvā tava ūtibhiḥ
athā

original: RV_09.004.06.1{23} tava kratvā tavotibhirjyok paśyema sūryam
analyzed: tava kratvā tava ūtibhiḥ jyok paśyema sūryam
athā

original: RV_09.004.07.1{23} abhyarṣa svāyudha soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim
analyzed: abhyarṣa su āyudha soma dvibarhasam rayim
athā

original: RV_09.004.08.1{23} abhyarṣānapacyuto rayiṃ samatsu sāsahiḥ
analyzed: abhyarṣa an apacyutaḥ rayim samatsu sāsahiḥ
athā

original: RV_09.004.09.1{23} tvāṃ yajñairavīvṛdhan pavamāna vidharmaṇi
analyzed: tvām yajñaiḥ avīvṛdhan pavamāna vidharmaṇi
athā

original: RV_09.004.10.1{23} rayiṃ naścitramaśvinamindo viśvāyamā bhara
analyzed: rayim naḥ citram aśvinam indo viśvāyamā bhara
athā

original: RV_09.005.01.1{24} samiddho viśvatas patiḥ pavamāno vi rājati
analyzed: samiddhaḥ viśvatas patiḥ pavamānaḥ vi rājati

original: RV_09.005.01.2{24} prīṇan vṛṣā kanikradat
analyzed: prīṇan vṛṣā kanikradat

original: RV_09.005.02.1{24} tanūnapāt pavamānaḥ śṛṅge śiśāno arṣati
analyzed: tanūnapāt pavamānaḥ śṛṅge śiśānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_09.005.02.2{24} antarikṣeṇa rārajat
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa rārajat

original: RV_09.005.03.1{24} īḷenyaḥ pavamāno rayirvi rājati dyumān
analyzed: īḍenyaḥ pavamānaḥ rayiḥ vi rājati dyumān

original: RV_09.005.03.2{24} madhordhārābhirojasā
analyzed: madhoḥ dhārābhiḥ ojasā

analyzed: barhiḥ prācīnam ojasā pavamāna stṛṇan hariḥ

original: RV_09.005.04.2{24} deveṣu deva īyate
analyzed: deveṣu devaḥ īyate

original: RV_09.005.05.1{24} udātairjihate bṛhad dvāro devīrhiraṇyayīḥ
analyzed: udātaiḥ jihate bṛhat dvāraḥ devīḥ hiraṇyayīḥ

original: RV_09.005.05.2{24} pavamānena suṣṭutāḥ
analyzed: pavamānena suṣṭutāḥ

original: RV_09.005.06.1{25} suśilpe bṛhatī mahī pavamāno vṛṣaṇyati
analyzed: su śilpe bṛhatī mahī pavamānaḥ vṛṣaṇyati

original: RV_09.005.06.2{25} naktoṣāsā nadarśate
analyzed: nakta uṣāsā na darśate

original: RV_09.005.07.1{25} ubhā devā nṛcakṣasā hotārā daivyā huve

original: RV_09.005.07.2{25} pavamāna indrovṛṣā
analyzed: pavamānaḥ indraḥ vṛṣā

original: RV_09.005.08.1{25} bhāratī pavamānasya sarasvatīḷā mahī
analyzed: bhāratī pavamānasya sarasvatī iḍā mahī

original: RV_09.005.08.2{25} imaṃ no yajñamā gaman tisro devīḥ supeśasaḥ
analyzed: imam naḥ yajñam ā gaman tisraḥ devīḥ supeśasaḥ

original: RV_09.005.09.1{25} tvaṣṭāramagrajāṃ gopāṃ puroyāvānamā huve
analyzed: tvaṣṭāram agra jām gopām puras yāvānam ā huve

original: RV_09.005.09.2{25} indurindro vṛṣā hariḥ pavamānaḥ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: induḥ indraḥ vṛṣā hariḥ pavamānaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: RV_09.005.10.1{25} vanaspatiṃ pavamāna madhvā samaṅgdhi dhārayā
analyzed: vanaspatim pavamāna madhvā samaṅgdhi dhārayā

original: RV_09.005.10.2{25} sahasravalśaṃ haritaṃ bhrājamānaṃ hiraṇyayam
analyzed: sahasra valśam haritam bhrājamānam hiraṇyayam

original: RV_09.005.11.1{25} viśve devāḥ svāhākṛtiṃ pavamānasyā gata
analyzed: viśve devāḥ svāhākṛtim pavamānasya ā gata

original: RV_09.005.11.2{25} vāyurbṛhaspatiḥ sūryo 'gnirindraḥ sajoṣasaḥ
analyzed: vāyuḥ bṛhaspatiḥ sūryaḥ gniḥ indraḥ sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_09.006.01.1{26} mandrayā soma dhārayā vṛṣā pavasva devayuḥ
analyzed: mandrayā soma dhārayā vṛṣā pavasva devayuḥ

original: RV_09.006.01.2{26} avyo vāreṣvasmayuḥ
analyzed: avyaḥ vāreṣu asmayuḥ

original: RV_09.006.02.1{26} abhi tyaṃ madyaṃ madamindavindra iti kṣara
analyzed: abhi tyam madyam madam indo indraḥ iti kṣara

original: RV_09.006.02.2{26} abhi vājinoarvataḥ
analyzed: abhi vājinā arvataḥ

original: RV_09.006.03.1{26} abhi tyaṃ pūrvyaṃ madaṃ suvāno arṣa pavitra ā
analyzed: abhi tyam pūrvyam madam suvānaḥ arṣa pavitre ā

original: RV_09.006.03.2{26} abhi vājamuta śravaḥ
analyzed: abhi vājam uta śravaḥ

original: RV_09.006.04.1{26} anu drapsāsa indava āpo na pravatāsaran
analyzed: anu drapsāsaḥ indavaḥ āpaḥ na pravatā asaran

original: RV_09.006.04.2{26} punānā indramāśata
analyzed: punānāḥ indram āśata

original: RV_09.006.05.1{26} yamatyamiva vājinaṃ mṛjanti yoṣaṇo daśa
analyzed: yamatyam iva vājinam mṛjanti yoṣaṇaḥ daśa

original: RV_09.006.05.2{26} vane krīḷantamatyavim
analyzed: vane krīḍantam atyavim

original: RV_09.006.06.1{27} taṃ gobhirvṛṣaṇaṃ rasaṃ madāya devavītaye
analyzed: tam gobhiḥ vṛṣaṇam rasam madāya deva vītaye

original: RV_09.006.06.2{27} sutaṃ bharāya saṃ sṛja
analyzed: sutam bharāya sam sṛja

original: RV_09.006.07.1{27} devo devāya dhārayendrāya pavate sutaḥ
analyzed: devaḥ devāya dhārayā indrāya pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_09.006.07.2{27} payo yadasya pīpayat
analyzed: payaḥ yat asya pīpayat

original: RV_09.006.08.1{27} ātmā yajñasya raṃhyā suṣvāṇaḥ pavate sutaḥ
analyzed: ātmā yajñasya raṃhyā suṣvāṇaḥ pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_09.006.08.2{27} pratnaṃni pāti kāvyam
analyzed: pratnaṃni pāti kāvyam

original: RV_09.006.09.1{27} evā punāna indrayurmadaṃ madiṣṭha vītaye
analyzed: eva punānaḥ indrayuḥ madam madiṣṭha vītaye

original: RV_09.006.09.2{27} guhā cid dadhiṣe giraḥ
analyzed: guhā cit dadhiṣe giraḥ

original: RV_09.007.01.1 asṛgram indavaḥ pathā dharmann ṛtasya suśriyaḥ
analyzed: asṛgram indavaḥ pathā dharman ṛtasya su śriyaḥ

original: RV_09.007.01.2 vidānā asya yojanam
analyzed: vidānāḥ asya yojanam

original: RV_09.007.02.1 pra dhārā madhvo agriyo mahīr apo vi gāhate
analyzed: pra dhārāḥ madhvaḥ agriyaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ vi gāhate

original: RV_09.007.02.2 havir haviṣṣu vandyaḥ
analyzed: haviḥ haviḥṣu vandyaḥ

original: RV_09.007.03.1 pra yujo vāco agriyo vṛṣāva cakradad vane
analyzed: pra yujaḥ vācaḥ agriyaḥ vṛṣā ava cakradat vane

original: RV_09.007.03.2 sadmābhi satyo adhvaraḥ
analyzed: sadma abhi satyaḥ adhvaraḥ

original: RV_09.007.04.1 pari yat kāvyā kavir nṛmṇā vasāno arṣati
analyzed: pari yat kāvyā kaviḥ nṛmṇā vasānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_09.007.04.2 svar vājī siṣāsati
analyzed: svar vājī siṣāsati

original: RV_09.007.05.1 pavamāno abhi spṛdho viśo rājeva sīdati
analyzed: pavamānaḥ abhi spṛdhaḥ viśaḥ rājā iva sīdati

original: RV_09.007.05.2 yad īm ṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ
analyzed: yat īm ṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_09.007.06.1 avyo vāre pari priyo harir vaneṣu sīdati
analyzed: avyaḥ vāre pari priyaḥ hariḥ vaneṣu sīdati

original: RV_09.007.06.2 rebho vanuṣyate matī
analyzed: rebhaḥ vanuṣyate matī

original: RV_09.007.07.1 sa vāyum indram aśvinā sākam madena gachati
analyzed: sa vāyum indram aśvinā sākam madena gacchati

original: RV_09.007.07.2 raṇā yo asya dharmabhiḥ
analyzed: raṇā yaḥ asya dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_09.007.08.1 ā mitrāvaruṇā bhagam madhvaḥ pavanta ūrmayaḥ
analyzed: ā mitrāvaruṇā bhagam madhvaḥ pavante ūrmayaḥ

original: RV_09.007.08.2 vidānā asya śakmabhiḥ
analyzed: vidānāḥ asya śakmabhiḥ

original: RV_09.007.09.1 asmabhyaṃ rodasī rayim madhvo vājasya sātaye
analyzed: asmabhyam rodasī rayim madhvaḥ vājasya sātaye

original: RV_09.007.09.2 śravo vasūni saṃ jitam
analyzed: śravaḥ vasūni sam jitam

original: RV_09.008.01.1 ete somā abhi priyam indrasya kāmam akṣaran
analyzed: ete somāḥ abhi priyam indrasya kāmam akṣaran

original: RV_09.008.01.2 vardhanto asya vīryam
analyzed: vardhantaḥ asya vīryam

original: RV_09.008.02.1 punānāsaś camūṣado gachanto vāyum aśvinā
analyzed: punānāsaḥ camūṣadaḥ gacchantaḥ vāyum aśvinā

original: RV_09.008.02.2 te no dhāntu suvīryam
analyzed: te naḥ dhāntu su vīryam

original: RV_09.008.03.1 indrasya soma rādhase punāno hārdi codaya
analyzed: indrasya soma rādhase punānaḥ hārdi codaya

original: RV_09.008.03.2 ṛtasya yonim āsadam
analyzed: ṛtasya yonim āsadam

original: RV_09.008.04.1 mṛjanti tvā daśa kṣipo hinvanti sapta dhītayaḥ
analyzed: mṛjanti tvā daśa kṣipaḥ hinvanti sapta dhītayaḥ

original: RV_09.008.04.2 anu viprā amādiṣuḥ
analyzed: anu viprāḥ amādiṣuḥ

original: RV_09.008.05.1 devebhyas tvā madāya kaṃ sṛjānam ati meṣyaḥ
analyzed: devebhyaḥ tvā madāya kam sṛjānam ati meṣyaḥ

original: RV_09.008.05.2 saṃ gobhir vāsayāmasi
analyzed: sam gobhiḥ vāsayāmasi

original: RV_09.008.06.1 punānaḥ kalaśeṣv ā vastrāṇy aruṣo hariḥ
analyzed: punānaḥ kalaśeṣu ā vastrāṇi aruṣaḥ hariḥ

original: RV_09.008.06.2 pari gavyāny avyata
analyzed: pari gavyāni avyata

original: RV_09.008.07.1 maghona ā pavasva no jahi viśvā apa dviṣaḥ
analyzed: maghone ā pavasva naḥ jahi viśvāḥ apa dviṣaḥ

original: RV_09.008.07.2 indo sakhāyam ā viśa
analyzed: indo sakhāyam ā viśa

original: RV_09.008.08.1 vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pari srava dyumnam pṛthivyā adhi
analyzed: vṛṣṭim divaḥ pari srava dyumnam pṛthivyāḥ adhi

original: RV_09.008.08.2 saho naḥ soma pṛtsu dhāḥ
analyzed: sahaḥ naḥ soma pṛtsu dhāḥ

original: RV_09.008.09.1 nṛcakṣasaṃ tvā vayam indrapītaṃ svarvidam
analyzed: nṛ cakṣasam tvā vayam indra pītam svar vidam

original: RV_09.008.09.2 bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam
analyzed: bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam

original: RV_09.009.01.1 pari priyā divaḥ kavir vayāṃsi naptyïr hitaḥ
analyzed: pari priyā divaḥ kaviḥ vayāṃsi naptyā hitaḥ

original: RV_09.009.01.2 suvāno yāti kavikratuḥ

original: RV_09.009.02.2 vīty arṣa caniṣṭhayā

original: RV_09.009.03.2 mahān mahī ṛtāvṛdhā

analyzed: sa sapta dhītibhiḥ hitaḥ nadī ajinvat adruhaḥ

analyzed: yāḥ ekam akṣi vāvṛdhuḥ

analyzed: tāḥ abhi santam astṛtam mahe yuvānam ā

original: RV_09.009.05.2 indum indra tava vrate
analyzed: indum indra tava vrate

original: RV_09.009.06.1 abhi vahnir amartyaḥ sapta paśyati vāvahiḥ
analyzed: abhi vahniḥ amartyaḥ sapta paśyati vāvahiḥ

analyzed: kriviḥ devīḥ atarpayat

original: RV_09.009.07.2 tāni punāna jaOghanaḥ
analyzed: tāni punāna jaoghanaḥ

original: RV_09.009.08.1 nū navyase navīyase sūktāya sādhayā pathaḥ
analyzed: nu navyase navīyase sūktāya sādhaya pathaḥ

original: RV_09.009.08.2 pratnavad rocayā rucaḥ
analyzed: pratna vat rocaya rucaḥ

original: RV_09.009.09.2 sanā medhāṃ sanā svaḥ
analyzed: sana medhām sana svar

original: RV_09.010.01.1 pra svānāso rathā ivārvanto na śravasyavaḥ
analyzed: pra svānāsaḥ rathāḥ iva arvantaḥ na śravasyavaḥ

analyzed: hinvānāsaḥ rathāḥ iva dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ

analyzed: bharāsaḥ kāriṇām iva

analyzed: rājānaḥ na praśastibhiḥ somāsaḥ gobhiḥ añjate

original: RV_09.010.03.2 yajño na sapta dhātṛbhiḥ

original: RV_09.010.05.2 sūrā aṇvaṃ vi tanvate

analyzed: apa dvārā matīnām pratnāḥ ṛṇvanti kāravaḥ

original: RV_09.010.06.2 vṛṣṇo harasa āyavaḥ

analyzed: abhi priyā divaḥ padam adhvaryubhiḥ guhā hitam

analyzed: sūraḥ paśyati cakṣasā

analyzed: upa asmai gāyata naraḥ pavamānāya indave

analyzed: abhi te madhunā payaḥ tharvāṇaḥ aśiśrayuḥ

original: RV_09.011.02.2 devaṃ devāya devayu
analyzed: devam devāya devayu

analyzed: sa naḥ pavasva śam gave śam janāya śam arvate

analyzed: śam rājan oṣadhībhyaḥ

analyzed: babhrave nu svatavase ruṇāya divispṛśe

analyzed: somāya gātham arcata

analyzed: hasta cyutebhiḥ adribhiḥ sutam somam punītana

analyzed: madhau ā dhāvata madhu

analyzed: namasā id upa sīdata dadhnā id abhi śrīṇītana

analyzed: indum indre dadhātana

analyzed: amitra hā vicarṣaṇiḥ pavasva soma śam gave

original: RV_09.011.07.2 devebhyo anukāmakṛt
analyzed: devebhyaḥ anukāma kṛt

analyzed: manaścit manasaḥ patiḥ

analyzed: somaḥ yaḥ su kratuḥ kaviḥ

analyzed: pṛṣṭhā gṛbhṇata vājinaḥ

analyzed: gacchan indrasya niṣkṛtam

analyzed: yatra amṛtāsaḥ āsate

analyzed: yadī tuñjanti bhūrṇayaḥ

analyzed: goṣāmaṇveṣu saścima

analyzed: anaptam apsu duṣṭaram somam pavitre ā sṛja

analyzed: punīhi indrāya pātave

analyzed: pra punānasya cetasā somaḥ pavitre arṣati

original: RV_09.016.04.2{06} kratvā sadhasthamāsadat
analyzed: kratvā sadhastham āsadat

analyzed: pra tvā namobhiḥ indavaḥ indra somāḥ asṛkṣata

analyzed: mahe bharāya kāriṇaḥ

original: RV_09.016.06.2{06} śūro na goṣu tiṣṭhati
analyzed: śūraḥ na goṣu tiṣṭhati

original: RV_09.016.07.1{06} divo na sānu pipyuṣī dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ
analyzed: divaḥ na sānu pipyuṣī dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ

original: RV_09.016.07.2{06} vṛthā pavitre arṣati
analyzed: vṛthā pavitre arṣati

original: RV_09.016.08.1{06} tvaṃ soma vipaścitaṃ tanā punāna āyuṣu
analyzed: tvam soma vipaścitam tanā punānaḥ āyuṣu

original: RV_09.016.08.2{06} avyo vāraṃ vi dhāvasi
analyzed: avyaḥ vāram vi dhāvasi

original: RV_09.017.01.1{07} pra nimneneva sindhavo ghnanto vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ
analyzed: pra nimnena iva sindhavaḥ ghnantaḥ vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_09.017.01.2{07} somā asṛgramāśavaḥ
analyzed: somāḥ asṛgram āśavaḥ

original: RV_09.017.02.1{07} abhi suvānāsa indavo vṛṣṭayaḥ pṛthivīmiva
analyzed: abhi suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ vṛṣṭayaḥ pṛthivīm iva

original: RV_09.017.02.2{07} indraṃ somāso akṣaran
analyzed: indram somāsaḥ akṣaran

original: RV_09.017.03.1{07} atyūrmirmatsaro madaḥ somaḥ pavitre arṣati
analyzed: ati ūrmiḥ matsaraḥ madaḥ somaḥ pavitre arṣati

original: RV_09.017.03.2{07} vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ
analyzed: vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ

original: RV_09.017.04.1{07} ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pari ṣicyate
analyzed: ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pari sicyate

original: RV_09.017.04.2{07} ukthairyajñeṣuvardhate
analyzed: ukthaiḥ yajñeṣu vardhate

original: RV_09.017.05.1{07} ati trī soma rocanā rohan na bhrājase divam
analyzed: ati trī soma rocanā rohan na bhrājase divam

original: RV_09.017.05.2{07} iṣṇan sūryaṃ na codayaḥ
analyzed: iṣṇan sūryam na codayaḥ

original: RV_09.017.06.1{07} abhi viprā anūṣata mūrdhan yajñasya kāravaḥ
analyzed: abhi viprāḥ anūṣata mūrdhan yajñasya kāravaḥ

original: RV_09.017.06.2{07} dadhānāścakṣasi priyam
analyzed: dadhānāḥ cakṣasi priyam

original: RV_09.017.07.1{07} tamu tvā vājinaṃ naro dhībhirviprā avasyavaḥ
analyzed: tam u tvā vājinam naraḥ dhībhiḥ viprāḥ avasyavaḥ

original: RV_09.017.07.2{07} mṛjantidevatātaye
analyzed: mṛjantidevatātaye

original: RV_09.017.08.1{07} madhordhārāmanu kṣara tīvraḥ sadhasthamāsadaḥ
analyzed: madhoḥ dhārām anu kṣara tīvraḥ sadhastham āsadaḥ

original: RV_09.017.08.2{07} cārur{ṛ}tāya pītaye
analyzed: cāruḥ ṛtāya pītaye

original: RV_09.018.01.1{08} pari suvāno giriṣṭhāḥ pavitre somo akṣāḥ
analyzed: pari suvānaḥ giriṣṭhāḥ pavitre somaḥ akṣār

original: RV_09.018.01.2{08} madeṣu sarvadhā asi
analyzed: madeṣu sarva dhāḥ asi

original: RV_09.018.02.1{08} tvaṃ viprastvaṃ kavirmadhu pra jātamandhasaḥ
analyzed: tvam vipraḥ tvam kaviḥ madhu pra jātam andhasaḥ
madeṣu

original: RV_09.018.03.1{08} tava viśve sajoṣaso devāsaḥ pītimāśata
analyzed: tava viśve sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ pītim āśata
madeṣu

original: RV_09.018.04.1{08} ā yo viśvāni vāryā vasūni hastayordadhe
analyzed: ā yaḥ viśvāni vāryā vasūni hastayoḥ dadhe
madeṣu

original: RV_09.018.05.1{08} ya ime rodasī mahī saṃ mātareva dohate
analyzed: yaḥ ime rodasī mahī sam mātarā iva dohate
madeṣu

original: RV_09.018.06.1{08} pari yo rodasī ubhe sadyo vājebhirarṣati
analyzed: pari yaḥ rodasī ubhe sadyas vājebhiḥ arṣati
madeṣu

original: RV_09.018.07.1{08} sa śuṣmī kalaśeṣvā punāno acikradat
analyzed: sa śuṣmī kalaśeṣvā punānaḥ acikradat
madeṣu

original: RV_09.019.01.1{09} yat soma citramukthyaṃ divyaṃ pārthivaṃ vasu
analyzed: yat soma citram ukthyam divyam pārthivam vasu

original: RV_09.019.01.2{09} tan naḥ punāna ā bhara
analyzed: tat naḥ punānaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_09.019.02.1{09} yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svarpatī indraśca soma gopatī
analyzed: yuvam hi sthaḥ svarpatī indraḥ ca soma gopatī

original: RV_09.019.02.2{09} īśānāpipyataṃ dhiyaḥ
analyzed: īśānā apipyatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_09.019.03.1{09} vṛṣā punāna āyuṣu stanayannadhi barhiṣi
analyzed: vṛṣā punānaḥ āyuṣu stanayan adhi barhiṣi

original: RV_09.019.03.2{09} hariḥ san yonimāsadat
analyzed: hariḥ san yonim āsadat

original: RV_09.019.04.1{09} avāvaśanta dhītayo vṛṣabhasyādhi retasi
analyzed: avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ vṛṣabhasya adhi retasi

original: RV_09.019.04.2{09} sūnorvatsasyamātaraḥ
analyzed: sūnoḥ vatsasya mātaraḥ

original: RV_09.019.05.1{09} kuvid vṛṣaṇyantībhyaḥ punāno garbhamādadhat
analyzed: kuvid vṛṣaṇyantībhyaḥ punānaḥ garbham ādadhat

original: RV_09.019.05.2{09} yāḥ śukraṃ duhate payaḥ
analyzed: yāḥ śukram duhate payaḥ

original: RV_09.019.06.1{09} upa śikṣāpatasthuṣo bhiyasamā dhehi śatruṣu
analyzed: upa śikṣa apatasthuṣaḥ bhiyasamā dhehi śatruṣu

original: RV_09.019.06.2{09} pavamānavidā rayim
analyzed: pavamāna vidā rayim

original: RV_09.019.07.1{09} ni śatroḥ soma vṛṣṇyaṃ ni śuṣmaṃ ni vayastira
analyzed: ni śatroḥ soma vṛṣṇyam ni śuṣmam ni vayaḥ tira

original: RV_09.019.07.2{09} dūrevā sato anti vā
analyzed: dūrā iva sataḥ anti vā

original: RV_09.020.01.1{10} pra kavirdevavītaye 'vyo vārebhirarṣati
analyzed: pra kaviḥ deva vītaye vyaḥ vārebhiḥ arṣati

original: RV_09.020.01.2{10} sāhvān viśvāabhi spṛdhaḥ
analyzed: sāhvān viśvāḥ abhi spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_09.020.02.1{10} sa hi ṣmā jaritṛbhya ā vājaṃ gomantaminvati
analyzed: sa hi sma jaritṛbhyaḥ ā vājam gomantam invati

original: RV_09.020.02.2{10} pavamānaḥ sahasriṇam
analyzed: pavamānaḥ sahasriṇam

original: RV_09.020.03.1{10} pari viśvāni cetasā mṛśase pavase matī
analyzed: pari viśvāni cetasā mṛśase pavase matī

original: RV_09.020.03.2{10} sa naḥ soma śravo vidaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ soma śravaḥ vidaḥ

original: RV_09.020.04.1{10} abhyarṣa bṛhad yaśo maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ rayim
analyzed: abhyarṣa bṛhat yaśaḥ maghavadbhyaḥ dhruvam rayim

original: RV_09.020.04.2{10} iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
analyzed: iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_09.020.05.1{10} tvaṃ rājeva suvrato giraḥ somā viveśitha
analyzed: tvam rājā iva suvrataḥ giraḥ soma ā viveśitha

original: RV_09.020.05.2{10} punāno vahne adbhuta
analyzed: punānaḥ vahne adbhuta

original: RV_09.020.06.1{10} sa vahnirapsu duṣṭaro mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ
analyzed: sa vahniḥ apsu duṣṭaraḥ mṛjyamānaḥ gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_09.020.06.2{10} somaścamūṣu sīdati
analyzed: somaḥ camūṣu sīdati

original: RV_09.020.07.1{10} krīḷurmakho na maṃhayuḥ pavitraṃ soma gachasi
analyzed: krīḍuḥ makhaḥ na maṃhayuḥ pavitram soma gacchasi

original: RV_09.020.07.2{10} dadhat stotre suvīryam
analyzed: dadhat stotre su vīryam

original: RV_09.021.01.1{11} ete dhāvantīndavaḥ somā indrāya ghṛṣvayaḥ
analyzed: ete dhāvanti indavaḥ somāḥ indrāya ghṛṣvayaḥ

original: RV_09.021.01.2{11} matsarāsaḥsvarvidaḥ
analyzed: matsarāsaḥ svar vidaḥ

original: RV_09.021.02.1{11} pravṛṇvanto abhiyujaḥ suṣvaye varivovidaḥ
analyzed: pravṛṇvantaḥ abhiyujaḥ suṣvaye varivaḥ vidaḥ

original: RV_09.021.02.2{11} svayaṃ stotre vayaskṛtaḥ
analyzed: svayam stotre vayaskṛtaḥ

original: RV_09.021.03.1{11} vṛthā krīḷanta indavaḥ sadhasthamabhyekamit
analyzed: vṛthā krīḍantaḥ indavaḥ sadhastham abhi ekam id

original: RV_09.021.03.2{11} sindhorūrmā vyakṣaran
analyzed: sindhoḥ ūrmāḥ vyakṣaran

original: RV_09.021.04.1{11} ete viśvāni vāryā pavamānāsa āśata
analyzed: ete viśvāni vāryā pavamānāsaḥ āśata

original: RV_09.021.04.2{11} hitā na saptayo rathe
analyzed: hitāḥ na saptayaḥ rathe

original: RV_09.021.05.1{11} āsmin piśaṅgamindavo dadhātā venamādiśe
analyzed: ā asmin piśaṅgam indavaḥ dadhāta venam ādiśe

original: RV_09.021.05.2{11} yo asmabhyamarāvā
analyzed: yaḥ asmabhyam arāvā

original: RV_09.021.06.1{11} ṛbhurna rathyaṃ navaṃ dadhātā ketamādiśe
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ na rathyam navam dadhātā ketam ādiśe

original: RV_09.021.06.2{11} śukrāḥ pavadhvamarṇasā
analyzed: śukrāḥ pavadhvam arṇasā

original: RV_09.021.07.1{11} eta u tye avīvaśan kāṣṭhāṃ vājino akrata
analyzed: ete u tye avīvaśan kāṣṭhām vājinaḥ akrata

original: RV_09.021.07.2{11} sataḥ prāsāviṣurmatim
analyzed: sataḥ prāsāviṣuḥ matim

analyzed: ete somāsaḥ āśavaḥ rathāḥ iva pra vājinaḥ

original: RV_09.022.01.2{12} sargāḥ sṛṣṭā aheṣata
analyzed: sargāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ aheṣata

original: RV_09.022.02.1{12} ete vātā ivoravaḥ parjanyasyeva vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: ete vātāḥ iva uravaḥ parjanyasya iva vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_09.022.02.2{12} agneriva bhramā vṛthā
analyzed: agneḥ iva bhramāḥ vṛthā

original: RV_09.022.03.1{12} ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ
analyzed: ete pūtāḥ vipaścitaḥ somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_09.022.03.2{12} vipā vyānaśurdhiyaḥ
analyzed: vipā vyānaśuḥ dhiyaḥ

analyzed: ete mṛṣṭāḥ amartyāḥ sasṛvāṃsaḥ na śaśramuḥ

original: RV_09.022.04.2{12} iyakṣantaḥ patho rajaḥ
analyzed: iyakṣantaḥ pathaḥ rajaḥ

original: RV_09.022.05.1{12} ete pṛṣṭhāni rodasorviprayanto vyānaśuḥ
analyzed: ete pṛṣṭhāni rodasoḥ viprayantaḥ vyānaśuḥ

original: RV_09.022.05.2{12} utedamuttamaṃ rajaḥ
analyzed: uta idam uttamam rajaḥ

original: RV_09.022.06.1{12} tantuṃ tanvānamuttamamanu pravata āśata
analyzed: tantum tanvānam uttamam anu pravataḥ āśata

original: RV_09.022.06.2{12} utedamuttamāyyam
analyzed: uta idam uttamāyyam

original: RV_09.022.07.1{12} tvaṃ soma paṇibhya ā vasu gavyāni dhārayaḥ
analyzed: tvam soma paṇibhyaḥ ā vasu gavyāni dhārayaḥ

original: RV_09.022.07.2{12} tataṃ tantumacikradaḥ
analyzed: tatam tantum acikradaḥ

analyzed: somāḥ asṛgram āśavaḥ madhoḥ madasya dhārayā

original: RV_09.023.01.2{13} abhi viśvānikāvyā
analyzed: abhi viśvā anikāvyā

original: RV_09.023.02.1{13} anu pratnāsa āyavaḥ padaṃ navīyo akramuḥ
analyzed: anu pratnāsaḥ āyavaḥ padam navīyaḥ akramuḥ

original: RV_09.023.02.2{13} ruce jananta sūryam
analyzed: ruce jananta sūryam

original: RV_09.023.03.1{13} ā pavamāna no bharāryo adāśuṣo gayam
analyzed: ā pavamāna naḥ bhara aryaḥ a dāśuṣaḥ gayam

original: RV_09.023.03.2{13} kṛdhi prajāvatīriṣaḥ
analyzed: kṛdhi prajāvatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_09.023.04.1{13} abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyaṃ madam
analyzed: abhi somāsaḥ āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam

original: RV_09.023.04.2{13} abhi kośaṃ madhuścutam
analyzed: abhi kośam madhuścutam

original: RV_09.023.05.1{13} somo arṣati dharṇasirdadhāna indriyaṃ rasam
analyzed: somaḥ arṣati dharṇasiḥ dadhānaḥ indriyam rasam

original: RV_09.023.05.2{13} suvīro abhiśastipāḥ
analyzed: su vīraḥ abhiśasti pāḥ

original: RV_09.023.06.1{13} indrāya soma pavase devebhyaḥ sadhamādyaḥ
analyzed: indrāya soma pavase devebhyaḥ sadhamādyaḥ

original: RV_09.023.06.2{13} indo vājaṃ siṣāsasi
analyzed: indo vājam siṣāsasi

original: RV_09.023.07.1{13} asya pītvā madānāmindro vṛtrāṇyaprati
analyzed: asya pītvā madānām indraḥ vṛtrāṇi aprati

original: RV_09.023.07.2{13} jaghāna jaghanacca nu
analyzed: jaghāna jaghanat ca nu

original: RV_09.024.01.1{14} pra somāso adhanviṣuḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ
analyzed: pra somāsaḥ adhanviṣuḥ pavamānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_09.024.01.2{14} śrīṇānā apsu mṛñjata
analyzed: śrīṇānāḥ apsu mṛñjata

original: RV_09.024.02.1{14} abhi gāvo adhanviṣurāpo na pravatā yatīḥ
analyzed: abhi gāvaḥ adhanviṣuḥ āpaḥ na pravatā yatīḥ

original: RV_09.024.02.2{14} punānā indramāśata
analyzed: punānāḥ indram āśata

original: RV_09.024.03.1{14} pra pavamāna dhanvasi somendrāya pātave
analyzed: pra pavamāna dhanvasi soma indrāya pātave

original: RV_09.024.03.2{14} nṛbhiryato vi nīyase
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ yataḥ vi nīyase

original: RV_09.024.04.1{14} tvaṃ soma nṛmādanaḥ pavasva carṣaṇīsahe
analyzed: tvam soma nṛ mādanaḥ pavasva carṣaṇī sahe

original: RV_09.024.04.2{14} sasniryo anumādyaḥ
analyzed: sasniryaḥ anumādyaḥ

original: RV_09.024.05.1{14} indo yadadribhiḥ sutaḥ pavitraṃ paridhāvasi
analyzed: indo yat adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavitram paridhāvasi

original: RV_09.024.05.2{14} aramindrasya dhāmne
analyzed: aram indrasya dhāmne

original: RV_09.024.06.1{14} pavasva vṛtrahantamokthebhiranumādyaḥ
analyzed: pavasva vṛtra hantama ukthebhiḥ anumādyaḥ

original: RV_09.024.06.2{14} śuciḥ pāvako adbhutaḥ
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_09.024.07.1{14} śuciḥ pāvaka ucyate somaḥ sutasya madhvaḥ
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ ucyate somaḥ sutasya madhvaḥ

original: RV_09.024.07.2{14} devāvīraghaśaṃsahā
RV_09.025.01.1{15} pavasva dakṣasādhano devebhyaḥ pītaye hare
analyzed: pavasva dakṣa sādhanaḥ devebhyaḥ pītaye hare

original: RV_09.025.01.2{15} marudbhyo vāyave madaḥ
analyzed: marudbhyaḥ vāyave madaḥ

original: RV_09.025.02.1{15} pavamāna dhiyā hito 'bhi yoniṃ kanikradat
analyzed: pavamāna dhiyā hitaḥ bhi yonim kanikradat

original: RV_09.025.02.2{15} dharmaṇā vāyumā viśa
analyzed: dharmaṇā vāyumā viśa

original: RV_09.025.03.1{15} saṃ devaiḥ śobhate vṛṣā kaviryonāvadhi priyaḥ
analyzed: sam devaiḥ śobhate vṛṣā kaviḥ yonau adhi priyaḥ

original: RV_09.025.03.2{15} vṛtrahā devavītamaḥ
analyzed: vṛtra hā deva vītamaḥ

original: RV_09.025.04.1{15} viśvā rūpāṇyāviśan punāno yāti haryataḥ
analyzed: viśvā rūpāṇi āviśan punānaḥ yāti haryataḥ

original: RV_09.025.04.2{15} yatrāmṛtāsa āsate
analyzed: yatra amṛtāsaḥ āsate

original: RV_09.025.05.1{15} aruṣo janayan giraḥ somaḥ pavata āyuṣak
analyzed: aruṣaḥ janayan giraḥ somaḥ pavate āyuṣak

original: RV_09.025.05.2{15} indraṃ gachan kavikratuḥ
analyzed: indram gacchan kavi kratuḥ

original: RV_09.025.06.1{15} ā pavasva madintama pavitraṃ dhārayā kave
analyzed: ā pavasva madintama pavitram dhārayā kave

original: RV_09.025.06.2{15} arkasya yonimāsadam
analyzed: arkasya yonim āsadam

original: RV_09.026.01.1{16} tamamṛkṣanta vājinamupasthe aditeradhi
analyzed: tam amṛkṣanta vājinam upasthe aditeḥ adhi

original: RV_09.026.01.2{16} viprāso aṇvyādhiyā
analyzed: viprāsaḥ aṇvyā dhiyā

original: RV_09.026.02.1{16} taṃ gāvo abhyanūṣata sahasradhāramakṣitam
analyzed: tam gāvaḥ abhyanūṣata sahasra dhāram akṣitam

original: RV_09.026.02.2{16} induṃ dhartāramā divaḥ
analyzed: indum dhartāram ā divaḥ

original: RV_09.026.03.1{16} taṃ vedhāṃ medhayāhyan pavamānamadhi dyavi
analyzed: tam vedhām medhayā ahyan pavamānam adhi dyavi

original: RV_09.026.03.2{16} dharṇasiṃ bhūridhāyasam
analyzed: dharṇasim bhūri dhāyasam

original: RV_09.026.04.1{16} tamahyan bhurijordhiyā saṃvasānaṃ vivasvataḥ
analyzed: tam ahyan bhurijoḥ dhiyā saṃvasānam vivasvataḥ

original: RV_09.026.04.2{16} patiṃ vāco adābhyam
analyzed: patim vācaḥ adābhyam

original: RV_09.026.05.1{16} taṃ sānāvadhi jāmayo hariṃ hinvantyadribhiḥ
analyzed: tam sānau adhi jāmayaḥ harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_09.026.05.2{16} haryatambhūricakṣasam
analyzed: haryatam bhūri cakṣasam

original: RV_09.026.06.1{16} taṃ tvā hinvanti vedhasaḥ pavamāna girāvṛdham
analyzed: tam tvā hinvanti vedhasaḥ pavamāna girāvṛdham

original: RV_09.026.06.2{16} indavindrāya matsaram
analyzed: indo indrāya matsaram

original: RV_09.027.01.1{17} eṣa kavirabhiṣṭutaḥ pavitre adhi tośate
analyzed: eṣa kaviḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitre adhi tośate

original: RV_09.027.01.2{17} punāno ghnannapa sridhaḥ
analyzed: punānaḥ ghnan apa sridhaḥ

analyzed: pavitre dakṣa sādhanaḥ

analyzed: vṛtra hā deva vītamaḥ

analyzed: eṣa sūryam arocayat pavamānaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ

analyzed: viśvā dhāmāni viśva vid

analyzed: vardha samudram ukthyam

analyzed: inu dveṣāṃsi sadhryak

analyzed: nidaḥ yatra mumucmahe

analyzed: iyarti vagnum indriyam

analyzed: pavasva soma dhārayā

analyzed: vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ

analyzed: abhi yoniṃkanikradat

original: RV_09.038.01.2{28} gachan vājaṃ sahasriṇam

original: RV_09.038.04.2{28} gachañ jāro na yoṣitam
analyzed: gaccham jāraḥ na yoṣitam

original: RV_09.038.05.1{28} eṣa sya madyo raso 'va caṣṭe divaḥ śiśuḥ
analyzed: eṣa sya madyaḥ rasaḥ caṣṭe divaḥ śiśuḥ

original: RV_09.038.05.2{28} ya indurvāramāviśat
analyzed: yaḥ induḥ vāram āviśat

original: RV_09.038.06.1{28} eṣa sya pītaye suto harirarṣati dharṇasiḥ
analyzed: eṣa sya pītaye sutaḥ hariḥ arṣati dharṇasiḥ

original: RV_09.038.06.2{28} krandan yonimabhi priyam
analyzed: krandan yonim abhi priyam

original: RV_09.039.01.1{29} āśurarṣa bṛhanmate pari priyeṇa dhāmnā
analyzed: āśuḥ arṣa bṛhanmate pari priyeṇa dhāmnā

original: RV_09.039.01.2{29} yatra devā itibravan
analyzed: yatra devāḥ iti bravan

original: RV_09.039.02.1{29} pariṣkṛṇvannaniṣkṛtaṃ janāya yātayanniṣaḥ
analyzed: pariṣkṛṇvan a niṣkṛtam janāya yātayan iṣaḥ

original: RV_09.039.02.2{29} vṛṣṭindivaḥ pari srava
analyzed: vṛṣṭindivaḥ pari srava

analyzed: sutaḥ eti pavitre ā tviṣim dadhānaḥ ojasā

analyzed: vicakṣāṇaḥ virocayan

analyzed: ayam sa yaḥ divaḥ pari raghu yāmā pavitre ā

analyzed: sindhoḥ ūrmā vyakṣarat

analyzed: āvivāsan parāvataḥ atho arvāvataḥ sutaḥ

analyzed: indrāya sicyate madhu

analyzed: samīcīnāḥ anūṣata harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

analyzed: yonau ṛtasya sīdata

analyzed: punānaḥ akramīt abhi viśvāḥ mṛdhaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ

analyzed: śumbhanti vipram dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_09.040.02.1{30} ā yonimaruṇo ruhad gamadindraṃ vṛṣā sutaḥ
analyzed: ā yonim aruṇaḥ ruhat gamat indram vṛṣā sutaḥ

analyzed: dhruve sadasi sīdati

analyzed: nu naḥ rayim mahām indo smabhyam soma viśvatas

original: RV_09.040.03.2{30} ā pavasvasahasriṇam
analyzed: ā pavasva asahasriṇam

analyzed: viśvā soma pavamāna dyumnāni indavā bhara

analyzed: vidāḥ sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ

analyzed: sa naḥ punānaḥ ā bhara rayim stotre su vīryam

analyzed: jarituḥ vardhaya giraḥ

analyzed: punānaḥ indavā bhara soma dvibarhasam rayim

analyzed: vṛṣan nindaḥ na aukthyam

original: RV_09.041.01.2{31} ghnantaḥ kṛṣṇāmapa tvacam
analyzed: ghnantaḥ kṛṣṇām apa tvacam

analyzed: suvitasya manāmahe ti setum durāvyam

analyzed: sāhvāṃsaḥ dasyum avratam

analyzed: śṛṇve vṛṣṭeḥ iva svanaḥ pavamānasya śuṣmiṇaḥ

original: RV_09.041.03.2{31} carantividyuto divi
analyzed: caranti vidyutaḥ divi

original: RV_09.041.04.2{31} aśvāvad vājavat sutaḥ
analyzed: aśvāvat vājavat sutaḥ

original: RV_09.041.05.1{31} sa pavasva vicarṣaṇa ā mahī rodasī pṛṇa
analyzed: sa pavasva vicarṣaṇe ā mahī rodasī pṛṇa

analyzed: uṣāḥ sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ

analyzed: pari naḥ śarmayantyā dhārayā soma viśvatas

analyzed: sara rasā iva viṣṭapam

analyzed: janayan rocanā divaḥ janayan apsu sūryam

analyzed: vasānaḥ gāḥ apohariḥ

analyzed: eṣa pratnena manmanā devaḥ devebhyaḥ pari

analyzed: dhārayā pavate sutaḥ

analyzed: vāvṛdhānāya tūrvaye pavante vājasātaye

original: RV_09.042.03.2{32} somāḥ sahasrapājasaḥ
analyzed: somāḥ sahasra pājasaḥ

analyzed: krandan devān ajījanat

analyzed: abhi viśvāni vāryā abhi devān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

analyzed: pavasva bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ

analyzed: tam gīrbhiḥ vāsayāmasi

analyzed: indum indrāya pītaye

analyzed: punānaḥ yāti haryataḥ somaḥ gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ

analyzed: viprasya medhyātitheḥ

analyzed: pavamāna vida rayim asmabhyam soma su śriyam

analyzed: indo sahasra varcasam

analyzed: induratyaḥ na vājasṛt kanikranti pavitre ā

analyzed: yat akṣārati devayuḥ

analyzed: soma rāsva su vīryam

analyzed: abhi deva anayāsyaḥ

analyzed: viprasya dhārayā kaviḥ

analyzed: indo stotre su vīryam

analyzed: indram vardhanti karmabhiḥ

analyzed: ā dhāvata suhastyaḥ śukrāḥ gṛbhṇīta manthinā

analyzed: gobhiḥ śrīṇīta matsaram

analyzed: sa pavasva dhanaṃjaya prayantā rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

analyzed: indrāya matsaram madam

analyzed: mandānaḥ udvṛṣāyate

original: RV_09.047.03.2{04} ukthaṃ yadasya jāyate

analyzed: yadī marmṛjyate dhiyaḥ

analyzed: siṣāsatuḥ rayīṇām vājeṣu arvatām iva

analyzed: bhareṣu jigyuṣām asi

original: RV_09.048.01.2{05} cāruṃ sukṛtyayemahe
analyzed: cārum su kṛtyayā īmahe

analyzed: śatam puraḥ rurukṣaṇim

analyzed: suparṇaḥ avyathiḥ bharat

analyzed: viśvasmai id svar dṛśe sādhāraṇam rajasturam

original: RV_09.048.04.2{05} gopām ṛtasya virbharat
analyzed: gopām ṛtasya virbharat

original: RV_09.048.05.1{05} adhā hinvāna indriyaṃ jyāyo mahitvamānaśe
analyzed: adhā hinvānaḥ indriyam jyāyaḥ mahi tvam ānaśe

original: RV_09.048.05.2{05} abhiṣṭikṛdvicarṣaṇiḥ
analyzed: abhiṣṭi kṛt vicarṣaṇiḥ

analyzed: ayakṣmāḥ bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_09.049.02.2{06} janyāsa upa no gṛham
analyzed: janyāsaḥ upa naḥ gṛham

original: RV_09.049.03.1{06} ghṛtaṃ pavasva dhārayā yajñeṣu devavītamaḥ
analyzed: ghṛtam pavasva dhārayā yajñeṣu deva vītamaḥ

original: RV_09.049.03.2{06} asmabhyaṃ vṛṣṭimā pava
analyzed: asmabhyam vṛṣṭimā pava

analyzed: sa naḥ ūrje vyavyayam pavitram dhāva dhārayā

original: RV_09.049.04.2{06} devāsaḥ śṛṇavan hi kam
analyzed: devāsaḥ śṛṇavan hi kam

original: RV_09.049.05.1{06} pavamāno asiṣyadad rakṣāṃsyapajaṅghanat
analyzed: pavamānaḥ asiṣyadat rakṣāṃsi apajaṅghanat

original: RV_09.049.05.2{06} pratnavad rocayan rucaḥ
analyzed: pratna vat rocayan rucaḥ

original: RV_09.050.01.1{07} ut te śuṣmāsa īrate sindhorūrmeriva svanaḥ
analyzed: ud te śuṣmāsaḥ īrate sindhoḥ ūrmeḥ iva svanaḥ

original: RV_09.050.01.2{07} vāṇasya codayā pavim
analyzed: vāṇasya codaya pavim

analyzed: prasave te udīrate tisraḥ vācaḥ makhasyuvaḥ

original: RV_09.050.02.2{07} yadavya eṣisānavi
analyzed: yad avye eṣi sānavi

original: RV_09.050.03.1{07} avyo vāre pari priyaṃ hariṃ hinvantyadribhiḥ
analyzed: avyaḥ vāre pari priyam harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_09.050.03.2{07} pavamānammadhuścutam
analyzed: pavamānam madhuścutam

original: RV_09.050.04.1{07} ā pavasva madintama pavitraṃ dhārayā kave
analyzed: ā pavasva madintama pavitram dhārayā kave

original: RV_09.050.04.2{07} arkasya yonimāsadam
analyzed: arkasya yonim āsadam

original: RV_09.050.05.1{07} sa pavasva madintama gobhirañjāno aktubhiḥ
analyzed: sa pavasva madintama gobhiḥ añjānaḥ aktubhiḥ

original: RV_09.050.05.2{07} indavindrāyapītaye
analyzed: indo indrāya pītaye

analyzed: punīhi indrāya pātave

analyzed: divaḥ pīyūṣam uttamam somam indrāya vajriṇe

analyzed: sunota madhumattamam

analyzed: tava tye indo andhasaḥ devāḥ madhoḥ vyaśnate

analyzed: pavamānasya marutaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ asmān ādideśati

analyzed: śatam naḥ indo ūtibhiḥ sahasram vā śucīnām

analyzed: pavasva maṃhayat rayiḥ

analyzed: nudasva yāḥ parispṛdhaḥ

analyzed: ayā nijaghniḥ ojasā ratha saṃge dhane hite

analyzed: stavā a bibhyuṣā hṛdā

analyzed: ruja yaḥ tvā apṛtanyati

analyzed: indum indrāya matsaram

analyzed: sapta pravataā divam

analyzed: ayam viśvāni tiṣṭhati punānaḥ bhuvana upari

analyzed: punānaḥ indo indrayuḥ

analyzed: īndo yathā tava stavaḥ yathā te jātam andhasaḥ

analyzed: makṣūtamebhiḥ ahabhiḥ

analyzed: vighnan rakṣāṃsi devayuḥ

original: RV_09.061.19.2{21} devāvīraghaśaṃsahā
RV_09.061.20.1{21} jaghnirvṛtramamitriyaṃ sasnirvājaṃ dive-dive

original: RV_09.061.21.2{22} sīdañchyeno na yonimā

original: RV_09.061.29.2{23} sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ
analyzed: sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ

analyzed: indo viśvā anivāryā

analyzed: hinvānaḥ vācam iṣyasi pavamāna vidharmaṇi

analyzed: indoḥ rucā abhigāḥ ihi

analyzed: punānaḥ varivaḥ kṛdhī ūrjam janāya girvaṇaḥ

analyzed: hare sṛjāna āśiram

analyzed: punānaḥ deva vītaye indrasya yāhi niṣkṛtam

analyzed: agman ṛtasya yonimā

analyzed: pāhi naḥ śarma vīravat

analyzed: pra yat samudre āhitaḥ

analyzed: ā yat yonim hiraṇyayam āśuḥ ṛtasya sīdati

original: RV_09.064.20.2{39} jahātyapracetasaḥ
analyzed: jahāti apracetasaḥ

analyzed: abhi venāḥ anūṣata iyakṣanti pracetasaḥ

analyzed: majjanti avicetasaḥ

analyzed: indrāya indo marutvate pavasva madhumattamaḥ

analyzed: sam tvā mṛjanti āyavaḥ

analyzed: pavamānasya marutaḥ

analyzed: tvam soma vipaścitam punānaḥ vācam iṣyasi

analyzed: indo sahasrabharṇasam

analyzed: uta u sahasrabharṇasam vācam soma makhasyuvam

analyzed: punānaḥ indavā bhara

analyzed: punānaḥ indava eṣām puruhūta janānām

analyzed: priyaḥ samudramāḥ viśa

analyzed: davidyutatyā rucā pariṣṭobhantyā kṛpā

analyzed: somāḥ śukrāḥ gavāśiraḥ

analyzed: hinvānaḥ hetṛbhiḥ yataḥ ā vājam vājī akramīt

analyzed: sīdantaḥ vanuṣaḥ yathā

analyzed: ṛdhak soma svastaye saṃjagmānaḥ divaḥ kaviḥ

analyzed: pavasva sūrya udṛśe

analyzed: hinvanti sūra musrayaḥ svasāraḥ jāmayaḥ patim

original: RV_09.065.01.2{01} mahāminduṃ mahīyuvaḥ
analyzed: mahām indum mahīyuvaḥ

analyzed: viśvā vasūni āviśa

analyzed: ā pavamāna suṣṭutim vṛṣṭim devebhyaḥ duvaḥ

analyzed: iṣe pavasva saṃyatam

analyzed: vṛṣā hi asi bhānunā dyumantam tvā havāmahe

analyzed: pavamāna svādhyaḥ

analyzed: ā pavasva su vīryam mandamānaḥ su āyudha

analyzed: iha u su indavā gahi

analyzed: yat adbhiḥ pariṣicyase mṛjyamānaḥ gabhastyoḥ

analyzed: druṇā sadhastham aśnuṣe

analyzed: mahe sahasra cakṣase

analyzed: yasya varṇam madhuścutam harim hinvanti adribhiḥ

analyzed: indum indrāya pītaye

original: RV_09.065.09.2{02} sakhitvamā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: sakhi tvam ā vṛṇīmahe

analyzed: vṛṣā pavasva dhārayā marutvate ca matsaraḥ

analyzed: viśvā dadhānaḥ ojasā

analyzed: tam tvā dhartāram oṇyoḥ pavamāna svar dṛśam

analyzed: hinve vājeṣu vājinam

analyzed: ayā cittaḥ vipānayā hariḥ pavasva dhārayā

analyzed: yujam vājeṣu codaya

analyzed: ā naḥ indo mahīmiṣam pavasva viśva darśataḥ

analyzed: asmabhyam soma gātu vid

analyzed: ā indrasya pītaye viśa

original: RV_09.065.15.2{03} sa pavasvābhimātihā
analyzed: sa pavasva abhimāti hā

analyzed: rājā medhābhiḥ īyate pavamānaḥ manau adhi

analyzed: antarikṣeṇa yātave

analyzed: ā pavasva asahasriṇam

analyzed: ye vā adaḥ śaryaṇāvati

analyzed: suvānāḥ devāsaḥ indavaḥ

analyzed: śrīṇānā apsu mṛñjata

analyzed: sa pavasva anayā rucā

analyzed: pāntamā puruspṛham

analyzed: ā mandramāḥ vareṇyamāḥ vipramāḥ manīṣiṇam

original: RV_09.065.29.2{06} pāntamā puruspṛham
analyzed: pāntamā puruspṛham

analyzed: ā rayimā sucetunamā su krato tanūṣva

original: RV_09.065.30.2{06} pāntamā puruspṛham
analyzed: pāntamā puruspṛham

analyzed: pavasva viśvacarṣaṇe bhi viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_09.066.01.2{07} sakhā sakhibhya īḍyaḥ
analyzed: sakhā sakhibhyaḥ īḍyaḥ

analyzed: tābhyām viśvasya rājasi ye pavamāna dhāmanī

analyzed: pratīcī soma tasthatuḥ

analyzed: pari dhāmāni yāni te tvam soma asi viśvatas pavamānaḥ ṛtubhiḥ kave

analyzed: sakhā sakhibhyaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_09.066.05.2{07} pavitraṃ soma dhāmabhiḥ
analyzed: pavitram soma dhāmabhiḥ

analyzed: tava ime sapta sindhavaḥ praśiṣam soma sisrate

analyzed: tubhyam dhāvanti dhenavaḥ

analyzed: pra soma yāhi dhārayā sutaḥ indrāya matsaraḥ

analyzed: dadhānaḥ akṣiti śravaḥ

original: RV_09.066.08.1{08} samu tvā dhībhirasvaran hinvatīḥ sapta jāmayaḥ

original: RV_09.066.08.2{08} vipramājā vivasvataḥ
analyzed: vipramājāḥ vivasvataḥ

analyzed: mṛjanti tvā samagruvaḥ vye jīra avadhi svani

original: RV_09.066.09.2{08} rebho yadajyase vane
analyzed: rebhaḥ yat ajyase vane

analyzed: pavamānasya te kave vājin sargāḥ asṛkṣata

analyzed: arvantaḥ na śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_09.066.11.1{09} achā kośaṃ madhuścutamasṛgraṃ vāre avyaye
analyzed: achā kośam madhuścutam asṛgram vāre avyaye

original: RV_09.066.11.2{09} avāvaśantadhītayaḥ
analyzed: avāvaśanta dhītayaḥ

original: RV_09.066.12.1{09} achā samudramindavo 'staṃ gāvo na dhenavaḥ
analyzed: achā samudram indavaḥ stam gāvaḥ na dhenavaḥ

original: RV_09.066.12.2{09} agmannṛtasya yonimā
analyzed: agman ṛtasya yonimā

analyzed: pra naḥ indo mahe raṇe āpaḥ arṣanti sindhavaḥ

original: RV_09.066.13.2{09} yad gobhirvāsayiṣyase
analyzed: yat gobhiḥ vāsayiṣyase

original: RV_09.066.14.1{09} asya te sakhye vayamiyakṣantastvotayaḥ
analyzed: asya te sakhye vayam iyakṣantaḥ tvotayaḥ

original: RV_09.066.14.2{09} indo sakhitvamuśmasi
analyzed: indo sakhi tvam uśmasi

original: RV_09.066.15.1{09} ā pavasva gaviṣṭaye mahe soma nṛcakṣase
analyzed: ā pavasva gaviṣṭaye mahe soma nṛ cakṣase

original: RV_09.066.15.2{09} endrasya jaṭhareviśa
analyzed: ā indrasya jaṭhareviśa

original: RV_09.066.16.1{10} mahānasi soma jyeṣṭha ugrāṇāminda ojiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: mahānasi soma jyeṣṭhaḥ ugrāṇām indo ojiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_09.066.16.2{10} yudhvā sañchaśvajjigetha
analyzed: yudhvā san śaśvat jigetha

original: RV_09.066.17.1{10} ya ugrebhyaścidojīyāñchūrebhyaścicchūrataraḥ

original: RV_09.066.17.2{10} bhūridābhyaścin maṃhīyān
analyzed: bhūri dābhyaḥ cit maṃhīyān

original: RV_09.066.18.1{10} tvaṃ soma sūra eṣastokasya sātā tanūnām
analyzed: tvam soma sūraḥ ā iṣa stokasya sātā tanūnām

original: RV_09.066.18.2{10} vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya vṛṇīmahe yujyāya
analyzed: vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya vṛṇīmahe yujyāya

original: RV_09.066.19.1{10} agna āyūṃṣi pavasa ā suvorjamiṣaṃ ca naḥ
analyzed: agne āyūṃṣi pavase ā suva ūrjam iṣam ca naḥ

original: RV_09.066.19.2{10} āre bādhasva duchunām
analyzed: āre bādhasva duchunām

original: RV_09.066.20.1{10} agnir{ṛ}ṣiḥ pavamānaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ ṛṣiḥ pavamānaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ

original: RV_09.066.20.2{10} tamīmahemahāgayam
analyzed: tam īmahemahemahā gayam

original: RV_09.066.21.1{11} agne pavasva svapā asme varcaḥ suvīryam
analyzed: agne pavasva su apāḥ asme varcaḥ su vīryam

original: RV_09.066.21.2{11} dadhad rayiṃ mayi poṣam
analyzed: dadhat rayim mayi poṣam

original: RV_09.066.22.1{11} pavamāno ati sridho 'bhyarṣati suṣṭutim
analyzed: pavamānaḥ ati sridhaḥ bhyarṣati suṣṭutim

original: RV_09.066.22.2{11} sūro na viśvadarśataḥ
analyzed: sūraḥ na viśva darśataḥ

original: RV_09.066.23.1{11} sa marmṛjāna āyubhiḥ prayasvān prayase hitaḥ
analyzed: sa marmṛjānaḥ āyubhiḥ prayasvān prayase hitaḥ

original: RV_09.066.23.2{11} induratyovicakṣaṇaḥ
RV_09.066.24.1{11} pavamāna ṛtaṃ bṛhacchukraṃ jyotirajījanat
analyzed: pavamānaḥ ṛtam bṛhat śukram jyotiḥ ajījanat

original: RV_09.066.24.2{11} kṛṣṇā tamāṃsi jaṅghanat
analyzed: kṛṣṇā tamāṃsi jaṅghanat

original: RV_09.066.25.1{11} pavamānasya jaṅghnato hareścandrā asṛkṣata
analyzed: pavamānasya jaṅghnataḥ hareḥ candrāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_09.066.25.2{11} jīrā ajiraśociṣaḥ
analyzed: jīrāḥ ajira śociṣaḥ

original: RV_09.066.26.1{12} pavamāno rathītamaḥ śubhrebhiḥ śubhraśastamaḥ
analyzed: pavamānaḥ rathītamaḥ śubhrebhiḥ śubhraśastamaḥ

original: RV_09.066.26.2{12} hariścandro marudgaṇaḥ
RV_09.066.27.1{12} pavamāno vyaśnavad raśmibhirvājasātamaḥ
analyzed: pavamānaḥ vyaśnavat raśmibhiḥ vāja sātamaḥ

original: RV_09.066.27.2{12} dadhat stotresuvīryam
analyzed: dadhat stotresu vīryam

original: RV_09.066.28.1{12} pra suvāna indurakṣāḥ pavitramatyavyayam
analyzed: pra suvānaḥ indu rakṣāḥ pavitram ati avyayam

original: RV_09.066.28.2{12} punāna indurindramā
analyzed: punānaḥ induḥ indramāḥ

original: RV_09.066.29.1{12} eṣa somo adhi tvaci gavāṃ krīḷatyadribhiḥ
analyzed: eṣa somaḥ adhi tvaci gavām krīḍati adribhiḥ

original: RV_09.066.29.2{12} indraṃ madāya johuvat
analyzed: indram madāya johuvat

original: RV_09.066.30.1{12} yasya te dyumnavat payaḥ pavamānābhṛtaṃ divaḥ
analyzed: yasya te dyumnavat payaḥ pavamāna ābhṛtam divaḥ

original: RV_09.066.30.2{12} tena no mṛḷa jīvase
analyzed: tena naḥ mṛḍa jīvase

original: RV_09.067.01.1{13} tvaṃ somāsi dhārayurmandra ojiṣṭho adhvare
analyzed: tvam soma asi dhārayuḥ mandraḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ adhvare

original: RV_09.067.01.2{13} pavasva maṃhayadrayiḥ
analyzed: pavasva maṃhayat rayiḥ

original: RV_09.067.02.1{13} tvaṃ suto nṛmādano dadhanvān matsarintamaḥ
analyzed: tvam sutaḥ nṛ mādanaḥ dadhanvān matsarintamaḥ

original: RV_09.067.02.2{13} indrāya sūrirandhasā
analyzed: indrāya sūriḥ randhasā

original: RV_09.067.03.1{13} tvaṃ suṣvāṇo adribhirabhyarṣa kanikradat
analyzed: tvam suṣvāṇaḥ adribhiḥ abhyarṣa kanikradat

original: RV_09.067.03.2{13} dyumantaṃ śuṣmamuttamam
analyzed: dyumantam śuṣmam uttamam

original: RV_09.067.04.1{13} indurhinvāno arṣati tiro vārāṇyavyayā
analyzed: induḥ hinvānaḥ arṣati tiras vārāṇi avyayā

original: RV_09.067.04.2{13} harirvājamacikradat
analyzed: hariḥ vājam acikradat

original: RV_09.067.05.1{13} indo vyavyamarṣasi vi śravāṃsi vi saubhagā
analyzed: indo vyavyamarṣasi vi śravāṃsi vi saubhagā

original: RV_09.067.05.2{13} vi vājāṃsoma gomataḥ
analyzed: vi vājān soma gomataḥ

original: RV_09.067.06.1{14} ā na indo śatagvinaṃ rayiṃ gomantamaśvinam
analyzed: ā naḥ indo śatagvinam rayim gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_09.067.06.2{14} bharā soma sahasriṇam
analyzed: bhara soma sahasriṇam

original: RV_09.067.07.1{14} pavamānāsa indavastiraḥ pavitramāśavaḥ
analyzed: pavamānāsaḥ indavaḥ tiras pavitram āśavaḥ

original: RV_09.067.07.2{14} indraṃ yāmebhirāśata
analyzed: indram yāmebhiḥ āśata

original: RV_09.067.08.1{14} kakuhaḥ somyo rasa indurindrāya pūrvyaḥ
analyzed: kakuhaḥ somyaḥ rasaḥ induḥ indrāya pūrvyaḥ

original: RV_09.067.08.2{14} āyuḥ pavata āyave
analyzed: āyuḥ pavate āyave

original: RV_09.067.09.1{14} hinvanti sūramusrayaḥ pavamānaṃ madhuścutam
analyzed: hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ pavamānam madhuścutam

original: RV_09.067.09.2{14} abhi girā samasvaran
analyzed: abhi girā samasvaran

original: RV_09.067.10.1{14} avitā no ajāśvaḥ pūṣā yāmani-yāmani
analyzed: avitā naḥ aja aśvaḥ pūṣā yāmani yāmani

original: RV_09.067.10.2{14} ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ
analyzed: ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ

original: RV_09.067.11.1{15} ayaṃ somaḥ kapardine ghṛtaṃ na pavate madhu
analyzed: ayam somaḥ kapardine ghṛtam na pavate madhu

original: RV_09.067.11.2{15} ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ
analyzed: ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ

original: RV_09.067.12.1{15} ayaṃ ta āghṛṇe suto ghṛtaṃ na pavate śuci
analyzed: ayam te āghṛṇe sutaḥ ghṛtam na pavate śuci

original: RV_09.067.12.2{15} ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ
analyzed: ā bhakṣat kanyāsu naḥ

original: RV_09.067.13.1{15} vāco jantuḥ kavīnāṃ pavasva soma dhārayā
analyzed: vācaḥ jantuḥ kavīnām pavasva soma dhārayā

original: RV_09.067.13.2{15} deveṣu ratnadhā asi
analyzed: deveṣu ratna dhāḥ asi

original: RV_09.067.14.1{15} ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati śyeno varma vi gāhate
analyzed: ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati śyenaḥ varma vi gāhate

original: RV_09.067.14.2{15} abhi droṇā kanikradat
analyzed: abhi droṇā kanikradat

original: RV_09.067.15.1{15} pari pra soma te raso 'sarji kalaśe sutaḥ
analyzed: pari pra soma te rasaḥ sarji kalaśe sutaḥ

original: RV_09.067.15.2{15} śyeno na taktoarṣati
analyzed: śyenaḥ na taktaḥ ṛṣati

original: RV_09.067.16.1{16} pavasva soma mandayannindrāya madhumattamaḥ
analyzed: pavasva soma mandayan indrāya madhumattamaḥ

original: RV_09.067.17.1{16} asṛgran devavītaye vājayanto rathā iva
analyzed: asṛgran deva vītaye vājayantaḥ rathāḥ iva

original: RV_09.067.18.1{16} te sutāso madintamāḥ śukrā vāyumasṛkṣata
analyzed: te sutāsaḥ madintamāḥ śukrāḥ vāyum asṛkṣata

original: RV_09.067.19.1{16} grāvṇā tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitraṃ soma gachasi
analyzed: grāvṇā tunnaḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram soma gacchasi

original: RV_09.067.19.2{16} dadhat stotre suvīryam
analyzed: dadhat stotre su vīryam

original: RV_09.067.20.1{16} eṣa tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitramati gāhate
analyzed: eṣa tunnaḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram ati gāhate

original: RV_09.067.20.2{16} rakṣohā vāramavyayam
analyzed: rakṣaḥ hā vāram avyayam

original: RV_09.067.21.1{17} yadanti yacca dūrake bhayaṃ vindati māmiha
analyzed: yat anti yat ca dūrake bhayam vindati mām iha

original: RV_09.067.21.2{17} pavamānavi tajjahi
analyzed: pavamānavi tat jahi

original: RV_09.067.22.1{17} pavamānaḥ so adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ
analyzed: pavamānaḥ saḥ adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_09.067.22.2{17} yaḥ potāsa punātu naḥ
analyzed: yaḥ potā āsa punātu naḥ

original: RV_09.067.23.1{17} yat te pavitramarciṣyagne vitatamantarā
analyzed: yat te pavitram arciṣi agne vitatam antarā

original: RV_09.067.23.2{17} brahma tena punīhi naḥ
analyzed: brahma tena punīhi naḥ

original: RV_09.067.24.1{17} yat te pavitramarcivadagne tena punīhi naḥ
analyzed: yat te pavitram arcivat agne tena punīhi naḥ

original: RV_09.067.24.2{17} brahmasavaiḥ punīhi naḥ
analyzed: brahma savaiḥ punīhi naḥ

original: RV_09.067.25.1{17} ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca
analyzed: ubhābhyām deva savitar pavitreṇa savena ca

original: RV_09.067.25.2{17} māṃ punīhi viśvataḥ
analyzed: mām punīhi viśvatas

original: RV_09.067.26.1{18} tribhiṣ ṭvaṃ deva savitarvarṣiṣṭhaiḥ soma dhāmabhiḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ tvam deva savitar varṣiṣṭhaiḥ soma dhāmabhiḥ

original: RV_09.067.26.2{18} agne dakṣaiḥ punīhi naḥ
analyzed: agne dakṣaiḥ punīhi naḥ

original: RV_09.067.27.1{18} punantu māṃ devajanāḥ punantu vasavo dhiyā
analyzed: punantu mām deva janāḥ punantu vasavaḥ dhiyā

original: RV_09.067.27.2{18} viśve devāḥ punīta mā jātavedaḥ punīhi mā
analyzed: viśve devāḥ punīta mā jātavedaḥ punīhi mā

original: RV_09.067.28.1{18} pra pyāyasva pra syandasva soma viśvebhiraṃśubhiḥ
analyzed: pra pyāyasva pra syandasva soma viśvebhiḥ aṃśubhiḥ

original: RV_09.067.28.2{18} devebhya uttamaṃ haviḥ
analyzed: devebhyaḥ uttamam haviḥ

original: RV_09.067.29.1{18} upa priyaṃ panipnataṃ yuvānamāhutīvṛdham
analyzed: upa priyam panipnatam yuvānam āhutīvṛdham

original: RV_09.067.29.2{18} aganma bibhratonamaḥ
analyzed: aganma bibhrataḥ namaḥ

original: RV_09.067.30.1{18} alāyyasya paraśurnanāśa tamā pavasva deva soma
analyzed: alāyyasya paraśuḥ nanāśa tamā pavasva deva soma

original: RV_09.067.30.2{18} ākhuṃ cideva deva soma
analyzed: ākhum cit eva deva soma

original: RV_09.067.31.1{18} yaḥ pāvamānīradhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam
analyzed: yaḥ pāvamānīḥ adhyeti ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtam rasam

original: RV_09.067.31.2{18} sarvaṃsa pūtamaśnāti svaditaṃ mātariśvanā
analyzed: sarvam sa pūtam aśnāti svaditam mātariśvanā

original: RV_09.067.32.1{18} pāvamānīryo adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam
analyzed: pāvamānīḥ yaḥ adhyeti ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtam rasam

original: RV_09.067.32.2{18} tasmai sarasvatī duhe kṣīraṃ sarpirmadhūdakam
analyzed: tasmai sarasvatī duhe kṣīram sarpiḥ madhu udakam

original: RV_09.068.01.1{19} pra devamachā madhumanta indavo 'siṣyadanta gāva ā na dhenavaḥ
analyzed: pra deva machāḥ madhumantaḥ indavaḥ siṣyadanta gāvaḥ ā na dhenavaḥ

original: RV_09.068.01.2{19} barhiṣado vacanāvanta ūdhabhiḥ parisrutamusriyānirṇijaṃ dhire
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ vacanāvantaḥ ūdhabhiḥ parisrutam usriyā nirṇijam dhire

original: RV_09.068.02.1{19} sa roruvadabhi pūrvā acikradadupāruhaḥ śrathayan svādatehariḥ
analyzed: sa roruvat abhi pūrvāḥ acikradat upāruhaḥ śrathayan svādatehariḥ

original: RV_09.068.02.2{19} tiraḥ pavitramapriyannuru jrayo ni śaryāṇi dadhate deva ā varam
analyzed: tiras pavitram apriyan uru jrayaḥ ni śaryāṇi dadhate devaḥ ā varam

original: RV_09.068.03.1{19} vi yo mame yamyā saṃyatī madaḥ sākaṃvṛdhā payasā pinvadakṣitā
analyzed: vi yaḥ mame yamyā saṃyatī madaḥ sākaṃvṛdhā payasā pinva dakṣitā

original: RV_09.068.03.2{19} mahī apāre rajasī vivevidadabhivrajannakṣitaṃ pāja ā dade
analyzed: mahī apāre rajasī vivevidat abhivrajan akṣitam pājaḥ ā dade

original: RV_09.068.04.1{19} sa mātarā vicaran vājayannapaḥ pra medhiraḥ svadhayā pinvate padam
analyzed: sa mātarā vicaran vājayan apaḥ pra medhiraḥ svadhayā pinvate padam

original: RV_09.068.04.2{19} aṃśuryavena pipiśe yato nṛbhiḥ saṃ jāmibhirnasate rakṣate śiraḥ
analyzed: aṃśuḥ yavena pipiśe yataḥ nṛbhiḥ sam jāmibhiḥ nasate rakṣate śiraḥ

original: RV_09.068.05.1{19} saṃ dakṣeṇa manasā jāyate kavir{ṛ}tasya garbho nihito yamā paraḥ
analyzed: sam dakṣeṇa manasā jāyate kaviḥ ṛtasya garbhaḥ nihitaḥ yamā paras

original: RV_09.068.05.2{19} yūnā ha santā prathamaṃ vi jajñaturguhā hitaṃ janima nemamudyatam
analyzed: yūnā ha santā prathamam vi jajñatuḥ guhā hitam janima nemam udyatam

original: RV_09.068.06.1{20} mandrasya rūpaṃ vividurmanīṣiṇaḥ śyeno yadandho abharat parāvataḥ
analyzed: mandrasya rūpam vividuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ śyenaḥ yat andhaḥ abharat parāvataḥ

original: RV_09.068.06.2{20} taṃ marjayanta suvṛdhaṃ nadīṣvā uśantamaṃśuṃ pariyantam ṛgmiyam
analyzed: tam marjayanta suvṛdham nadīṣvāḥ uśantam aṃśum pariyantam ṛgmiyam

original: RV_09.068.07.1{20} tvāṃ mṛjanti daśa yoṣaṇaḥ sutaṃ soma ṛṣibhirmatibhirdhītibhirhitam
analyzed: tvām mṛjanti daśa yoṣaṇaḥ sutam soma ṛṣibhiḥ matibhiḥ dhītibhiḥ hitam

original: RV_09.068.07.2{20} avyo vārebhiruta devahūtibhirnṛbhiryatovājamā darṣi sātaye
analyzed: avyaḥ vārebhiḥ uta deva hūtibhiḥ nṛbhiḥ yatovājamā darṣi sātaye

original: RV_09.068.08.1{20} pariprayantaṃ vayyaṃ suṣaṃsadaṃ somaṃ manīṣā abhyanūṣata stubhaḥ
analyzed: pariprayantam vayyam suṣaṃsadam somam manīṣāḥ abhyanūṣata stubhaḥ

original: RV_09.068.08.2{20} yo dhārayā madhumānūrmiṇā diva iyarti vācaṃ rayiṣāḷ amartyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ dhārayā madhumān ūrmiṇā divaḥ iyarti vācam rayiṣāh amartyaḥ

original: RV_09.068.09.1{20} ayaṃ diva iyarti viśvamā rajaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati
analyzed: ayam divaḥ iyarti viśvam ā rajaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati

original: RV_09.068.09.2{20} adbhirgobhirmṛjyate adribhiḥ sutaḥ punāna indurvarivo vidat priyam
analyzed: adbhiḥ gobhiḥ mṛjyate adribhiḥ sutaḥ punānaḥ induḥ varivaḥ vidat priyam

original: RV_09.068.10.1{20} evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāno vayo dadhaccitratamaṃ pavasva
analyzed: eva naḥ soma pariṣicyamānaḥ vayaḥ dadhat citratamam pavasva

original: RV_09.068.10.2{20} adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayimasme suvīram
analyzed: a dveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devāḥ dhatta rayim asme su vīram

original: RV_09.069.01.1{21} iṣurna dhanvan prati dhīyate matirvatso na māturupa sarjyūdhani
analyzed: iṣuḥ na dhanvan prati dhīyate matiḥ vatsaḥ na mātuḥ upa sarji ūdhani

original: RV_09.069.01.2{21} urudhāreva duhe agra āyatyasya vrateṣvapi soma iṣyate
analyzed: uru dhārā iva duhe agre āyatī asya vrateṣu api somaḥ iṣyate

original: RV_09.069.02.1{21} upo matiḥ pṛcyate sicyate madhu mandrājanī codate antarāsani
analyzed: upa u matiḥ pṛcyate sicyate madhu mandrājanī codate antarāsani

original: RV_09.069.02.2{21} pavamānaḥ santaniḥ praghnatāmiva madhumān drapsaḥ pari vāramarṣati
analyzed: pavamānaḥ santaniḥ praghnatām iva madhumān drapsaḥ pari vāram arṣati

original: RV_09.069.03.1{21} avye vadhūyuḥ pavate pari tvaci śrathnīte naptīraditer{ṛ}taṃ yate
analyzed: avye vadhūyuḥ pavate pari tvaci śrathnīte naptīḥ aditeḥ ṛtam yate

original: RV_09.069.03.2{21} harirakrān yajataḥ saṃyato mado nṛmṇā śiśāno mahiṣo na śobhate
analyzed: yajataḥ saṃyataḥ madaḥ nṛmṇā śiśānaḥ mahiṣaḥ na śobhate

original: RV_09.069.04.1{21} ukṣā mimāti prati yanti dhenavo devasya devīrupa yanti niṣkṛtam
analyzed: ukṣā mimāti prati yanti dhenavaḥ devasya devīḥ upa yanti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_09.069.04.2{21} atyakramīdarjunaṃ vāramavyayamatkaṃ na niktampari somo avyata
analyzed: atyakramīt arjunam vāram avyayam atkam na niktam pari somaḥ avyata

original: RV_09.069.05.1{21} amṛktena ruśatā vāsasā hariramartyo nirṇijānaḥ pari vyata
analyzed: amṛktena ruśatā vāsasā hariḥ amartyaḥ nirṇijānaḥ pari vyata

original: RV_09.069.05.2{21} divas pṛṣṭhaṃ barhaṇā nirṇije kṛtopastaraṇaṃ camvornabhasmayam
analyzed: divaḥ pṛṣṭham barhaṇā nirṇije kṛta upastaraṇam camvoḥ nabhasmayam

original: RV_09.069.06.1{22} sūryasyeva raśmayo drāvayitnavo matsarāsaḥ prasupaḥ sākamīrate
analyzed: sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ drāvayitnavaḥ matsarāsaḥ prasupaḥ sākam īrate

original: RV_09.069.06.2{22} tantuṃ tataṃ pari sargāsa āśavo nendrād ṛte pavate dhāma kiṃ cana
analyzed: tantum tatam pari sargāsaḥ āśavaḥ na indrāt ṛte pavate dhāma kim cana

original: RV_09.069.07.1{22} sindhoriva pravaṇe nimna āśavo vṛṣacyutā madāso gātumāśata
analyzed: sindhoḥ iva pravaṇe nimne āśavaḥ vṛṣa cyutāḥ madāsaḥ gātum āśata

original: RV_09.069.07.2{22} śaṃ no niveśe dvipade catuṣpade 'sme vājaḥ soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ niveśe dvipade catuṣpade sme vājaḥ soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_09.069.08.1{22} ā naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavadaśvāvad gomad yavamat suvīryam
analyzed: ā naḥ pavasva vasumat hiraṇyavat aśvāvat gomat yavamat su vīryam

original: RV_09.069.08.2{22} yūyaṃ hi soma pitaro mama sthana divo mūrdhānaḥprasthitā vayaskṛtaḥ
analyzed: yūyam hi soma pitaraḥ mama sthana divaḥ mūrdhānaḥ prasthitāḥ vayaskṛtaḥ

original: RV_09.069.09.1{22} ete somāḥ pavamānāsa indraṃ rathā iva pra yayuḥ sātimacha
analyzed: ete somāḥ pavamānāsaḥ indram rathāḥ iva pra yayuḥ sātimacha

original: RV_09.069.09.2{22} sutāḥ pavitramati yantyavyaṃ hitvī vavriṃ haritovṛṣtimacha
analyzed: sutāḥ pavitram ati yanti avyam hitvī vavrim haritovṛṣtim acha

original: RV_09.069.10.1{22} indavindrāya bṛhate pavasva sumṛḷīko anavadyo riśādāḥ
analyzed: indo indrāya bṛhate pavasva su mṛḍīkaḥ anavadyaḥ riśādāḥ

original: RV_09.069.10.2{22} bharā candrāṇi gṛṇate vasūni devairdyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ
analyzed: bhara candrāṇi gṛṇate vasūni devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī prāvatam naḥ

original: RV_09.070.01.1{23} trirasmai sapta dhenavo duduhre satyāmāśiraṃ pūrvye vyomani
analyzed: tris asmai sapta dhenavaḥ duduhre satyām āśiram pūrvye vyomani

original: RV_09.070.01.2{23} catvāryanyā bhuvanāni nirṇije cārūṇi cakre yad ṛtairavardhata
analyzed: catvāri anyā bhuvanāni nirṇije cārūṇi cakre yat ṛtaiḥ avardhata

original: RV_09.070.02.1{23} sa bhikṣamāṇo amṛtasya cāruṇa ubhe dyāvā kāvyenā vi śaśrathe
analyzed: sa bhikṣamāṇaḥ amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ ubhe dyāvā kāvyena vi śaśrathe

original: RV_09.070.02.2{23} tejiṣṭhā apo maṃhanā pari vyata yadī devasya śravasā sado viduḥ
analyzed: tejiṣṭhāḥ apaḥ maṃhanā pari vyata yadī devasya śravasā sadaḥ viduḥ

original: RV_09.070.03.1{23} te asya santu ketavo 'mṛtyavo 'dābhyāso januṣī ubhe anu
analyzed: te asya santu ketavaḥ mṛtyavaḥ dābhyāsaḥ januṣī ubhe anu

original: RV_09.070.03.2{23} yebhirnṛmṇā ca devyā ca punata ādid rājānaṃ mananā agṛbhṇata
analyzed: yebhiḥ nṛmṇā ca devyā ca punate ādit rājānam mananāḥ agṛbhṇata

original: RV_09.070.04.1{23} sa mṛjyamāno daśabhiḥ sukarmabhiḥ pra madhyamāsu mātṛṣuprame sacā
analyzed: sa mṛjyamānaḥ daśabhiḥ su karmabhiḥ pra madhyamāsu mātṛṣuprame sacā

original: RV_09.070.04.2{23} vratāni pāno amṛtasva cāruṇa ubhe nṛcakṣāanu paśyate viśau
analyzed: vratāni pānaḥ cāruṇaḥ ubhe nṛ cakṣāḥ anu paśyate viśau

original: RV_09.070.05.1{23} sa marmṛjāna indriyāya dhāyasa obhe antā rodasī harṣate hitaḥ
analyzed: sa marmṛjānaḥ indriyāya dhāyase ā ubhe antar rodasī harṣate hitaḥ

original: RV_09.070.05.2{23} vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa bādhate vi durmatīrādediśānaḥ śaryaheva śurudhaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa bādhate vi durmatīḥ ādediśānaḥ śaryahā iva śurudhaḥ

original: RV_09.070.06.1{24} sa mātarā na dadṛśāna usriyo nānadadeti marutāmiva svanaḥ
analyzed: sa mātarā na dadṛśānaḥ usriyaḥ nānadat eti marutām iva svanaḥ

original: RV_09.070.06.2{24} jānannṛtaṃ prathamaṃ yat svarṇaraṃ praśastaye kamavṛṇīta sukratuḥ
analyzed: jānan ṛtam prathamam yat svarṇaram praśastaye kam avṛṇīta su kratuḥ

original: RV_09.070.07.1{24} ruvati bhīmo vṛṣabhastaviṣyayā śṛṅge śiśāno hariṇīvicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: ruvati bhīmaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ taviṣyayā śṛṅge śiśānaḥ hariṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_09.070.07.2{24} ā yoniṃ somaḥ sukṛtaṃ ni ṣīdati gavyayītvag bhavati nirṇigavyayī
analyzed: ā yonim somaḥ su kṛtam ni sīdati gavyayī tvac bhavati nirṇij avyayī

original: RV_09.070.08.1{24} śuciḥ punānastanvamarepasamavye harirnyadhāviṣṭa sānavi
analyzed: śuciḥ punānaḥ tanvam arepasam avye hariḥ nyadhāviṣṭa sānavi

original: RV_09.070.08.2{24} juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave tridhātu madhu kriyate sukarmabhiḥ
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave tri dhātu madhu kriyate su karmabhiḥ

original: RV_09.070.09.1{24} pavasva soma devavītaye vṛṣendrasya hārdi somadhānamā viśa
analyzed: pavasva soma deva vītaye vṛṣā indrasya hārdi soma dhānamā viśa

original: RV_09.070.09.2{24} purā no bādhād duritāti pāraya kṣetravid dhi diśa āhā vipṛchate
analyzed: purā naḥ bādhāt duritā ati pāraya kṣetra vid hi diśaḥ āha ā vipṛcchate

original: RV_09.070.10.1{24} hito na saptirabhi vājamarṣendrasyendo jaṭharamā pavasva
analyzed: hitaḥ na saptiḥ abhi vājam arṣa indrasya indo jaṭharam ā pavasva

original: RV_09.070.10.2{24} nāvā na sindhumati parṣi vidvāñchūro na yudhyannava no nida spaḥ
analyzed: nāvā na sindhumati parṣi vidvān śūraḥ na yudhyan ava naḥ nidaḥ spaḥ

original: RV_09.071.01.1{25} ā dakṣiṇā sṛjyate śuṣmyāsadaṃ veti druho rakṣasaḥ pāti jāgṛviḥ
analyzed: ā dakṣiṇā sṛjyate śuṣmyā āsadam veti druhaḥ rakṣasaḥ pāti jāgṛviḥ

original: RV_09.071.01.2{25} hariropaśaṃ kṛṇute nabhas paya upastire camvorbrahma nirṇije
analyzed: hariropaśam kṛṇute nabhaḥ payaḥ upastire camvoḥ brahma nirṇije

original: RV_09.071.02.1{25} pra kriṣṭiheva śūṣa eti roruvadasuryaṃ varṇaṃ ni riṇīte asya tam
analyzed: pra kriṣṭi hā iva śūṣaḥ eti roruvat asuryam varṇam ni riṇīte asya tam

original: RV_09.071.02.2{25} jahāti vavriṃ pitureti niṣkṛtamupaprutaṃ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ tanā
analyzed: jahāti vavrim pituḥ eti niṣkṛtam upaprutam kṛṇute nirṇijam tanā

original: RV_09.071.03.1{25} adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavate gabhastyorvṛṣāyate nabhasā vepate matī
analyzed: adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavate gabhastyoḥ vṛṣāyate nabhasā vepate matī

original: RV_09.071.03.2{25} sa modate nasate sādhate girā nenikte apsu yajate parīmaṇi
analyzed: sa modate nasate sādhate girā nenikte apsu yajate parīmaṇi

original: RV_09.071.04.1{25} pari dyukṣaṃ sahasaḥ parvatāvṛdhaṃ madhvaḥ siñcanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim
analyzed: pari dyukṣam sahasaḥ parvatāvṛdham madhvaḥ siñcanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim

original: RV_09.071.04.2{25} ā yasmin gāvaḥ suhutāda ūdhani mūrdhaṃchrīṇantyagriyaṃ varīmabhiḥ
analyzed: ā yasmin gāvaḥ su hutāde ūdhani mūrdhan śrīṇanti agriyam varīmabhiḥ

original: RV_09.071.05.1{25} samī rathaṃ na bhurijoraheṣata daśa svasāro aditerupastha ā
analyzed: samī ratham na bhurijoḥ aheṣata daśa svasāraḥ aditeḥ upasthe ā

original: RV_09.071.05.2{25} jigādupa jrayati gorapīcyaṃ padaṃ yadasya matuthā ajījanan
analyzed: jigāt upa jrayati goḥ apīcyam padam yat asya matuthāḥ ajījanan

original: RV_09.071.06.1{26} śyeno na yoniṃ sadanaṃ dhiyā kṛtaṃ hiraṇyayamāsadaṃ deva eṣati
analyzed: śyenaḥ na yonim sadanam dhiyā kṛtam hiraṇyayam āsadam devaḥ eṣati

original: RV_09.071.06.2{26} e riṇanti barhiṣi priyaṃ girāśvo na devānapyeti yajñiyaḥ
analyzed: ā riṇanti barhiṣi priyam girā aśvaḥ na devān apyeti yajñiyaḥ

original: RV_09.071.07.1{26} parā vyakto aruṣo divaḥ kavirvṛṣā tripṛṣṭho anaviṣṭagā abhi
analyzed: parā vyaktaḥ aruṣaḥ divaḥ kaviḥ vṛṣā tri pṛṣṭhaḥ an aviṣṭa gāḥ abhi

original: RV_09.071.07.2{26} sahasraṇītiryatiḥ parāyatī rebho na pūrvīruṣaso vi rājati
analyzed: sahasraṇītiḥ yatiḥ parāyatī rebhaḥ na pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ vi rājati

original: RV_09.071.08.1{26} tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute varṇo asya sa yatrāśayat samṛtā sedhati sridhaḥ
analyzed: tveṣam rūpam kṛṇute varṇaḥ asya sa yatra aśayat samṛtā sedhati sridhaḥ

original: RV_09.071.08.2{26} apsā yāti svadhayā daivyaṃ janaṃ saṃ suṣṭutī nasate saṃ goagrayā
analyzed: ap sāḥ yāti svadhayā daivyam janam sam suṣṭutī nasate sam go agrayā

original: RV_09.071.09.1{26} ukṣeva yūthā pariyannarāvīdadhi tviṣīradhita sūryasya
analyzed: ukṣā iva yūthā pariyan arāvīt adhi tviṣīḥ adhita sūryasya

original: RV_09.071.09.2{26} divyaḥ suparṇo 'va cakṣata kṣāṃ somaḥ pari kratunā paśyate jāḥ
analyzed: divyaḥ suparṇaḥ va cakṣata kṣām somaḥ pari kratunā paśyate jāḥ

original: RV_09.072.01.1{27} hariṃ mṛjantyaruṣo na yujyate saṃ dhenubhiḥ kalaśe somo ajyate
analyzed: harim mṛjanti aruṣaḥ na yujyate sam dhenubhiḥ kalaśe somaḥ ajyate

original: RV_09.072.01.2{27} ud vācamīrayati hinvate matī puruṣṭutasya kati citparipriyaḥ
analyzed: ud vācam īrayati hinvate matī puruṣṭutasya kati cit paripriyaḥ

original: RV_09.072.02.1{27} sākaṃ vadanti bahavo manīṣiṇa indrasya somaṃ jaṭhare yadāduhuḥ
analyzed: sākam vadanti bahavaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ indrasya somam jaṭhare yadā aduhuḥ

original: RV_09.072.02.2{27} yadī mṛjanti sugabhastayo naraḥ sanīḷābhirdaśabhiḥ kāmyaṃ madhu
analyzed: yadī mṛjanti su gabhastayaḥ naraḥ sanīḍābhiḥ daśabhiḥ kāmyam madhu

original: RV_09.072.03.1{27} aramamāṇo atyeti gā abhi sūryasya priyaṃ duhitustiro ravam
analyzed: a ramamāṇaḥ atyeti gāḥ abhi sūryasya priyam duhituḥ tiras ravam

original: RV_09.072.03.2{27} anvasmai joṣamabharad vinaṃgṛsaḥ saṃ dvayībhiḥ svasṛbhiḥ kṣeti jāmibhiḥ
analyzed: anu asmai joṣam abharat vinaṃgṛsaḥ sam dvayībhiḥ svasṛbhiḥ kṣeti jāmibhiḥ

original: RV_09.072.04.1{27} nṛdhūto adriṣuto barhiṣi priyaḥ patirgavāṃ pradiva indur{ṛ}tviyaḥ
analyzed: nṛ dhūtaḥ adri sutaḥ barhiṣi priyaḥ patiḥ gavām pradivaḥ induḥ ṛtviyaḥ

original: RV_09.072.04.2{27} purandhivān manuṣo yajñasādhanaḥ śucirdhiyāpavate soma indra te
analyzed: purandhivān manuṣaḥ yajña sādhanaḥ śuciḥ dhiyā āpavate somaḥ indra te

original: RV_09.072.05.1{27} nṛbāhubhyāṃ codito dhārayā suto 'nuṣvadhaṃ pavate soma indra te
analyzed: nṛ bāhubhyām coditaḥ dhārayā sutaḥ nuṣvadham pavate somaḥ indra te

original: RV_09.072.05.2{27} āprāḥ kratūn samajairadhvare matīrverna druṣaccamvorāsadad dhariḥ
analyzed: āprāḥ kratūn samajaiḥ adhvare matīḥ veḥ na druṣat camvoḥ āsadat hariḥ

original: RV_09.072.06.1{28} aṃśuṃ duhanti stanayantamakṣitaṃ kaviṃ kavayo 'paso manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: aṃśum duhanti stanayantam akṣitam kavim kavayaḥ pasaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_09.072.06.2{28} samī gāvo matayo yanti saṃyata ṛtasya yonā sadane punarbhuvaḥ
analyzed: samī gāvaḥ matayaḥ yanti saṃyataḥ ṛtasya yonā sadane punarbhuvaḥ

original: RV_09.072.07.1{28} nābhā pṛthivyā dharuṇo maho divo 'pāmūrmau sindhuṣvantarukṣitaḥ
analyzed: nābhā pṛthivyāḥ dharuṇaḥ mahaḥ divaḥ pām ūrmau sindhuṣu antar ukṣitaḥ

original: RV_09.072.07.2{28} indrasya vajro vṛṣabho vibhūvasuḥ somo hṛdepavate cāru matsaraḥ
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vibhūvasuḥ somaḥ hṛdepavate cāru matsaraḥ

original: RV_09.072.08.1{28} sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ raja stotre śikṣannādhūnvate ca sukrato
analyzed: sa tu pavasva pari pārthivam rajaḥ stotre śikṣan ādhūnvate ca su krato

original: RV_09.072.08.2{28} mā no nirbhāg vasunaḥ sādanaspṛśo rayiṃ piśaṅgaṃ bahulaṃ vasīmahi
analyzed: mā naḥ nirbhāj vasunaḥ sādana spṛśaḥ rayim piśaṅgam bahulam vasīmahi

original: RV_09.072.09.1{28} ā tū na indo śatadātvaśvyaṃ sahasradātu paśumad dhiraṇyavat
analyzed: ā tu naḥ indo śata dātu aśvyam sahasra dātu paśumat hiraṇyavat

original: RV_09.072.09.2{28} upa māsva bṛhatī revatīriṣo 'dhi stotrasya pavamāna no gahi
analyzed: upa māsva bṛhatīḥ revatīḥ iṣaḥ dhi stotrasya pavamāna naḥ gahi

original: RV_09.073.01.1{29} srakve drapsasya dhamataḥ samasvarannṛtasya yonā samarantanābhayaḥ
analyzed: srakve drapsasya dhamataḥ samasvaran ṛtasya yonā samarantana abhayaḥ

original: RV_09.073.01.2{29} trīn sa mūrdhno asuraścakra ārabhe satyasyanāvaḥ sukṛtamapīparan
analyzed: trīn sa mūrdhnaḥ asuraḥ cakre ārabhe satyasya nāvaḥ sukṛtam apīparan

original: RV_09.073.02.1{29} samyak samyañco mahiṣā aheṣata sindhorūrmāvadhi venā avīvipan
analyzed: samyak samyañcaḥ mahiṣāḥ aheṣata sindhoḥ ūrmau adhi venāḥ avīvipan

original: RV_09.073.02.2{29} madhordhārābhirjanayanto arkamit priyāmindrasya tanvamavīvṛdhan
analyzed: madhoḥ dhārābhiḥ janayantaḥ arkam id priyām indrasya tanvam avīvṛdhan

original: RV_09.073.03.1{29} pavitravantaḥ pari vācamāsate pitaiṣāṃ pratno abhi rakṣati vratam
analyzed: pavitravantaḥ pari vācam āsate pitā eṣām pratnaḥ abhi rakṣati vratam

original: RV_09.073.03.2{29} mahaḥ samudraṃ varuṇastiro dadhe dhīrā icchekurdharuṇeṣvārabham
analyzed: mahaḥ samudram varuṇaḥ tiras dadhe dhīrāḥ id śekuḥ dharuṇeṣu ārabham

original: RV_09.073.04.1{29} sahasradhāre 'va te samasvaran divo nāke madhujihvā asaścataḥ
analyzed: sahasra dhāre vai te samasvaran divaḥ nāke madhu jihvāḥ asaścataḥ

original: RV_09.073.04.2{29} asya spaśo na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ pade-pade pāśinaḥ santi setavaḥ
analyzed: asya spaśaḥ na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ pade pade pāśinaḥ santi setavaḥ

original: RV_09.073.05.1{29} piturmāturadhyā ye samasvarannṛcā śocantaḥ sandahanto avratān
analyzed: pituḥ mātuḥ adhyā ye samasvaran ṛcā śocantaḥ sandahantaḥ avratān

original: RV_09.073.05.2{29} indradviṣṭāmapa dhamanti māyayā tvacamasiknīṃ bhūmano divas pari
analyzed: indra dviṣṭām apa dhamanti māyayā tvacam asiknīm bhūmanaḥ divaḥ pari

original: RV_09.073.06.1{30} pratnān mānādadhyā ye samasvarañchlokayantrāso rabhasasya mantavaḥ
analyzed: pratnān mānādadhyāḥ ye samasvaran śloka yantrāsaḥ rabhasasya mantavaḥ

original: RV_09.073.06.2{30} apānakṣāso badhirā ahāsata ṛtasya panthāṃ na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ
analyzed: apāna kṣāsaḥ badhirāḥ ahāsata ṛtasya panthām na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_09.073.07.1{30} sahasradhāre vitate pavitra ā vācaṃ punanti kavayo manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: sahasra dhāre vitate pavitre ā vācam punanti kavayaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_09.073.07.2{30} rudrāsa eṣāmiṣirāso adruha spaśaḥ svañcaḥ sudṛśo nṛcakṣasaḥ
analyzed: rudrāsaḥ eṣām iṣirāsaḥ adruhaḥ spaśaḥ svañcaḥ sudṛśaḥ nṛ cakṣasaḥ

original: RV_09.073.08.1{30} ṛtasya gopā na dabhāya sukratustrī ṣa pavitrā hṛdyantarā dadhe
analyzed: ṛtasya gopāḥ na dabhāya su kratuḥ trī sa pavitrā hṛdi antarā dadhe

original: RV_09.073.08.2{30} vidvān sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paśyatyavājuṣṭān vidhyati karte avratān
analyzed: vidvān sa viśvā bhuvanā abhi paśyati ava ajuṣṭān vidhyati karte avratān

original: RV_09.073.09.1{30} ṛtasya tanturvitataḥ pavitra ā jihvāyā agre varuṇasya māyayā
analyzed: ṛtasya tantuḥ vitataḥ pavitraḥ ā jihvāyāḥ agre varuṇasya māyayā

original: RV_09.073.09.2{30} dhīrāścit tat saminakṣanta āśatātrā kartamava padātyaprabhuh
analyzed: dhīrāḥ cit tat saminakṣantaḥ āśata atrā kartamava padātya prabhuh

original: RV_09.074.01.1{31} śiśurna jāto 'va cakradad vane svaryad vājyaruṣaḥ siṣāsati
analyzed: śiśuḥ na jātaḥ vaḥ cakradat vane svar yat vājī aruṣaḥ siṣāsati

original: RV_09.074.01.2{31} divo retasā sacate payovṛdhā tamīmahe sumatī śarma saprathaḥ
analyzed: divaḥ retasā sacate payaḥ vṛdhā tam īmahe sumatī śarma saprathaḥ

original: RV_09.074.02.1{31} divo ya skambho dharuṇaḥ svātata āpūrṇo aṃśuḥ paryetiviśvataḥ
analyzed: divaḥ yaḥ skambhaḥ dharuṇaḥ su ātataḥ āpūrṇaḥ aṃśuḥ paryeti viśvatas

original: RV_09.074.02.2{31} seme mahī rodasī yakṣadāvṛtā samīcīne dādhāra samiṣaḥ kaviḥ
analyzed: sa ime mahī rodasī yakṣadā āvṛtā samīcīne dādhāra samiṣaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_09.074.03.1{31} mahi psaraḥ sukṛtaṃ somyaṃ madhūrvī gavyūtiraditer{ṛ}taṃ yate
analyzed: mahi psaraḥ su kṛtam somyam madhu urvī gavyūtiḥ aditeḥ ṛtam yate

original: RV_09.074.03.2{31} īśe yo vṛṣṭerita usriyo vṛṣāpāṃ netā ya itaūtir{ṛ}gmiyaḥ
analyzed: īśe yaḥ vṛṣṭeḥ itas usriyaḥ vṛṣā apām netā yaḥ itaūtiḥ ṛgmiyaḥ

original: RV_09.074.04.1{31} ātmanvan nabho duhyate ghṛtaṃ paya ṛtasya nābhiramṛtaṃ vijāyate
analyzed: ātmanvat nabhaḥ duhyate ghṛtam payaḥ ṛtasya nābhiḥ amṛtam vijāyate

original: RV_09.074.04.2{31} samīcīnāḥ sudānavaḥ prīṇanti taṃ naro hitamava mehanti peravaḥ
analyzed: samīcīnāḥ sudānavaḥ prīṇanti tam naraḥ hitam ava mehanti peravaḥ

original: RV_09.074.05.1{31} arāvīdaṃśuḥ sacamāna ūrmiṇā devāvyaṃ manuṣe pinvatitvacam
analyzed: arāvīt aṃśuḥ sacamānaḥ ūrmiṇā devāvyam manuṣe pinvatitvacam

original: RV_09.074.05.2{31} dadhāti garbhamaditerupastha ā yena tokaṃ ca tanayaṃ ca dhāmahe
analyzed: dadhāti garbham aditeḥ upasthe ā yena tokam ca tanayam ca dhāmahe

original: RV_09.074.06.1{32} sahasradhāre 'va tā asaścatastṛtīye santu rajasi prajāvatīḥ
analyzed: sahasra dhāre vai tāḥ asaḥ catas tṛtīye santu rajasi prajāvatīḥ

original: RV_09.074.06.2{32} catasro nābho nihitā avo divo havirbharantyamṛtaṃ ghṛtaścutaḥ
analyzed: catasraḥ nābhaḥ nihitāḥ avas divaḥ haviḥ bharanti amṛtam ghṛtaścutaḥ

original: RV_09.074.07.1{32} śvetaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute yat siṣāsati somo mīḍhvānasuro veda bhūmanaḥ
analyzed: śvetam rūpam kṛṇute yat siṣāsati somaḥ mīḍhvān asuraḥ veda bhūmanaḥ

original: RV_09.074.07.2{32} dhiyā śamī sacate semabhi pravad divas kavandhamava darṣadudriṇam
analyzed: dhiyā śamī sacate semabhi pravat divaḥ kavandhamava darṣadudriṇam

original: RV_09.074.08.1{32} adha śvetaṃ kalaśaṃ gobhiraktaṃ kārṣmannā vājyakramīt sasavān
analyzed: adha śvetam kalaśam gobhiḥ aktam kārṣmannā vājī akramīt sasavān

original: RV_09.074.08.2{32} ā hinvire manasā devayantaḥ kakṣīvate śatahimāya gonām
analyzed: ā hinvire manasā devayantaḥ kakṣīvate śata himāya gonām

original: RV_09.074.09.1{32} adbhiḥ soma papṛcānasya te raso 'vyo vāraṃ vi pavamāna dhāvati
analyzed: adbhiḥ soma papṛcānasya te rasaḥ vyaḥ vāram vi pavamāna dhāvati

original: RV_09.074.09.2{32} sa mṛjyamānaḥ kavibhirmadintama svadasvendrāya pavamāna pītaye
analyzed: sa mṛjyamānaḥ kavibhiḥ madintama svadasva indrāya pavamāna pītaye

original: RV_09.075.01.1{33} abhi priyāṇi pavate canohito nāmāni yahvo adhi yeṣu vardhate
analyzed: abhi priyāṇi pavate canohitaḥ nāmāni yahvaḥ adhi yeṣu vardhate

original: RV_09.075.01.2{33} ā sūryasya bṛhato bṛhannadhi rathaṃ viṣvañcamaruhad vicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: ā sūryasya bṛhataḥ bṛhan adhi ratham viṣvañcam aruhat vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_09.075.02.1{33} ṛtasya jihvā pavate madhu priyaṃ vaktā patirdhiyo asyā adābhyaḥ
analyzed: ṛtasya jihvā pavate madhu priyam vaktā patiḥ dhiyaḥ asyāḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_09.075.02.2{33} dadhāti putraḥ pitrorapīcyaṃ nāma tṛtīyamadhi rocane divaḥ
analyzed: dadhāti putraḥ pitroḥ apīcyam nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ

original: RV_09.075.03.1{33} ava dyutānaḥ kalaśānacikradan nṛbhiryemānaḥ kośa ā hiraṇyaye
analyzed: ava dyutānaḥ kalaśān acikradat nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ kośe ā hiraṇyaye

original: RV_09.075.03.2{33} abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣatādhi tripṛṣṭha uṣaso vi rājati
analyzed: abhi īm ṛtasya dohanāḥ anūṣata adhi tri pṛṣṭhaḥ uṣasaḥ vi rājati

original: RV_09.075.04.1{33} adribhiḥ suto matibhiścanohitaḥ prarocayan rodasī mātarāśuciḥ
analyzed: adribhiḥ sutaḥ matibhiḥ canohitaḥ prarocayan rodasī mātarā aśuciḥ

original: RV_09.075.04.2{33} romāṇyavyā samayā vi dhāvati madhordhārā pinvamānā dive-dive
analyzed: romāṇyavyā samayā vi dhāvati madhordhārā pinvamānā dive dive

original: RV_09.075.05.1{33} pari soma pra dhanvā svastaye nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vāsayāśiram
analyzed: pari soma pra dhanva svastaye nṛbhiḥ punānaḥ abhi vāsaya āśiram

original: RV_09.075.05.2{33} ye te madā āhanaso vihāyasastebhirindraṃ codaya dātave magham
analyzed: ye te madāḥ āhanasaḥ vihāyasaḥ tebhiḥ indram codaya dātave magham

original: RV_09.076.01.1{01} dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso dakṣo devānāmanumādyo nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyaḥ rasaḥ dakṣaḥ devānām anumādyaḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_09.076.01.2{01} hariḥ sṛjāno atyo na satvabhirvṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣvā
analyzed: hariḥ sṛjānaḥ atyaḥ na satvabhiḥ vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣvā

original: RV_09.076.02.1{01} śūro na dhatta āyudhā gabhastyoḥ svaḥ siṣāsan rathiro gaviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: śūraḥ na dhatte āyudhā gabhastyoḥ svar siṣāsan rathiraḥ gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_09.076.02.2{01} indrasya śuṣmamīrayannapasyubhirindurhinvāno ajyate manīṣibhiḥ
analyzed: indrasya śuṣmam īrayan apasyubhiḥ induḥ hinvānaḥ ajyate manīṣibhiḥ

original: RV_09.076.03.1{01} indrasya soma pavamāna ūrmiṇā taviṣyamāṇo jaṭhareṣvāviśa
analyzed: indrasya soma pavamānaḥ ūrmiṇā taviṣyamāṇaḥ jaṭhareṣu āviśa

original: RV_09.076.03.2{01} pra ṇaḥ pinva vidyudabhreva rodasī dhiyā na vājānupa māsi śaśvataḥ
analyzed: pra naḥ pinva vidyut abhrā iva rodasī dhiyā na vājān upa māsi śaśvataḥ

original: RV_09.076.04.1{01} viśvasya rājā pavate svardṛśa ṛtasya dhītim ṛṣiṣāḷ avīvaśat
analyzed: viśvasya rājā pavate svar dṛśaḥ ṛtasya dhītim ṛṣiṣāh avīvaśat

original: RV_09.076.04.2{01} yaḥ sūryasyāsireṇa mṛjyate pitā matīnāmasamaṣṭakāvyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sūryasya asireṇa mṛjyate pitā matīnām a samaṣṭa kāvyaḥ
