original: RV_09.076.05.1{01} vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośamarṣasyapāmupasthe vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat
analyzed: vṛṣā iva yūthā pari kośam arṣasi apām upasthe vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat

original: RV_09.076.05.2{01} sa indrāya pavase matsarintamo yathā jeṣāma samithe tvotayaḥ
analyzed: saḥ indrāya pavase matsarintamaḥ yathā jeṣāma samithe tvotayaḥ

original: RV_09.077.01.1{02} eṣa pra kośe madhumānacikradadindrasya vajro vapuṣo vapuṣṭaraḥ
analyzed: eṣa pra kośe madhumān acikradat indrasya vajraḥ vapuṣaḥ vapuṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_09.077.01.2{02} abhīm ṛtasya sudughā ghṛtaścuto vāśrā arṣantipayaseva dhenavaḥ
analyzed: abhi īm ṛtasya su dughāḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ vāśrāḥ arṣanti payasā iva dhenavaḥ

original: RV_09.077.02.1{02} sa pūrvyaḥ pavate yaṃ divas pari śyeno mathāyadiṣitastiro rajaḥ
analyzed: sa pūrvyaḥ pavate yam divaḥ pari śyenaḥ mathāyat iṣitaḥ tiras rajaḥ

original: RV_09.077.02.2{02} sa madhva ā yuvate vevijāna it kṛśānorasturmanasāha bibhyuṣā
analyzed: sa madhvaḥ ā yuvate vevijānaḥ id kṛśānoḥ astuḥ manasā aha bibhyuṣā

original: RV_09.077.03.1{02} te naḥ pūrvāsa uparāsa indavo mahe vājāya dhanvantu gomate
analyzed: te naḥ pūrvāsaḥ uparāsaḥ indavaḥ mahe vājāya dhanvantu gomate

original: RV_09.077.03.2{02} īkṣeṇyāso ahyo na cāravo brahma-brahma ye jujuṣurhavir haviḥ
analyzed: īkṣeṇyāsaḥ ahyaḥ na cāravaḥ brahma brahma ye jujuṣuḥ haviḥ haviḥ

original: RV_09.077.04.1{02} ayaṃ no vidvān vanavad vanuṣyata induḥ satrācā manasā puruṣṭutaḥ
analyzed: ayam naḥ vidvān vanavat vanuṣyate induḥ satrācā manasā puruṣṭutaḥ

original: RV_09.077.04.2{02} inasya yaḥ sadane garbhamādadhe gavāmurubjamabhyarṣati vrajam
analyzed: inasya yaḥ sadane garbham ādadhe gavām urubjam abhyarṣati vrajam

original: RV_09.077.05.1{02} cakrirdivaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso mahānadabdho varuṇo hurugyate
analyzed: cakriḥ divaḥ pavate kṛtvyaḥ rasaḥ mahān adabdhaḥ varuṇaḥ hurugyate

original: RV_09.077.05.2{02} asāvi mitro vṛjaneṣu yajñiyo 'tyo na yūthe vṛṣayuḥ kanikradat
analyzed: asāvi mitraḥ vṛjaneṣu yajñiyaḥ tyaḥ na yūthe vṛṣayuḥ kanikradat

original: RV_09.078.01.1{03} pra rājā vācaṃ janayannasiṣyadadapo vasāno abhi gā iyakṣati
analyzed: pra rājā vācam janayan asiṣyadat apaḥ vasānaḥ abhi gāḥ iyakṣati

original: RV_09.078.01.2{03} gṛbhṇāti ripramavirasya tānvā śuddho devānāmupa yāti niṣkṛtam
analyzed: gṛbhṇāti ripram aviḥ asya tān vā śuddhaḥ devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_09.078.02.1{03} indrāya soma pari ṣicyase nṛbhirnṛcakṣā ūrmiḥ kavirajyase vane
analyzed: indrāya soma pari sicyase nṛbhiḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ ūrmiḥ kaviḥ ajyase vane

original: RV_09.078.02.2{03} pūrvīrhi te srutayaḥ santi yātave sahasramaśvā harayaścamūṣadaḥ
analyzed: pūrvīḥ hi te srutayaḥ santi yātave sahasram aśvāḥ harayaḥ camūṣadaḥ

original: RV_09.078.03.1{03} samudriyā apsaraso manīṣiṇamāsīnā antarabhi somamakṣaran
analyzed: samudriyāḥ apsarasaḥ manīṣiṇam āsīnāḥ antar abhi somam akṣaran

original: RV_09.078.03.2{03} tā īṃ hinvanti harmyasya sakṣaṇiṃ yācante sumnaṃ pavamānamakṣitam
analyzed: tāḥ īm hinvanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim yācante sumnam pavamānam akṣitam

original: RV_09.078.04.1{03} gojin naḥ somo rathajid dhiraṇyajit svarjidabjit pavate sahasrajit
analyzed: go jit naḥ somaḥ ratha jit hiraṇya jit svar jit abjit pavate sahasra jit

original: RV_09.078.04.2{03} yaṃ devāsaścakrire pītaye madaṃ svādiṣṭhaṃ drapsamaruṇaṃ mayobhuvam
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ cakrire pītaye madam svādiṣṭham drapsam aruṇam mayobhuvam

original: RV_09.078.05.1{03} etāni soma pavamāno asmayuḥ satyāni kṛṇvan draviṇānyarṣasi
analyzed: etāni soma pavamānaḥ asmayuḥ satyāni kṛṇvan draviṇāni arṣasi

original: RV_09.078.05.2{03} jahi śatrumantike dūrake ca ya urvīṃ gavyūtimabhayaṃ ca nas kṛdhi
analyzed: jahi śatrum antike dūrake ca yaḥ urvīm gavyūtim abhayam ca naḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_09.079.01.1{04} acodaso no dhanvantvindavaḥ pra suvānāso bṛhaddiveṣu harayaḥ
analyzed: acodasaḥ naḥ dhanvantu indavaḥ pra suvānāsaḥ bṛhaddiveṣu harayaḥ

original: RV_09.079.01.2{04} vi ca naśan na iṣo arātayo 'ryo naśanta saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ
analyzed: vi ca naśan naḥ iṣaḥ arātayaḥ ryaḥ naśanta saniṣanta naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_09.079.02.1{04} pra ṇo dhanvantvindavo madacyuto dhanā vā yebhirarvato junīmasi
analyzed: pra naḥ dhanvantu indavaḥ mada cyutaḥ dhanā vā yebhiḥ arvataḥ junīmasi

original: RV_09.079.02.2{04} tiro martasya kasya cit parihvṛtiṃ vayaṃ dhanāni viśvadhā bharemahi
analyzed: tiras martasya kasya cit parihvṛtim vayam dhanāni viśvadhā bharemahi

original: RV_09.079.03.1{04} uta svasyā arātyā arirhi ṣa utānyasyā arātyā vṛko hi ṣaḥ
analyzed: uta svasyāḥ arātyāḥ ariḥ hi sa uta anyasyāḥ arātyāḥ vṛkaḥ hi saḥ

original: RV_09.079.03.2{04} dhanvan na tṛṣṇā samarīta tānabhi soma jahipavamāna durādhyaḥ
analyzed: dhanvan na tṛṣṇā samarīta tān abhi soma jahi pavamāna durādhyaḥ

original: RV_09.079.04.1{04} divi te nābhā paramo ya ādade pṛthivyāste ruruhuḥ sānavikṣipaḥ
analyzed: divi te nābhā paramaḥ yaḥ ādade pṛthivyāḥ te ruruhuḥ sāna vikṣipaḥ

original: RV_09.079.04.2{04} adrayastvā bapsati goradhi tvacyapsu tvā hastairduduhurmanīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: adrayaḥ tvā bapsati goḥ adhi tvaci apsu tvā hastaiḥ duduhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_09.079.05.1{04} evā ta indo subhvaṃ supeśasaṃ rasaṃ tuñjanti prathamā abhiśriyaḥ
analyzed: eva te indo su bhvam supeśasam rasam tuñjanti prathamāḥ abhiśriyaḥ

original: RV_09.079.05.2{04} nidaṃ-nidaṃ pavamāna ni tāriṣa āviste śuṣmo bhavatu priyo madaḥ
analyzed: nidaṃnidam pavamāna ni tāriṣaḥ āvis te śuṣmaḥ bhavatu priyaḥ madaḥ

original: RV_09.080.01.1{05} somasya dhārā pavate nṛcakṣasa ṛtena devān havate divas pari
analyzed: somasya dhārā pavate nṛ cakṣasaḥ ṛtena devān havate divaḥ pari

original: RV_09.080.01.2{05} bṛhaspate ravathenā vi didyute samudrāso na savanāni vivyacuḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspate ravathena vi didyute samudrāsaḥ na savanāni vivyacuḥ

original: RV_09.080.02.1{05} yaṃ tvā vājinnaghnyā abhyanūṣatāyohataṃ yonimā rohasi dyumān
analyzed: yam tvā vājin aghnyāḥ abhyanūṣata ayaḥ hatam yonim ā rohasi dyumān

original: RV_09.080.02.2{05} maghonāmāyuḥ pratiran mahi śrava indrāya somapavase vṛṣā madaḥ
analyzed: maghonām āyuḥ pratirat mahi śravaḥ indrāya soma pavase vṛṣā madaḥ

original: RV_09.080.03.1{05} endrasya kukṣā pavate madintama ūrjaṃ vasānaḥ śravase sumaṅgalaḥ
analyzed: ā indrasya kukṣā pavate madintamaḥ ūrjam vasānaḥ śravase su maṅgalaḥ

original: RV_09.080.03.2{05} pratyaṃ sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paprathe krīḷan hariratyaḥ syandate vṛṣā
analyzed: pratyam sa viśvā bhuvanā abhi paprathe krīḍan hariratyaḥ syandate vṛṣā

original: RV_09.080.04.1{05} taṃ tvā devebhyo madhumattamaṃ naraḥ sahasradhāraṃ duhate daśa kṣipaḥ
analyzed: tam tvā devebhyaḥ madhumattamam naraḥ sahasra dhāram duhate daśa kṣipaḥ

original: RV_09.080.04.2{05} nṛbhiḥ soma pracyuto grāvabhiḥ suto viśvāndevānā pavasvā sahasrajit
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ soma pracyutaḥ grāvabhiḥ sutaḥ viśvān devān ā pavasva sahasra jit

original: RV_09.080.05.1{05} taṃ tvā hastino madhumantamadribhirduhantyapsu vṛṣabhandaśa kṣipaḥ
analyzed: tam tvā hastinaḥ madhumantam adribhiḥ duhanti apsu vṛṣabhan daśa kṣipaḥ

original: RV_09.080.05.2{05} indraṃ soma mādayan daivyaṃ janaṃ sindhorivormiḥ pavamāno arṣasi
analyzed: indram soma mādayan daivyam janam sindhoḥ iva ūrmiḥ pavamānaḥ arṣasi

original: RV_09.081.01.1{06} pra somasya pavamānasyormaya indrasya yanti jaṭharaṃ supeśasaḥ
analyzed: pra somasya pavamānasya ūrmayaḥ indrasya yanti jaṭharam supeśasaḥ

original: RV_09.081.01.2{06} dadhnā yadīmunnītā yaśasā gavāṃ dānāya śūramudamandiṣuḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: dadhnā yadi īm unnītāḥ yaśasā gavām dānāya śūram udamandiṣuḥ sutāḥ

original: RV_09.081.02.1{06} achā hi somaḥ kalaśānasiṣyadadatyo na voḷhā raghuvartanirvṛṣā
analyzed: achā hi somaḥ kalaśān asiṣyat adatyaḥ na voḍhā raghu varta nirvṛṣā

original: RV_09.081.02.2{06} athā devānāmubhayasya janmano vidvānaśnotyamuta itaśca yat
analyzed: athā devānām ubhayasya janmanaḥ vidvān aśnoti amutas itas ca yat

original: RV_09.081.03.1{06} ā naḥ soma pavamānaḥ kirā vasvindo bhava maghavā rādhaso mahaḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ soma pavamānaḥ kira vasu indo bhava maghavā rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_09.081.03.2{06} śikṣā vayodho vasave su cetunā mā no gayamāre asmat parā sicaḥ
analyzed: śikṣa vayodhaḥ vasave su cetunā mā naḥ gayamāre asmat parā sicaḥ

original: RV_09.081.04.1{06} ā naḥ pūṣā pavamānaḥ surātayo mitro gachantu varuṇaḥ sajoṣasaḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ pūṣā pavamānaḥ su rātayaḥ mitraḥ gacchantu varuṇaḥ sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_09.081.04.2{06} bṛhaspatirmaruto vāyuraśvinā tvaṣṭā savitā suyamā sarasvatī
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ marutaḥ vāyuḥ aśvinā tvaṣṭā savitā su yamā sarasvatī

original: RV_09.081.05.1{06} ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminve aryamā devo aditirvidhātā
analyzed: ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminve aryamā devaḥ aditiḥ vidhātā

original: RV_09.081.05.2{06} bhago nṛśaṃsa urvantarikṣaṃ viśve devāḥ pavamānaṃjuṣanta
analyzed: bhagaḥ nṛśaṃsaḥ uru antarikṣam viśve devāḥ pavamānam juṣanta

original: RV_09.082.01.1{07} asāvi somo aruṣo vṛṣā harī rājeva dasmo abhi gā acikradat
analyzed: asāvi somaḥ aruṣaḥ vṛṣā hariḥ rājā iva dasmaḥ abhi gāḥ acikradat

original: RV_09.082.01.2{07} punāno vāraṃ paryetyavyayaṃ śyeno na yoniṃ ghṛtavantamāsadam
analyzed: punānaḥ vāram paryeti avyayam śyenaḥ na yonim ghṛtavantam āsadam

original: RV_09.082.02.1{07} kavirvedhasyā paryeṣi māhinamatyo na mṛṣṭo abhi vājamarṣasi
analyzed: kaviḥ vedhasyā paryeṣi māhina matyaḥ na mṛṣṭaḥ abhi vājam arṣasi

original: RV_09.082.02.2{07} apasedhan duritā soma mṛḷaya ghṛtaṃ vasānaḥ pariyāsi nirṇijam
analyzed: apasedhan duritā soma mṛḍaya ghṛtam vasānaḥ pariyāsi nirṇijam

original: RV_09.082.03.1{07} parjanyaḥ pitā mahiṣasya parṇino nābhā pṛthivyā giriṣukṣayaṃ dadhe
analyzed: parjanyaḥ pitā mahiṣasya parṇinaḥ nābhā pṛthivyāḥ giriṣu kṣayam dadhe

original: RV_09.082.03.2{07} svasāra āpo abhi gā utāsaran saṃ grāvabhirnasate vīte adhvare
analyzed: svasāraḥ āpaḥ abhi gāḥ uta asaran sam grāvabhiḥ nasate vīte adhvare

original: RV_09.082.04.1{07} jāyeva patyāvadhi śeva maṃhase pajrāyā garbha śṛṇuhi bravīmi te
analyzed: jāyā iva patyau adhi śeva maṃhase pajrāyāḥ garbha śṛṇuhi bravīmi te

original: RV_09.082.04.2{07} antarvāṇīṣu pra carā su jīvase 'nindyo vṛjane soma jāgṛhi
analyzed: antarvāṇīṣu pra cara su jīvase nindyaḥ vṛjane soma jāgṛhi

original: RV_09.082.05.1{07} yathā pūrvebhyaḥ śatasā amṛdhraḥ sahasrasāḥ paryayā vājamindo
analyzed: yathā pūrvebhyaḥ śata sāḥ amṛdhraḥ sahasra sāḥ paryayāḥ vājamindo

original: RV_09.082.05.2{07} evā pavasva suvitāya navyase tava vratamanvāpaḥ sacante
analyzed: eva pavasva suvitāya navyase tava vratam anu āpaḥ sacante

original: RV_09.083.01.1{08} pavitraṃ te vitataṃ brahmaṇas pate prabhurgātrāṇi paryeṣiviśvataḥ
analyzed: pavitram te vitatam brahmaṇas pate prabhuḥ gātrāṇi paryeṣi viśvatas

original: RV_09.083.01.2{08} ataptatanūrna tadāmo aśnute śṛtāsa id vahantastat samāśata
analyzed: a tapta tanūḥ na tadā āmaḥ aśnute śṛtāsaḥ id vahantaḥ tat samāśata

original: RV_09.083.02.1{08} tapoṣ pavitraṃ vitataṃ divas pade śocanto asya tantavo vyasthiran
analyzed: tapoḥ pavitram vitatam divaḥ pade śocantaḥ asya tantavaḥ vyasthiran

original: RV_09.083.02.2{08} avantyasya pavītāramāśavo divas pṛṣṭhamadhitiṣṭhanti cetasā
analyzed: avanti asya pavītāram āśavaḥ divaḥ pṛṣṭham adhitiṣṭhanti cetasā

original: RV_09.083.03.1{08} arūrucaduṣasaḥ pṛśniragriya ukṣā bibharti bhuvanāni vājayuḥ
analyzed: arūrucat uṣasaḥ pṛśniḥ agriyaḥ ukṣā bibharti bhuvanāni vājayuḥ

original: RV_09.083.03.2{08} māyāvino mamire asya māyayā nṛcakṣasaḥ pitaro garbhamā dadhuḥ
analyzed: māyāvinaḥ mamire asya māyayā nṛ cakṣasaḥ pitaraḥ garbhamā dadhuḥ

original: RV_09.083.04.1{08} gandharva itthā padamasya rakṣati pāti devānāṃ janimānyadbhutaḥ
analyzed: gandharvaḥ itthā padam asya rakṣati pāti devānām janimāni adbhutaḥ

original: RV_09.083.04.2{08} gṛbhṇāti ripuṃ nidhayā nidhāpatiḥ sukṛttamā madhuno bhakṣamāśata
analyzed: gṛbhṇāti ripum nidhayā nidhā patiḥ su kṛttamāḥ madhunaḥ bhakṣam āśata

original: RV_09.083.05.1{08} havirhaviṣmo mahi sadma daivyaṃ nabho vasānaḥ pari yāsyadhvaram
analyzed: haviḥ haviṣmas mahi sadma daivyam nabhaḥ vasānaḥ pari yāsi adhvaram

original: RV_09.083.05.2{08} rājā pavitraratho vājamāruhaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭirjayasi śravo bṛhat
analyzed: rājā pavitra rathaḥ vājam āruhaḥ sahasra bhṛṣṭiḥ jayasi śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_09.084.01.1{09} pavasva devamādano vicarṣaṇirapsā indrāya varuṇāya vāyave
analyzed: pavasva deva mādanaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ apsāḥ indrāya varuṇāya vāyave

original: RV_09.084.01.2{09} kṛdhī no adya varivaḥ svastimadurukṣitau gṛṇīhi daivyaṃ janam
analyzed: kṛdhī naḥ adya varivaḥ svastimat uru kṣitau gṛṇīhi daivyam janam

original: RV_09.084.02.1{09} ā yastasthau bhuvanānyamartyo viśvāni somaḥ pari tānyarṣati
analyzed: ā yaḥ tasthau bhuvanāni amartyaḥ viśvāni somaḥ pari tāni arṣati

original: RV_09.084.02.2{09} kṛṇvan saṃcṛtaṃ vicṛtamabhiṣṭaya induḥ siṣaktyuṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ
analyzed: kṛṇvan saṃcṛtam vicṛtam abhiṣṭaye induḥ siṣakti uṣasam na sūryaḥ

original: RV_09.084.03.1{09} ā yo gobhiḥ sṛjyata oṣadhīṣvā devānāṃ sumna iṣayannupāvasuḥ
analyzed: ā yaḥ gobhiḥ sṛjyate oṣadhīṣvā devānām sumne iṣayan upāvasuḥ

original: RV_09.084.03.2{09} ā vidyutā pavate dhārayā suta indraṃ somo mādayan daivyaṃ janam
analyzed: ā vidyutā pavate dhārayā sutaḥ indram somaḥ mādayan daivyam janam

original: RV_09.084.04.1{09} eṣa sya somaḥ pavate sahasrajid dhinvāno vācamiṣirāmuṣarbudham
analyzed: eṣa sya somaḥ pavate sahasra jit dhinvānaḥ vācam iṣirām uṣarbudham

original: RV_09.084.04.2{09} induḥ samudramudiyarti vāyubhirendrasya hārdikalaśeṣu sīdati
analyzed: induḥ samudram udiyarti vāyubhiḥ indrasya hārdi kalaśeṣu sīdati

original: RV_09.084.05.1{09} abhi tyaṃ gāvaḥ payasā payovṛdhaṃ somaṃ śrīṇanti matibhiḥ svarvidam
analyzed: abhi tyam gāvaḥ payasā payaḥ vṛdham somam śrīṇanti matibhiḥ svar vidam

original: RV_09.084.05.2{09} dhanaṃjayaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso vipraḥ kaviḥkāvyenā svarcanāḥ
analyzed: dhanaṃjayaḥ pavate kṛtvyaḥ rasaḥ vipraḥ kaviḥ kāvyena svar canāḥ

original: RV_09.085.01.1{10} indrāya soma suṣutaḥ pari sravāpāmīvā bhavatu rakṣasā saha
analyzed: indrāya soma suṣutaḥ pari srava apa amīvā bhavatu rakṣasā saha

original: RV_09.085.01.2{10} mā te rasasya matsata dvayāvino draviṇasvanta iha santvindavaḥ
analyzed: mā te rasasya matsata dvayāvinaḥ draviṇasvantaḥ iha santu indavaḥ

original: RV_09.085.02.1{10} asmān samarye pavamāna codaya dakṣo devānāmasi hi priyo madaḥ
analyzed: asmān samarye pavamāna codaya dakṣaḥ devānām asi hi priyaḥ madaḥ

original: RV_09.085.02.2{10} jahi śatrūnrabhyā bhandanāyataḥ pibendra somamava no mṛdho jahi
analyzed: jahi śatrūn rabhyā bhandanāyataḥ piba indra somam ava naḥ mṛdhaḥ jahi

original: RV_09.085.03.1{10} adabdha indo pavase madintama ātmendrasya bhavasi dhāsiruttamaḥ
analyzed: adabdhaḥ indo pavase madintamaḥ ātmā indrasya bhavasi dhāsiḥ uttamaḥ

original: RV_09.085.03.2{10} abhi svaranti bahavo manīṣiṇo rājānamasya bhuvanasyaniṃsate
analyzed: abhi svaranti bahavaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ rājānam asya bhuvanasya niṃsate

original: RV_09.085.04.1{10} sahasraṇīthaḥ śatadhāro adbhuta indrāyenduḥ pavate kāmyaṃ madhu
analyzed: sahasraṇīthaḥ śata dhāraḥ adbhutaḥ indrāya induḥ pavate kāmyam madhu

original: RV_09.085.04.2{10} jayan kṣetramabhyarṣā jayannapa uruṃ no gātuṃ kṛṇu soma mīḍhvaḥ
analyzed: jayan kṣetram abhyarṣa jayan apaḥ urum naḥ gātum kṛṇu soma mīḍhvaḥ

original: RV_09.085.05.1{10} kanikradat kalaśe gobhirajyase vyavyayaṃ samayā vāramarṣasi
analyzed: kanikradat kalaśe gobhiḥ ajyase vi avyayam samayā vāram arṣasi

original: RV_09.085.05.2{10} marmṛjyamāno atyo na sānasirindrasya soma jaṭhare samakṣaraḥ
analyzed: marmṛjyamānaḥ atyaḥ na sānasiḥ indrasya soma jaṭhare samakṣaraḥ

original: RV_09.085.06.1{10} svāduḥ pavasva divyāya janmane svādurindrāya suhavītunāmne
analyzed: svāduḥ pavasva divyāya janmane svāduḥ indrāya suhavītu nāmne

original: RV_09.085.06.2{10} svādurmitrāya varuṇāya vāyave bṛhaspataye madhumānadābhyaḥ
analyzed: svāduḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave bṛhaspataye madhu māna dābhyaḥ

original: RV_09.085.07.1{11} atyaṃ mṛjanti kalaśe daśa kṣipaḥ pra viprāṇāṃ matayo vāca īrate
analyzed: atyam mṛjanti kalaśe daśa kṣipaḥ pra viprāṇām matayaḥ vācaḥ īrate

original: RV_09.085.07.2{11} pavamānā abhyarṣanti suṣṭutimendraṃ viśantimadirāsa indavaḥ
analyzed: pavamānāḥ abhyarṣanti suṣṭutim indram viśanti madirāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_09.085.08.1{11} pavamāno abhyarṣā suvīryamurvīṃ gavyūtiṃ mahi śarma saprathaḥ
analyzed: pavamānaḥ abhyarṣa su vīryam urvīm gavyūtim mahi śarma saprathaḥ

original: RV_09.085.08.2{11} mākirno asya pariṣūtirīśatendo jayema tvayādhanaṃ-dhanam
analyzed: mākir naḥ asya pariṣūtiḥ īśata indo jayema tvayā adhanaṃdhanam

original: RV_09.085.09.1{11} adhi dyāmasthād vṛṣabho vicakṣaṇo 'rūrucad vi divo rocanā kaviḥ
analyzed: adhi dyām asthāt vṛṣabhaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ rūrucat vi divaḥ rocanā kaviḥ

original: RV_09.085.09.2{11} rājā pavitramatyeti roruvad divaḥ pīyūṣanduhate nṛcakṣasaḥ
analyzed: rājā pavitram atyeti roruvat divaḥ pīyūṣan duhate nṛ cakṣasaḥ

original: RV_09.085.10.1{11} divo nāke madhujihvā asaścato venā duhantyukṣaṇaṃ giriṣṭhām
analyzed: divaḥ nāke madhu jihvāḥ asaścataḥ venāḥ duhanti ukṣaṇam giriṣṭhām

original: RV_09.085.10.2{11} apsu drapsaṃ vāvṛdhānaṃ samudra ā sindhorūrmāmadhumantaṃ pavitra ā
analyzed: apsu drapsam vāvṛdhānam samudre ā sindhoḥ ūrmā madhumantam pavitre ā

original: RV_09.085.11.1{11} nāke suparṇamupapaptivāṃsaṃ giro venānāmakṛpanta pūrvīḥ
analyzed: nāke suparṇam upapaptivāṃsam giraḥ venānām akṛpanta pūrvīḥ

original: RV_09.085.11.2{11} śiśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnataṃ hiraṇyayaṃ śakunaṃ kṣāmaṇi sthām
analyzed: śiśum rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam hiraṇyayam śakunam kṣāmaṇi sthām

original: RV_09.085.12.1{11} ūrdhvo gandharvo adhi nāke asthād viśvā rūpā praticakṣāṇo asya
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ gandharvaḥ adhi nāke asthāt viśvā rūpā praticakṣāṇaḥ asya

original: RV_09.085.12.2{11} bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā vyadyaut prārūrucad rodasī mātarā śuciḥ
analyzed: bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā vyadyaut prārūrucat rodasī mātarā śuciḥ

original: RV_09.086.01.1{12} pra ta āśavaḥ pavamāna dhījavo madā arṣanti raghujā iva tmanā
analyzed: pra te āśavaḥ pavamāna dhī javaḥ madāḥ arṣanti raghu jāḥ iva tmanā

original: RV_09.086.01.2{12} divyāḥ suparṇā madhumanta indavo madintamāsaḥ pari kośamāsate
analyzed: divyāḥ suparṇāḥ madhumantaḥ indavaḥ madintamāsaḥ pari kośam āsate

original: RV_09.086.02.1{12} pra te madāso madirāsa āśavo 'sṛkṣata rathyāso yathā pṛthak
analyzed: pra te madāsaḥ madirāsaḥ āśavaḥ sṛkṣata rathyāsaḥ yathā pṛthak

original: RV_09.086.02.2{12} dhenurna vatsaṃ payasābhi vajriṇamindramindavo madhumanta ūrmayaḥ
analyzed: dhenuḥ na vatsam payasā abhi vajriṇam indram indavaḥ madhumantaḥ ūrmayaḥ

original: RV_09.086.03.1{12} atyo na hiyāno abhi vājamarṣa svarvit kośaṃ divo adrimātaram
analyzed: atyaḥ na hiyānaḥ abhi vāja marṣa svar vid kośam divaḥ adri mātaram

original: RV_09.086.03.2{12} vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avyaye somaḥ punāna indriyāya dhāyase
analyzed: vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avyaye somaḥ punānaḥ indriyāya dhāyase

original: RV_09.086.04.1{12} pra ta āśvinīḥ pavamāna dhījuvo divyā asṛgran payasā dharīmaṇi
analyzed: pra te āśvinīḥ pavamāna dhī juvaḥ divyāḥ asṛgran payasā dharīmaṇi

original: RV_09.086.04.2{12} prāntar{ṛ}ṣayaḥ sthāvirīrasṛkṣata ye tvā mṛjanty ṛṣiṣāṇa vedhasaḥ
analyzed: prāntar ṛṣayaḥ sthāvirīrasṛkṣata ye tvā mṛjanti ṛṣiṣāṇa vedhasaḥ

original: RV_09.086.05.1{12} viśvā dhāmāni viśvacakṣa ṛbhvasaḥ prabhoste sataḥ pariyanti ketavaḥ
analyzed: viśvā dhāmāni viśva cakṣaḥ ṛbhvasaḥ prabhoḥ te sataḥ pariyanti ketavaḥ

original: RV_09.086.05.2{12} vyānaśiḥ pavase soma dharmabhiḥ patirviśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi
analyzed: vyānaśiḥ pavase soma dharmabhiḥ patiḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi

original: RV_09.086.06.1{13} ubhayataḥ pavamānasya raśmayo dhruvasya sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ
analyzed: ubhayatas pavamānasya raśmayaḥ dhruvasya sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ

original: RV_09.086.06.2{13} yadī pavitre adhi mṛjyate hariḥ sattā ni yonā kalaśeṣu sīdati
analyzed: yadī pavitre adhi mṛjyate hariḥ sattā ni yonā kalaśeṣu sīdati

original: RV_09.086.07.1{13} yajñasya ketuḥ pavate svadhvaraḥ somo devānāmupa yāti niṣkṛtam
analyzed: yajñasya ketuḥ pavate su adhvaraḥ somaḥ devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_09.086.07.2{13} sahasradhāraḥ pari kośamarṣati vṛṣā pavitramatyeti roruvat
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ pari kośam arṣati vṛṣā pavitram atyeti roruvat

original: RV_09.086.08.1{13} rājā samudraṃ nadyo vi gāhate 'pāmūrmiṃ sacate sindhuṣu śritaḥ
analyzed: rājā samudram nadyaḥ vi gāhate pām ūrmim sacate sindhuṣu śritaḥ

original: RV_09.086.08.2{13} adhyasthāt sānu pavamāno avyayaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā dharuṇo maho divaḥ
analyzed: adhyasthāt sānu pavamānaḥ avyayam nābhā pṛthivyāḥ dharuṇaḥ mahaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_09.086.09.1{13} divo na sānu stanayannacikradad dyauśca yasya pṛthivī ca dharmabhiḥ
analyzed: divaḥ na sānu stanayan acikradat dyauḥ ca yasya pṛthivī ca dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_09.086.09.2{13} indrasya sakhyaṃ pavate vivevidat somaḥ punānaḥkalaśeṣu sīdati
analyzed: indrasya sakhyam pavate vivevidat somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati

original: RV_09.086.10.1{13} jyotiryajñasya pavate madhu priyaṃ pitā devānāṃ janitā vibhūvasuḥ
analyzed: jyotiḥ yajñasya pavate madhu priyam pitā devānām janitā vibhūvasuḥ

original: RV_09.086.10.2{13} dadhāti ratnaṃ svadhayorapīcyaṃ madintamo matsara indriyo rasaḥ
analyzed: dadhāti ratnam svadhayoḥ apīcyam madintamaḥ matsaraḥ indriyaḥ rasaḥ

original: RV_09.086.11.1{14} abhikrandan kalaśaṃ vājyarṣati patirdivaḥ śatadhāro vicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: abhikrandan kalaśam vājī arṣati patiḥ divaḥ śata dhāraḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_09.086.11.2{14} harirmitrasya sadaneṣu sīdati marmṛjāno 'vibhiḥsindhubhirvṛṣā
analyzed: hariḥ mitrasya sadaneṣu sīdati marmṛjānaḥ vibhiḥ sindhubhiḥ vṛṣā

original: RV_09.086.12.1{14} agre sindhūnāṃ pavamāno arṣatyagre vāco agriyo goṣu gachati
analyzed: agre sindhūnām pavamānaḥ arṣati agre vācaḥ agriyaḥ goṣu gacchati

original: RV_09.086.12.2{14} agre vājasya bhajate mahādhanaṃ svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyate vṛṣā
analyzed: agre vājasya bhajate mahā dhanam su āyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyate vṛṣā

original: RV_09.086.13.1{14} ayaṃ matavāñchakuno yathā hito 'vye sasāra pavamāna ūrmiṇā
analyzed: ayam matavān śakunaḥ yathā hitaḥ vye sasāra pavamānaḥ ūrmiṇā

original: RV_09.086.13.2{14} tava kratvā rodasī antarā kave śucirdhiyā pavate soma indra te
analyzed: tava kratvā rodasī antarā kave śuciḥ dhiyā pavate somaḥ indra te

original: RV_09.086.14.1{14} drāpiṃ vasāno yajato divispṛśamantarikṣaprā bhuvaneṣvarpitaḥ
analyzed: drāpim vasānaḥ yajataḥ divispṛśam antarikṣa prāḥ bhuvaneṣu arpitaḥ

original: RV_09.086.14.2{14} svarjajñāno nabhasābhyakramīt pratnamasya pitaramā vivāsati
analyzed: svar jajñānaḥ nabhasā abhyakramīt pratnam asya pitaramā vivāsati

original: RV_09.086.15.1{14} so asya viśe mahi śarma yachati yo asya dhāma prathamaṃ vyānaśe
analyzed: saḥ asya viśe mahi śarma yacchati yaḥ asya dhāma prathamam vyānaśe

original: RV_09.086.15.2{14} padaṃ yadasya parame vyomanyato viśvā abhi saṃyāti saṃyataḥ
analyzed: padam yat asya parame vyomani atas viśvāḥ abhi saṃyāti saṃyataḥ

original: RV_09.086.16.1{15} pro ayāsīdindurindrasya niṣkṛtaṃ sakhā sakhyurna pra mināti saṃgiram
analyzed: pra u ayāsīt induḥ indrasya niṣkṛtam sakhā sakhyuḥ na pra mināti saṃgiram

original: RV_09.086.16.2{15} marya iva yuvatibhiḥ samarṣati somaḥ kalaśe śatayāmnā pathā
analyzed: maryaḥ iva yuvatibhiḥ samarṣati somaḥ kalaśe śata yāmnā pathā

original: RV_09.086.17.1{15} pra vo dhiyo mandrayuvo vipanyuvaḥ panasyuvaḥ saṃvasaneṣvakramuḥ
analyzed: pra vaḥ dhiyaḥ mandrayuvaḥ vipanyuvaḥ panasyuvaḥ saṃvasaneṣu akramuḥ

original: RV_09.086.17.2{15} somaṃ manīṣā abhyanūṣata stubho 'bhi dhenavaḥ payasemaśiśrayuḥ
analyzed: somam manīṣāḥ abhyanūṣata stubhaḥ bhi dhenavaḥ payasā imā aśiśrayuḥ

original: RV_09.086.18.1{15} ā naḥ soma saṃyataṃ pipyuśīmiṣamindo pavasva pavamānoasridham
analyzed: ā naḥ soma saṃyatam pipyuśīmiṣam indo pavasva

original: RV_09.086.18.2{15} yā no dohate trirahannasaścuṣī kṣumad vājavan madhumad suvīryam
analyzed: yā naḥ dohate kṣumat vājavat madhumat su vīryam

original: RV_09.086.19.1{15} vṛṣā matīnāṃ pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ somo ahnaḥ pratarītoṣaso divaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā matīnām pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ somaḥ ahnaḥ pratarītā uṣasaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_09.086.19.2{15} krāṇā sindhūnāṃ kalaśānavīvaśadindrasya hārdyāviśan manīṣibhiḥ
analyzed: krāṇā sindhūnām kalaśān avīvaśat indrasya hārdī āviśat manīṣibhiḥ

original: RV_09.086.20.1{15} manīṣibhiḥ pavate pūrvyaḥ kavirnṛbhiryataḥ pari kośānacikradat
analyzed: manīṣibhiḥ pavate pūrvyaḥ kaviḥ nṛbhiḥ yatas pari kośān acikradat

original: RV_09.086.20.2{15} tritasya nāma janayan madhu kṣaradindrasya vāyoḥ sakhyāya kartave
analyzed: tritasya nāma janayat madhu kṣarat indrasya vāyoḥ sakhyāya kartave

original: RV_09.086.21.1{16} ayaṃ punāna uṣaso vi rocayadayaṃ sindhubhyo abhavadu lokakṛt
analyzed: ayam punānaḥ uṣasaḥ vi rocayat ayam sindhubhyaḥ abhavat u loka kṛt

original: RV_09.086.21.2{16} ayaṃ triḥ sapta duduhāna āśiraṃ somo hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ
analyzed: ayam tris sapta duduhānaḥ āśiram somaḥ hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ

original: RV_09.086.22.1{16} pavasva soma divyeṣu dhāmasu sṛjāna indo kalaśe pavitra ā
analyzed: pavasva soma divyeṣu dhāmasu sṛjānaḥ indo kalaśe pavitre ā

original: RV_09.086.22.2{16} sīdannindrasya jaṭhare kanikradan nṛbhiryataḥ sūryamārohayo divi
analyzed: sīdan indrasya jaṭhare kanikradan nṛbhiḥ yatas sūryam ārohayaḥ divi

original: RV_09.086.23.1{16} adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavase pavitra ā indavindrasya jaṭhareṣvāviśan
analyzed: adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavase pavitre ā indo indrasya jaṭhareṣu āviśan

original: RV_09.086.23.2{16} tvaṃ nṛcakṣā abhavo vicakṣaṇa soma gotramaṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇorapa
analyzed: tvam nṛ cakṣāḥ abhavaḥ vicakṣaṇa soma gotram aṅgirobhyaḥ vṛṇoḥ apa

original: RV_09.086.24.1{16} tvāṃ soma pavamānaṃ svādhyo 'nu viprāso amadannavasyavaḥ
analyzed: tvām soma pavamānam su ādhyaḥ nu viprāsaḥ amadan avasyavaḥ

original: RV_09.086.24.2{16} tvāṃ suparṇa ābharad divas parīndo viśvābhirmatibhiḥ pariṣkṛtam
analyzed: tvām suparṇaḥ ābharat divaḥ pari indo viśvābhiḥ matibhiḥ pariṣkṛtam

original: RV_09.086.25.1{16} avye punānaṃ pari vāra ūrmiṇā hariṃ navante abhi sapta dhenavaḥ
analyzed: avye punānam pari vāre ūrmiṇā harim navante abhi sapta dhenavaḥ

original: RV_09.086.25.2{16} apāmupasthe adhyāyavaḥ kavim ṛtasya yonā mahiṣā aheṣata
analyzed: apām upasthe adhyāyavaḥ kavim ṛtasya yonā mahiṣāḥ aheṣata

original: RV_09.086.26.1{17} induḥ punāno ati gāhate mṛdho viśvāni kṛṇvan supathāni yajyave
analyzed: induḥ punānaḥ ati gāhate mṛdhaḥ viśvāni kṛṇvan su pathāni yajyave

original: RV_09.086.26.2{17} gāḥ kṛṇvāno nirṇijaṃ haryataḥ kaviratyo na krīḷan pari vāramarṣati
analyzed: gāḥ kṛṇvānaḥ nirṇijam haryataḥ kaviḥ atyaḥ na krīḍan pari vāram arṣati

original: RV_09.086.27.1{17} asaścataḥ śatadhārā abhiśriyo hariṃ navante 'va tā udanyuvaḥ
analyzed: asaścataḥ śata dhārāḥ abhiśriyaḥ harim navante vai tāḥ udanyuvaḥ

original: RV_09.086.27.2{17} kṣipo mṛjanti pari gobhirāvṛtaṃ tṛtīye pṛṣṭhe adhi rocane divaḥ
analyzed: kṣipaḥ mṛjanti pari gobhiḥ āvṛtam tṛtīye pṛṣṭhe adhi rocane divaḥ

original: RV_09.086.28.1{17} tavemāḥ prajā divyasya retasastvaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi
analyzed: tava imāḥ prajāḥ divyasya retasaḥ tvam viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi

original: RV_09.086.28.2{17} athedaṃ viśvaṃ pavamāna te vaśe tvamindo prathamodhāmadhā asi
analyzed: atha idam viśvam pavamāna te vaśe tvam indo prathamaḥ ūdhāma dhāḥ asi

original: RV_09.086.29.1{17} tvaṃ samudro asi viśvavit kave tavemāḥ pañca pradiśo vidharmaṇi
analyzed: tvam samudraḥ asi viśva vid kave tava imāḥ pañca pradiśaḥ vidharmaṇi

original: RV_09.086.29.2{17} tvaṃ dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāti jabhriṣe tava jyotīṃṣi pavamāna sūryaḥ
analyzed: tvam dyām ca pṛthivīm ca ati jabhriṣe tava jyotīṃṣi pavamāna sūryaḥ

original: RV_09.086.30.1{17} tvaṃ pavitre rajaso vidharmaṇi devebhyaḥ soma pavamāna pūyase
analyzed: tvam pavitre rajasaḥ vidharmaṇi devebhyaḥ soma pavamāna pūyase

original: RV_09.086.30.2{17} tvāmuśijaḥ prathamā agṛbhṇata tubhyemā viśvā bhuvanāni yemire
analyzed: tvām uśijaḥ prathamāḥ agṛbhṇata tubhya imā viśvā bhuvanāni yemire

original: RV_09.086.31.1{18} pra rebha etyati vāramavyayaṃ vṛṣā vaneṣvava cakradaddhariḥ
analyzed: pra rebhaḥ eti ati vāram avyayam vṛṣā vaneṣu ava cakradat hariḥ

original: RV_09.086.31.2{18} saṃ dhītayo vāvaśānā anūṣata śiśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam
analyzed: sam dhītayaḥ vāvaśānāḥ anūṣata śiśum rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam

original: RV_09.086.32.1{18} sa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ pari vyata tantuṃ tanvānastrivṛtaṃyathā vide
analyzed: sa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ pari vyata tantum tanvānaḥ trivṛtam yathā vide

original: RV_09.086.32.2{18} nayannṛtasya praśiṣo navīyasīḥ patirjanīnāmupa yāti niṣkṛtam
analyzed: nayan nṛtasya praśiṣaḥ navīyasīḥ patiḥ janīnām upa yāti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_09.086.33.1{18} rājā sindhūnāṃ pavate patirdiva ṛtasya yāti pathibhiḥ kanikradat
analyzed: rājā sindhūnām pavate patiḥ divaḥ ṛtasya yāti pathibhiḥ kanikradat

original: RV_09.086.33.2{18} sahasradhāraḥ pari ṣicyate hariḥ punāno vācaṃ janayannupāvasuḥ
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ pari sicyate hariḥ punānaḥ vācam janayan upāvasuḥ

original: RV_09.086.34.1{18} pavamāna mahyarṇo vi dhāvasi sūro na citro avyayāni pavyayā
analyzed: pavamāna mahi arṇaḥ vi dhāvasi sūraḥ na citraḥ avyayāni pavyayā

original: RV_09.086.34.2{18} gabhastipūto nṛbhiradribhiḥ suto mahe vājāya dhanyāya dhanvasi
analyzed: gabhasti pūtaḥ nṛbhiḥ adribhiḥ sutaḥ mahe vājāya dhanyāya dhanvasi

original: RV_09.086.35.1{18} iṣamūrjaṃ pavamānābhyarṣasi śyeno na vaṃsu kalaśeṣusīdasi
analyzed: iṣam ūrjam pavamāna abhyarṣasi śyenaḥ na kalaśeṣu sīdasi

original: RV_09.086.35.2{18} indrāya madvā madyo madaḥ suto divo viṣṭambha upamo vicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: indrāya madvā madyaḥ madaḥ sutaḥ divaḥ viṣṭambhaḥ upamaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_09.086.36.1{19} sapta svasāro abhi mātaraḥ śiśuṃ navaṃ jajñānaṃ jenyaṃ vipaścitam
analyzed: sapta svasāraḥ abhi mātaraḥ śiśum navam jajñānam jenyam vipaścitam

original: RV_09.086.36.2{19} apāṃ gandharvaṃ divyaṃ nṛcakṣasaṃ somaṃviśvasya bhuvanasya rājase
analyzed: apām gandharvam divyam nṛ cakṣasam somam viśvasya bhuvanasya rājase

original: RV_09.086.37.1{19} īśāna imā bhuvanāni vīyase yujāna indo haritaḥ suparṇyaḥ
analyzed: īśānaḥ imā bhuvanāni vīyase yujānaḥ indo haritaḥ suparṇyaḥ

original: RV_09.086.37.2{19} tāste kṣarantu madhumad ghṛtaṃ payastava vrate soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ te kṣarantu madhumat ghṛtam payaḥ tava vrate soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_09.086.38.1{19} tvaṃ nṛcakṣā asi soma viśvataḥ pavamāna vṛṣabha tā vi dhāvasi
analyzed: tvam nṛ cakṣāḥ asi soma viśvatas pavamāna vṛṣabha tā vi dhāvasi

original: RV_09.086.38.2{19} sa naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavad vayaṃ syāma bhuvaneṣu jīvase
analyzed: sa naḥ pavasva vasumat hiraṇyavat vayam syāma bhuvaneṣu jīvase

original: RV_09.086.39.1{19} govit pavasva vasuvid dhiraṇyavid retodhā indo bhuvaneṣvarpitaḥ
analyzed: go vid pavasva vasu vid hiraṇya vid retaḥ dhāḥ indo bhuvaneṣu arpitaḥ

original: RV_09.086.39.2{19} tvaṃ suvīro asi soma viśvavit taṃ tvā viprā upa girema āsate
analyzed: tvam su vīraḥ asi soma viśva vid tam tvā viprāḥ upa girā ime āsate

original: RV_09.086.40.1{19} un madhva ūrmirvananā atiṣṭhipadapo vasāno mahiṣo vi gāhate
analyzed: ud madhvaḥ ūrmiḥ vananāḥ atiṣṭhipat apaḥ vasānaḥ mahiṣaḥ vi gāhate

original: RV_09.086.40.2{19} rājā pavitraratho vājamāruhat sahasrabhṛṣṭirjayati śravo bṛhat
analyzed: rājā pavitra rathaḥ vājam āruhat sahasra bhṛṣṭiḥ jayati śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_09.086.41.1{20} sa bhandanā udiyarti prajāvatīrviśvāyurviśvāḥ subharā ahardivi
analyzed: sa bhandanāḥ udiyarti prajāvatīḥ viśvāyuḥ viśvāḥ subharāḥ ahardivi

original: RV_09.086.41.2{20} brahma prajāvad rayimaśvapastyaṃ pīta indavindramasmabhyaṃ yācatāt
analyzed: brahma prajāvat rayim aśva pastyam pītaḥ indo indram asmabhyam yācatāt

original: RV_09.086.42.1{20} so agre ahnāṃ harirharyato madaḥ pra cetasā cetayate anudyubhiḥ
analyzed: saḥ agre ahnām hariḥ haryataḥ madaḥ pra cetasā cetayate anu dyubhiḥ

original: RV_09.086.42.2{20} dvā janā yātayannantarīyate narā ca śaṃsaṃ daivyaṃ ca dhartari
analyzed: dvā janā yātayan antarīyate narā ca śaṃsam daivyam ca dhartari

original: RV_09.086.43.1{20} añjate vyañjate samañjate kratuṃ rihanti madhunābhyañjate
analyzed: añjate vyañjate samañjate kratum rihanti madhunā abhyañjate

original: RV_09.086.43.2{20} sindhorucchvāse patayantamukṣaṇaṃ hiraṇyapāvāḥ paśumāsu gṛbhṇate
analyzed: sindhoḥ ucchvāse patayantam ukṣaṇam hiraṇya pāvāḥ paśumāsu gṛbhṇate

original: RV_09.086.44.1{20} vipaścite pavamānāya gāyata mahī na dhārātyandho arṣati
analyzed: vipaścite pavamānāya gāyata mahī na dhārā ati andhaḥ arṣati

original: RV_09.086.44.2{20} ahirna jūrṇāmati sarpati tvacamatyo na krīḷannasarad vṛṣā hariḥ
analyzed: ahiḥ na sarpati tvacam atyaḥ na krīḍan asarat vṛṣā hariḥ

original: RV_09.086.45.1{20} agrego rājāpyastaviṣyate vimāno ahnāṃ bhuvaneṣvarpitaḥ
analyzed: agregaḥ rājā api astaviṣyate vimānaḥ ahnām bhuvaneṣu arpitaḥ

original: RV_09.086.45.2{20} harirghṛtasnuḥ sudṛśīko arṇavo jyotīrathaḥ pavate rāya okyaḥ
analyzed: hariḥ ghṛta snuḥ su dṛśīkaḥ arṇavaḥ jyotīrathaḥ pavate rāye okyaḥ

original: RV_09.086.46.1{21} asarji skambho diva udyato madaḥ pari tridhāturbhuvanānyarṣati
analyzed: asarji skambhaḥ divaḥ udyataḥ madaḥ pari tri dhātuḥ bhuvanāni arṣati

original: RV_09.086.46.2{21} aṃśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnataṃ girā yadi nirṇijam ṛgmiṇo yayuḥ
analyzed: aṃśum rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam girā yadi nirṇijam ṛgmiṇaḥ yayuḥ

original: RV_09.086.47.1{21} pra te dhārā atyaṇvāni meṣyaḥ punānasya saṃyato yantiraṃhayaḥ
analyzed: pra te dhārāḥ atyaṇvāni meṣyaḥ punānasya saṃyataḥ yantiḥ aṃhayaḥ

original: RV_09.086.47.2{21} yad gobhirindo camvoḥ samajyasa ā suvānaḥ soma kalaśeṣu sīdasi
analyzed: yat gobhiḥ indo camvoḥ samajyase ā suvānaḥ soma kalaśeṣu sīdasi

original: RV_09.086.48.1{21} pavasva soma kratuvin na ukthyo 'vyo vāre pari dhāva madhu priyam
analyzed: pavasva soma kratu vid naḥ ukthyaḥ vyaḥ vāre pari dhāva madhu priyam

original: RV_09.086.48.2{21} jahi viśvān rakṣasa indo atriṇo bṛhad vadema vidathesuvīrāḥ
analyzed: jahi viśvān rakṣasaḥ indo atriṇaḥ bṛhat vadema vidathesu vīrāḥ

original: RV_09.087.01.1{22} pra tu drava pari kośaṃ ni ṣīda nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vājamarṣa
analyzed: pra tu drava pari kośam ni sīda nṛbhiḥ punānaḥ abhi vāja marṣa

original: RV_09.087.01.2{22} aśvaṃ na tvā vājinaṃ marjayanto 'chā barhī raśanābhirnayanti
analyzed: aśvam na tvā vājinam marjayantaḥ chā barhī raśanābhiḥ nayanti

original: RV_09.087.02.1{22} svāyudhaḥ pavate deva induraśastihā vṛjanaṃ rakṣamāṇaḥ
analyzed: su āyudhaḥ pavate devaḥ induḥ aśasti hā vṛjanam rakṣamāṇaḥ

original: RV_09.087.02.2{22} pitā devānāṃ janitā sudakṣo viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: pitā devānām janitā su dakṣaḥ viṣṭambhaḥ divaḥ dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_09.087.03.1{22} ṛṣirvipraḥ puraetā janānām ṛbhurdhīra uśanā kāvyena
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ vipraḥ puraetā janānām ṛbhuḥ dhīraḥ uśanā kāvyena

original: RV_09.087.03.2{22} sa cid viveda nihitaṃ yadāsāmapīcyaṃ guhyaṃ nāma gonām
analyzed: sa cit viveda nihitam yat āsām apīcyam guhyam nāma gonām

original: RV_09.087.04.1{22} eṣa sya te madhumānindra somo vṛṣā vṛṣṇe pari pavitre akṣāḥ
analyzed: eṣa sya te madhumān indra somaḥ vṛṣā vṛṣṇe pari pavitre akṣāḥ

original: RV_09.087.04.2{22} sahasrasāḥ śatasā bhūridāvā śaśvattamaṃ barhirā vājyasthāt
analyzed: sahasra sāḥ śata sāḥ bhūri dāvā śaśvattamam barhirā vājī asthāt

original: RV_09.087.05.1{22} ete somā abhi gavyā sahasrā mahe vājāyāmṛtāya śravāṃsi
analyzed: ete somāḥ abhi gavyā sahasrā mahe vājāya amṛtāya śravāṃsi

original: RV_09.087.05.2{22} pavitrebhiḥ pavamānā asṛgrañchravasyavo na pṛtanājo atyāḥ
analyzed: pavitrebhiḥ pavamānāḥ asṛgran śravasyavaḥ na pṛtanājaḥ atyāḥ

original: RV_09.087.06.1{23} pari hi ṣmā puruhūto janānāṃ viśvāsarad bhojanā pūyamānaḥ
analyzed: pari hi sma puruhūtaḥ janānām bhojanā pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_09.087.06.2{23} athā bhara śyenabhṛta prayāṃsi rayiṃ tuñjāno abhi vājamarṣa
analyzed: athā bhara śyena bhṛta prayāṃsi rayim tuñjānaḥ abhi vāja marṣa

original: RV_09.087.07.1{23} eṣa suvānaḥ pari somaḥ pavitre sargo na sṛṣṭo adadhāvadarvā
analyzed: eṣa suvānaḥ pari somaḥ pavitre sargaḥ na sṛṣṭaḥ adadhāvat arvā

original: RV_09.087.07.2{23} tigme śiśāno mahiṣo na śṛṅge gā gavyannabhiśūro na satvā
analyzed: tigme śiśānaḥ mahiṣaḥ na śṛṅge gāḥ gavyan abhiśūraḥ na satvā

original: RV_09.087.08.1{23} eṣā yayau paramādantaradreḥ kūcit satīrūrve gā viveda
analyzed: eṣā yayau paramāt antar adreḥ kūcid satīḥ ūrve gāḥ viveda

original: RV_09.087.08.2{23} divo na vidyut stanayantyabhraiḥ somasya te pavata indradhārā
analyzed: divaḥ na vidyut stanayantī abhraiḥ somasya te pavate indra dhārā

original: RV_09.087.09.1{23} uta sma rāśiṃ pari yāsi gonāmindreṇa soma sarathaṃ punānaḥ
analyzed: uta sma rāśim pari yāsi gonām indreṇa soma sa ratham punānaḥ

original: RV_09.087.09.2{23} pūrvīriṣo bṛhatīrjīradāno śikṣā śacīvastava tā upaṣṭut
analyzed: pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ bṛhatīḥ jīra dāno śikṣa śacīvas tava tāḥ upaṣṭut

original: RV_09.088.01.1{24} ayaṃ soma indra tubhyaṃ sunve tubhyaṃ pavate tvamasya pāhi
analyzed: ayam somaḥ indra tubhyam sunve tubhyam pavate tvam asya pāhi

original: RV_09.088.01.2{24} tvaṃ ha yaṃ cakṛṣe tvaṃ vavṛṣa induṃ madāya yujyāya somam
analyzed: tvam ha yam cakṛṣe tvam vavṛṣe indum madāya yujyāya somam

original: RV_09.088.02.1{24} sa īṃ ratho na bhuriṣāḷ ayoji mahaḥ purūṇi sātaye vasūni
analyzed: saḥ īm rathaḥ na bhuriṣāh ayoji mahaḥ purūṇi sātaye vasūni

original: RV_09.088.02.2{24} ādīṃ viśvā nahuṣyāṇi jātā svarṣātā vana ūrdhvā navanta
analyzed: ādīm viśvā nahuṣyāṇi jātā svarṣātā vane ūrdhvā navanta

original: RV_09.088.03.1{24} vāyurna yo niyutvāniṣṭayāmā nāsatyeva hava ā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: vāyuḥ na yaḥ niyutvān iṣṭa yāmā nāsatyā iva have ā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_09.088.03.2{24} viśvavāro draviṇodā iva tman pūṣeva dhījavano 'si soma
analyzed: viśva vāraḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ iva tman pūṣā iva dhī javanaḥ si soma

original: RV_09.088.04.1{24} indro na yo mahā karmāṇi cakrirhantā vṛtrāṇāmasi somapūrbhit
analyzed: indraḥ na yaḥ mahā karmāṇi cakriḥ hantā vṛtrāṇām asi soma pūḥ bhid

original: RV_09.088.04.2{24} paidvo na hi tvamahināmnāṃ hantā viśvasyāsisoma dasyoḥ
analyzed: paidvaḥ na hi tvam ahi nāmnām hantā viśvasya asisoma dasyoḥ

original: RV_09.088.05.1{24} agnirna yo vana ā sṛjyamāno vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣu
analyzed: agniḥ na yaḥ vane ā sṛjyamānaḥ vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣu

original: RV_09.088.05.2{24} jano na yudhvā mahata upabdiriyarti somaḥ pavamānaūrmim
analyzed: janaḥ na yudhvā mahataḥ upabdiḥ iyarti somaḥ pavamāna ūrmim

original: RV_09.088.06.1{24} ete somā ati vārāṇyavyā divyā na kośāso abhravarṣāḥ
analyzed: ete somāḥ ati vārāṇyavyāḥ divyāḥ na kośāsaḥ abhra varṣāḥ

original: RV_09.088.06.2{24} vṛthā samudraṃ sindhavo na nīcīḥ sutāso abhi kalaśānasṛgran
analyzed: vṛthā samudram sindhavaḥ na nīcīḥ sutāsaḥ abhi kalaśān asṛgran

original: RV_09.088.07.1{24} śuṣmī śardho na mārutaṃ pavasvānabhiśastā divyā yathāviṭ
analyzed: śuṣmī śardhaḥ na mārutam pavasva an abhiśastā divyā yathā viś

original: RV_09.088.07.2{24} āpo na makṣū sumatirbhavā naḥ sahasrāpsāḥ pṛtanāṣāṇ na yajñaḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ na makṣū sumatiḥ bhava naḥ sahasra apsāḥ pṛtanāṣāh na yajñaḥ

original: RV_09.088.08.1{24} rājño nu te varuṇasya vratāni ...
analyzed: rājñaḥ nu te varuṇasya vratāni

original: RV_09.089.01.1{25} pro sya vahniḥ pathyābhirasyān divo na vṛṣṭiḥ pavamānoakṣāḥ
analyzed: pra u sya vahniḥ pathyābhiḥ asyān divaḥ na vṛṣṭiḥ pavamāna uakṣāḥ

original: RV_09.089.01.2{25} sahasradhāro asadan nyasme māturupasthe vana āca somaḥ
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ asadat nyasme mātuḥ upasthe vane āca somaḥ

original: RV_09.089.02.1{25} rājā sindhūnāmavasiṣṭa vāsa ṛtasya nāvamāruhad rajiṣṭhām
analyzed: rājā sindhūnām avasiṣṭa vāsaḥ ṛtasya nāvam āruhat rajiṣṭhām

original: RV_09.089.02.2{25} apsu drapso vāvṛdhe śyenajūto duha īṃ pitā duha īṃ piturjām
analyzed: apsu drapsaḥ vāvṛdhe śyena jūtaḥ duhe īm pitā duhe īm pituḥ jām

original: RV_09.089.03.1{25} siṃhaṃ nasanta madhvo ayāsaṃ harimaruṣaṃ divo asya patim
analyzed: siṃham nasanta madhvaḥ ayāsam harim aruṣam divaḥ asya patim

original: RV_09.089.03.2{25} śūro yutsu prathamaḥ pṛchate gā asya cakṣasā pari pātyukṣā
analyzed: śūraḥ yutsu prathamaḥ pṛcchate gāḥ asya cakṣasā pari pāti ukṣā

original: RV_09.089.04.1{25} madhupṛṣṭhaṃ ghoramayāsamaśvaṃ rathe yuñjantyurucakraṛṣvam
analyzed: madhu pṛṣṭham ghoram ayāsam aśvam rathe yuñjanti uru cakra ṛṣvam

original: RV_09.089.04.2{25} svasāra īṃ jāmayo marjayanti sanābhayo vājinamūrjayanti
analyzed: svasāraḥ īm jāmayaḥ marjayanti sanābhayaḥ vājinam ūrjayanti

original: RV_09.089.05.1{25} catasra īṃ ghṛtaduhaḥ sacante samāne antardharuṇe niṣattāḥ
analyzed: catasraḥ īm ghṛta duhaḥ sacante samāne antar dharuṇe niṣattāḥ

original: RV_09.089.05.2{25} tā īmarṣanti namasā punānāstā īṃ viśvataḥ pari ṣanti pūrvīḥ
analyzed: tāḥ īm arṣanti namasā punānāḥ tāḥ īm viśvatas pari santi pūrvīḥ

original: RV_09.089.06.1{25} viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyā viśvā uta kṣitayo haste asya
analyzed: viṣṭambhaḥ divaḥ dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ viśvāḥ uta kṣitayaḥ haste asya

original: RV_09.089.06.2{25} asat ta utso gṛṇate niyutvān madhvo aṃśuḥ pavataindriyāya
analyzed: asat te utsaḥ gṛṇate niyutvān madhvaḥ aṃśuḥ pavata aindriyāya

original: RV_09.089.07.1{25} vanvannavāto abhi devavītimindrāya soma vṛtrahā pavasva
analyzed: vanvan avātaḥ abhi deva vītim indrāya soma vṛtra hā pavasva

original: RV_09.089.07.2{25} śagdhi mahaḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma
analyzed: śagdhi mahaḥ puru ścandrasya rāyaḥ su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_09.090.01.1{26} pra hinvāno janitā rodasyo ratho na vājaṃ saniṣyannayāsīt
analyzed: pra hinvānaḥ janitā rodasyaḥ rathaḥ na vājam saniṣyan ayāsīt

original: RV_09.090.01.2{26} indraṃ gachannāyudhā saṃśiśāno viśvā vasu hastayorādadhānaḥ
analyzed: indram gacchan āyudhā saṃśiśānaḥ viśvā vasu hastayoḥ ādadhānaḥ

original: RV_09.090.02.1{26} abhi tripṛṣṭhaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vayodhāmāṅgūṣāṇāmavāvaśanta vāṇīḥ
analyzed: abhi tri pṛṣṭham vṛṣaṇam vayodhām āṅgūṣāṇām avāvaśanta vāṇīḥ

original: RV_09.090.02.2{26} vanā vasāno varuṇo na sindhūn vi ratnadhā dayate vāryāṇi
analyzed: vanā vasānaḥ varuṇaḥ na sindhūn vi ratna dhāḥ dayate vāryāṇi

original: RV_09.090.03.1{26} śūragrāmaḥ sarvavīraḥ sahāvāñ jetā pavasva sanitā dhanāni
analyzed: śūra grāmaḥ sarva vīraḥ saha āvām jetā pavasva sanitā dhanāni

original: RV_09.090.03.2{26} tigmāyudhaḥ kṣipradhanvā samatsvaṣāḷhaḥ sāhvānpṛtanāsu śatrūn
analyzed: tigma āyudhaḥ kṣipra dhanvā samatsu aṣāḷhaḥ sāhvān pṛtanāsu śatrūn

original: RV_09.090.04.1{26} urugavyūtirabhayāni kṛṇvan samīcīne ā pavasvā purandhī
analyzed: uru gavyūtiḥ abhayāni kṛṇvan samīcīne ā pavasva purandhī

original: RV_09.090.04.2{26} apaḥ siṣāsannuṣasaḥ svargāḥ saṃ cikrado maho asmabhyaṃ vājān
analyzed: apaḥ siṣāsan uṣasaḥ svar gāḥ sam cikradaḥ mahaḥ asmabhyam vājān

original: RV_09.090.05.1{26} matsi soma varuṇaṃ matsi mitraṃ matsīndramindo pavamāna viṣṇum
analyzed: matsi soma varuṇam matsi mitram matsi indram indo pavamāna viṣṇum

original: RV_09.090.05.2{26} matsi śardho mārutaṃ matsi devān matsi mahāmindramindo madāya
analyzed: matsi śardhaḥ mārutam matsi devān matsi mahām indram indo madāya

original: RV_09.090.06.1{26} evā rājeva kratumānamena viśvā ghanighnad duritā pavasva
analyzed: eva rājā iva kratumān amena viśvā ghanighnat duritā pavasva

original: RV_09.090.06.2{26} indo sūktāya vacase vayo dhā yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: indo sūktāya vacase vayaḥ dhāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_09.091.01.1{01} asarji vakvā rathye yathājau dhiyā manotā prathamo manīṣī
analyzed: asarji vakvā rathye yathā ājau dhiyā manotā prathamaḥ manīṣī

original: RV_09.091.01.2{01} daśa svasāro adhi sāno avye 'janti vahniṃ sadanānyacha
analyzed: daśa svasāraḥ adhi sāno avye janti vahnim sadanāni acha

original: RV_09.091.02.1{01} vītī janasya divyasya kavyairadhi suvāno nahuṣyebhirinduḥ
analyzed: vītī janasya divyasya kavyaiḥ adhi suvānaḥ nahuṣyebhiḥ induḥ

original: RV_09.091.02.2{01} pra yo nṛbhiramṛto martyebhirmarmṛjāno 'vibhirgobhiradbhiḥ
analyzed: pra yaḥ nṛbhiḥ amṛtaḥ martyebhiḥ marmṛjānaḥ vibhiḥ gobhiḥ adbhiḥ

original: RV_09.091.03.1{01} vṛṣā vṛṣne roruvadaṃśurasmai pavamāno ruśadīrte payogoḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā vṛṣne roruvat aṃśuḥ asmai pavamānaḥ ruśat īrte payaḥ goḥ

original: RV_09.091.03.2{01} sahasram ṛkvā pathibhirvacovidadhvasmabhiḥ sūro aṇvaṃ vi yāti
analyzed: sahasram ṛkvā pathibhiḥ vacaḥ vida dhvasmabhiḥ sūraḥ aṇvam vi yāti

original: RV_09.091.04.1{01} rujā dṛḷhā cid rakṣasaḥ sadāṃsi punāna inda ūrṇuhi vivājān
analyzed: rujā dṛḍhā cit rakṣasaḥ sadāṃsi punānaḥ indo ūrṇuhi vivājān

original: RV_09.091.04.2{01} vṛścopariṣṭāt tujatā vadhena ye anti dūrādupanāyameṣām
analyzed: vṛśca upariṣṭāt tujatā vadhena ye anti dūrāt upanāyam eṣām

original: RV_09.091.05.1{01} sa pratnavan navyase viśvavāra sūktāya pathaḥ kṛṇuhi prācaḥ
analyzed: sa pratna vat navyase viśva vāra sūktāya pathaḥ kṛṇuhi prācaḥ

original: RV_09.091.05.2{01} ye duḥṣahāso vanuṣā bṛhantastāṃste aśyāma purukṛt purukṣo
analyzed: ye duḥṣahāsaḥ vanuṣā bṛhantaḥ tān te aśyāma puru kṛt purukṣo

original: RV_09.091.06.1{01} evā punāno apaḥ svargā asmabhyaṃ tokā tanayāni bhūri
analyzed: eva punānaḥ apaḥ svar gāḥ asmabhyam tokā tanayāni bhūri

original: RV_09.091.06.2{01} śaṃ naḥ kṣetramuru jyotīṃṣi soma jyoṃ naḥ sūryandṛśaye rirīhi
analyzed: śam naḥ kṣetram uru jyotīṃṣi soma jyok naḥ sūryan dṛśaye rirīhi

original: RV_09.092.01.1{02} pari suvāno hariraṃśuḥ pavitre ratho na sarji sanaye hiyānaḥ
analyzed: pari suvānaḥ hari raṃśuḥ pavitre rathaḥ na sarji sanaye hiyānaḥ

original: RV_09.092.01.2{02} āpacchlokamindriyaṃ pūyamānaḥ prati devānajuṣata prayobhiḥ
analyzed: āpat ślokam indriyam pūyamānaḥ prati devān ajuṣata prayobhiḥ

original: RV_09.092.02.1{02} achā nṛcakṣā asarat pavitre nāma dadhānaḥ kavirasya yonau
analyzed: achā nṛ cakṣāḥ asarat pavitre nāma dadhānaḥ kaviḥ asya yonau

original: RV_09.092.02.2{02} sīdan hoteva sadane camūṣūpemagmannṛṣayaḥ sapta viprāḥ
analyzed: sīdan hotā iva sadane camūṣu upemagman ṛṣayaḥ sapta viprāḥ

original: RV_09.092.03.1{02} pra sumedhā gātuvid viśvadevaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ sada eti nityam
analyzed: pra sumedhāḥ gātu vid viśva devaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ sadaḥ eti nityam

original: RV_09.092.03.2{02} bhuvad viśveṣu kāvyeṣu rantānu janān yatate pañca dhīraḥ
analyzed: bhuvat viśveṣu kāvyeṣu rantā anu janān yatate pañca dhīraḥ

original: RV_09.092.04.1{02} tava tye soma pavamāna niṇye viśve devāstraya ekādaśāsaḥ
analyzed: tava tye soma pavamāna niṇye viśve devāḥ trayaḥ ekādaśāsaḥ

original: RV_09.092.04.2{02} daśa svadhābhiradhi sāno avye mṛjanti tvā nadyaḥ sapta yahvīḥ
analyzed: daśa svadhābhiḥ adhi sāno avye mṛjanti tvā nadyaḥ sapta yahvīḥ

original: RV_09.092.05.1{02} tan nu satyaṃ pavamānasyāstu yatra viśve kāravaḥ saṃnasanta
analyzed: tat nu satyam pavamānasya astu yatra viśve kāravaḥ saṃnasanta

original: RV_09.092.05.2{02} jyotiryadahne akṛṇodu lokaṃ prāvan manuṃ dasyave karabhīkam
analyzed: jyotiḥ yat ahne akṛṇot u lokam prāvat manum dasyave karabhīkam

original: RV_09.092.06.1{02} pari sadmeva paśumānti hotā rājā na satyaḥ samitīriyānaḥ
analyzed: pari sadmā iva paśumānti hotā rājā na satyaḥ samitīḥ iyānaḥ

original: RV_09.092.06.2{02} somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśānayāsīt sīdan mṛgo na mahiṣo vaneṣu
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśān ayāsīt sīdan mṛgaḥ na mahiṣaḥ vaneṣu

original: RV_09.093.01.1{03} sākamukṣo marjayanta svasāro daśa dhīrasya dhītayo dhanutrīḥ
analyzed: sākamukṣaḥ marjayanta svasāraḥ daśa dhīrasya dhītayaḥ dhanutrīḥ

original: RV_09.093.01.2{03} hariḥ paryadravajjāḥ sūryasya droṇaṃ nanakṣe atyo na vājī
analyzed: hariḥ paryadravat jāḥ sūryasya droṇam nanakṣe atyaḥ na vājī

original: RV_09.093.02.1{03} saṃ mātṛbhirna śiśurvāvaśāno vṛṣā dadhanve puruvāroadbhiḥ
analyzed: sam mātṛbhiḥ na śiśuḥ vāvaśānaḥ vṛṣā dadhanve puru vāraḥ adbhiḥ

original: RV_09.093.02.2{03} maryo na yoṣāmabhi niṣkṛtaṃ yan saṃ gachate kalaśa usriyābhiḥ
analyzed: maryaḥ na yoṣām abhi niṣkṛtam yan sam gacchate kalaśe usriyābhiḥ

original: RV_09.093.03.1{03} uta pra pipya ūdharaghnyāyā indurdhārābhiḥ sacate sumedhāḥ
analyzed: uta pra pipye ūdhara ghnyāyāḥ induḥ dhārābhiḥ sacate sumedhāḥ

original: RV_09.093.03.2{03} mūrdhānaṃ gāvaḥ payasā camūṣvabhi śrīṇanti vasubhirna niktaiḥ
analyzed: mūrdhānam gāvaḥ payasā camūṣu abhi śrīṇanti vasubhiḥ na niktaiḥ

original: RV_09.093.04.1{03} sa no devebhiḥ pavamāna radendo rayimaśvinaṃ vāvaśānaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ devebhiḥ pavamāna rada indoḥ rayim aśvinam vāvaśānaḥ

original: RV_09.093.04.2{03} rathirāyatāmuśatī purandhirasmadryagā dāvane vasūnām
analyzed: rathiḥ āyatām āmuśatī purandhiḥ asmadrya gāḥ dāvane vasūnām

original: RV_09.093.05.1{03} nū no rayimupa māsva nṛvantaṃ punāno vātāpyaṃ viśvaścandram
analyzed: nu naḥ rayim upa māsva nṛvantam punānaḥ vātāpyam viśva ścandram

original: RV_09.093.05.2{03} pra vanditurindo tāryāyuḥ prātarmakṣū dhiyāvasurjagamyāt
analyzed: pra vandituḥ indo tārī āyuḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_09.094.01.1{04} adhi yadasmin vājinīva śubha spardhante dhiyaḥ sūrye naviśaḥ
analyzed: adhi yat asmin vājinī iva śubhe spardhante dhiyaḥ sūrye naviśaḥ

original: RV_09.094.01.2{04} apo vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyan vrajaṃ na paśuvardhanāya manma
analyzed: apaḥ vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyan vrajam na paśu vardhanāya manma

original: RV_09.094.02.1{04} dvitā vyūrṇvannamṛtasya dhāma svarvide bhuvanāni prathanta
analyzed: dvitā vyūrṇvan amṛtasya dhāma svarvide bhuvanāni prathanta

original: RV_09.094.02.2{04} dhiyaḥ pinvānāḥ svasare na gāva ṛtāyantīrabhi vāvaśra indum
analyzed: dhiyaḥ pinvānāḥ svasare na gāvaḥ ṛtāyantīḥ abhi vāvaśre indum

original: RV_09.094.03.1{04} pari yat kaviḥ kāvyā bharate śūro na ratho bhuvanāni viśvā
analyzed: pari yat kaviḥ kāvyā bharate śūraḥ na rathaḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_09.094.03.2{04} deveṣu yaśo martāya bhūṣan dakṣāya rāyaḥ purubhūṣu navyaḥ
analyzed: deveṣu yaśaḥ martāya bhūṣan dakṣāya rāyaḥ puru bhūṣu navyaḥ

original: RV_09.094.04.1{04} śriye jātaḥ śriya ā niriyāya śriyaṃ vayo jaritṛbhyo dadhāti
analyzed: śriye jātaḥ śriye ā niriyāya śriyam vayaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ dadhāti

original: RV_09.094.04.2{04} śriyaṃ vasānā amṛtatvamāyan bhavanti satyā samithā mitadrau
analyzed: śriyam vasānāḥ amṛta tvam āyan bhavanti satyā samithā mitadrau

original: RV_09.094.05.1{04} iṣamūrjamabhyarṣāśvaṃ gāmuru jyotiḥ kṛṇuhi matsi devān
analyzed: iṣam ūrjam abhyarṣa aśvam gām uru jyotiḥ kṛṇuhi matsi devān

original: RV_09.094.05.2{04} viśvāni hi suṣahā tāni tubhyaṃ pavamāna bādhasesoma śatrūn
analyzed: viśvāni hi suṣahā tāni tubhyam pavamāna bādhasesoma śatrūn

original: RV_09.095.01.1{05} kanikranti harirā sṛjyamānaḥ sīdan vanasya jaṭhare punānaḥ
analyzed: kanikranti harirā sṛjyamānaḥ sīdan vanasya jaṭhare punānaḥ

original: RV_09.095.01.2{05} nṛbhiryataḥ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ gā ato matīrjanayatasvadhābhiḥ
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ yatas kṛṇute nirṇijam gāḥ atas matīḥ janayata svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_09.095.02.1{05} hariḥ sṛjānaḥ pathyām ṛtasyeyarti vācamariteva nāvam
analyzed: hariḥ sṛjānaḥ pathyām ṛtasya iyarti vācam aritā iva nāvam

original: RV_09.095.02.2{05} devo devānāṃ guhyāni nāmāviṣ kṛṇoti barhiṣi pravāce
analyzed: devaḥ devānām guhyāni nāma āvis kṛṇoti barhiṣi pravāce

original: RV_09.095.03.1{05} apāmivedūrmayastarturāṇāḥ pra manīṣā īrate somamacha
analyzed: apām iva id ūrmayaḥ tarturāṇāḥ pra manīṣāḥ īrate somam acha

original: RV_09.095.03.2{05} namasyantīrupa ca yanti saṃ cā ca viśantyuśatīruśantam
analyzed: namasyantīḥ upa ca yanti sam ca ā ca viśanti uśatīḥ uśantam

original: RV_09.095.04.1{05} taṃ marmṛjānaṃ mahiṣaṃ na sānāvaṃśuṃ duhantyukṣaṇaṃ giriṣṭhām
analyzed: tam marmṛjānam mahiṣam na sānau aṃśum duhanti ukṣaṇam giriṣṭhām

original: RV_09.095.04.2{05} taṃ vāvaśānaṃ matayaḥ sacante trito bibharti varuṇaṃ samudre
analyzed: tam vāvaśānam matayaḥ sacante tritaḥ bibharti varuṇam samudre

original: RV_09.095.05.1{05} iṣyan vācamupavakteva hotuḥ punāna indo vi ṣyā manīṣām
analyzed: iṣyan vācam upavaktā iva hotuḥ punānaḥ indo vi sya manīṣām

original: RV_09.095.05.2{05} indraśca yat kṣayathaḥ saubhagāya suvīryasya patayaḥsyāma
analyzed: indraḥ ca yat kṣayathaḥ saubhagāya su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_09.096.01.1{06} pra senānīḥ śūro agre rathānāṃ gavyanneti harṣate asya senā
analyzed: pra senā nīḥ śūraḥ agre rathānām gavyan neti harṣate asya senā

original: RV_09.096.01.2{06} bhadrān kṛṇvannindrahavān sakhibhya ā somo vastrā rabhasāni datte
analyzed: bhadrān kṛṇvan indra havān sakhibhyaḥ ā somaḥ vastrā rabhasāni datte

original: RV_09.096.02.1{06} samasya hariṃ harayo mṛjantyaśvahayairaniśitaṃ namobhiḥ
analyzed: samasya harim harayaḥ mṛjanti aśva hayaiḥ aniśitam namobhiḥ

original: RV_09.096.02.2{06} ā tiṣṭhati rathamindrasya sakhā vidvānenā sumatiṃ yātyacha
analyzed: ā tiṣṭhati ratham indrasya sakhā vidvān enā sumatim yāti acha

original: RV_09.096.03.1{06} sa no deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarasa indrapānaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarase indra pānaḥ

original: RV_09.096.03.2{06} kṛṇvannapo varṣayan dyāmutemāmurorā no varivasyā punānaḥ
analyzed: kṛṇvan apaḥ varṣayan dyām uta imām urorāḥ naḥ varivasyā punānaḥ

original: RV_09.096.04.1{06} ajītaye 'hataye pavasva svastaye sarvatātaye bṛhate
analyzed: ajītaye hataye pavasva svastaye sarvatātaye bṛhate

original: RV_09.096.04.2{06} taduśanti viśva ime sakhāyastadahaṃ vaśmi pavamāna soma
analyzed: tat uśanti viśve ime sakhāyaḥ tat aham vaśmi pavamāna soma

original: RV_09.096.05.1{06} somaḥ pavate janitā matīnāṃ janitā divo janitā pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: somaḥ pavate janitā matīnām janitā divaḥ janitā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_09.096.05.2{06} janitāgnerjanitā sūryasya janitendrasya janitota viṣṇoḥ
analyzed: janitā agneḥ janitā sūryasya janitā indrasya janitā uta viṣṇoḥ

original: RV_09.096.06.1{07} brahmā devānāṃ padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣirviprāṇāṃ mahiṣomṛgāṇām
analyzed: brahmā devānām padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣiḥ viprāṇām mahiṣaḥ mṛgāṇām

original: RV_09.096.06.2{07} śyeno gṛdhrāṇāṃ svadhitirvanānāṃ somaḥ pavitramatyeti rebhan
analyzed: śyenaḥ gṛdhrāṇām svadhitiḥ vanānām somaḥ pavitram atyeti rebhan

original: RV_09.096.07.1{07} prāvīvipad vāca ūrmiṃ na sindhurgiraḥ somaḥ pavamānomanīṣāḥ
analyzed: prāvīvipat vācaḥ ūrmim na sindhuḥ giraḥ somaḥ pavamānaḥ manīṣāḥ

original: RV_09.096.07.2{07} antaḥ paśyan vṛjanemāvarāṇyā tiṣṭhati vṛṣabho goṣu jānan
analyzed: antar paśyan vṛjanemā avarāṇyā tiṣṭhati vṛṣabhaḥ goṣu jānan

original: RV_09.096.08.1{07} sa matsaraḥ pṛtsu vanvannavātaḥ sahasraretā abhi vājamarṣa
analyzed: sa matsaraḥ pṛtsu vanvan avātaḥ sahasra retāḥ abhi vāja marṣa

original: RV_09.096.08.2{07} indrāyendo pavamāno manīṣyaṃśorūrmimīraya gā iṣaṇyan
analyzed: indrāya indo pavamānaḥ manīṣī aṃśoḥ ūrmimīraya gāḥ iṣaṇyan

original: RV_09.096.09.1{07} pari priyaḥ kalaśe devavāta indrāya somo raṇyo madāya
analyzed: pari priyaḥ kalaśe deva vātaḥ indrāya somaḥ raṇyaḥ madāya

original: RV_09.096.09.2{07} sahasradhāraḥ śatavāja indurvājī na saptiḥ samanā jigāti
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ śata vājaḥ induḥ vājī na saptiḥ samanā jigāti

original: RV_09.096.10.1{07} sa pūrvyo vasuvijjāyamāno mṛjāno apsu duduhāno adrau
analyzed: sa pūrvyaḥ vasu vid jāyamānaḥ mṛjānaḥ apsu duduhānaḥ adrau

original: RV_09.096.10.2{07} abhiśastipā bhuvanasya rājā vidad gātuṃ brahmaṇe pūyamānaḥ
analyzed: abhiśasti pāḥ bhuvanasya rājā vidat gātum brahmaṇe pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_09.096.11.1{08} tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamānadhīrāḥ
analyzed: tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ

original: RV_09.096.11.2{08} vanvannavātaḥ paridhīnraporṇu vīrebhiraśvairmaghavā bhavā naḥ
analyzed: vanvan avātaḥ paridhīn rapaḥ ūrṇu vīrebhiḥ aśvaiḥ maghavā bhava naḥ

original: RV_09.096.12.1{08} yathāpavathā manave vayodhā amitrahā varivovid dhaviṣmān
analyzed: yathā apavathāḥ manave vayaḥ dhāḥ amitra hā varivaḥ vid haviṣmān

original: RV_09.096.12.2{08} evā pavasva draviṇaṃ dadhāna indre saṃ tiṣṭha janayāyudhāni
analyzed: eva pavasva draviṇam dadhānaḥ indre sam tiṣṭha janaya āyudhāni

original: RV_09.096.13.1{08} pavasva soma madhumān ṛtāvāpo vasāno adhi sāno avye
analyzed: pavasva soma madhumān ṛtāvā apaḥ vasānaḥ adhi sāno avye

original: RV_09.096.13.2{08} ava droṇāni ghṛtavānti sīda madintamo matsara indrapānaḥ
analyzed: ava droṇāni ghṛtavānti sīda madintamaḥ matsaraḥ indra pānaḥ

original: RV_09.096.14.1{08} vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ śatadhāraḥ pavasva sahasrasā vājayurdevavītau
analyzed: vṛṣṭim divaḥ śata dhāraḥ pavasva sahasra sāḥ vājayuḥ deva vītau

original: RV_09.096.14.2{08} saṃ sindhubhiḥ kalaśe vāvaśānaḥ samusriyābhiḥpratiran na āyuḥ
analyzed: sam sindhubhiḥ kalaśe vāvaśānaḥ sam usriyābhiḥ pratiran naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_09.096.15.1{08} eṣa sya somo matibhiḥ punāno 'tyo na vājī taratīdarātīḥ
analyzed: eṣa sya somaḥ matibhiḥ punānaḥ tyaḥ na vājī tarati id arātīḥ

original: RV_09.096.15.2{08} payo na dugdhamaditeriṣiramurviva gātuḥ suyamona vo:ḷhā
analyzed: payaḥ na dugdham aditeḥ iṣiram uru iva gātuḥ suyamaḥ na voḷhā

original: RV_09.096.16.1{09} svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyamāno 'bhyarṣa guhyaṃ cāru nāma
analyzed: su āyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyamānaḥ bhyarṣa guhyam cāru nāma

original: RV_09.096.16.2{09} abhi vājaṃ saptiriva śravasyābhi vāyumabhi gā devasoma
analyzed: abhi vājam saptiḥ iva śravasya abhi vāyum abhi gāḥ deva soma

original: RV_09.096.17.1{09} śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ haryataṃ mṛjanti śumbhanti vahniṃ maruto gaṇena
analyzed: śiśum jajñānam haryatam mṛjanti śumbhanti vahnim marutaḥ gaṇena

original: RV_09.096.17.2{09} kavirgīrbhiḥ kāvyenā kaviḥ san somaḥ pavitramatyeti rebhan
analyzed: kaviḥ gīrbhiḥ kāvyena kaviḥ san somaḥ pavitram atyeti rebhan

original: RV_09.096.18.1{09} ṛṣimanā ya ṛṣikṛt svarṣāḥ sahasraṇīthaḥ padavīḥ kavīnām
analyzed: ṛṣi manāḥ yaḥ ṛṣi kṛt svarṣāḥ sahasraṇīthaḥ padavīḥ kavīnām

original: RV_09.096.18.2{09} tṛtīyaṃ dhāma mahiṣaḥ siṣāsan somo virājamanurājati ṣṭup
analyzed: tṛtīyam dhāma mahiṣaḥ siṣāsan somaḥ virājam anurājati ṣṭubh

original: RV_09.096.19.1{09} camūṣacchyenaḥ śakuno vibhṛtvā govindurdrapsa āyudhānibibhrat
analyzed: camūṣat śyenaḥ śakunaḥ vibhṛtvā go vinduḥ drapsaḥ āyudhāni bibhrat

original: RV_09.096.19.2{09} apāmūrmiṃ sacamānaḥ samudraṃ turīyaṃ dhāmamahiṣo vivakti
analyzed: apām ūrmim sacamānaḥ samudram turīyam dhāma mahiṣaḥ vivakti

original: RV_09.096.20.1{09} maryo na śubhrastanvaṃ mṛjāno 'tyo na sṛtvā sanaye dhanānām
analyzed: maryaḥ na śubhraḥ tanvam mṛjānaḥ tyaḥ na sṛtvā sanaye dhanānām

original: RV_09.096.20.2{09} vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośamarṣan kanikradaccamvorāviveśa
analyzed: vṛṣā iva yūthā pari kośam arṣan kanikradat camvoḥ āviveśa

original: RV_09.096.21.1{10} pavasvendo pavamāno mahobhiḥ kanikradat pari vārāṇyarṣa
analyzed: pavasva indo pavamānaḥ mahobhiḥ kanikradat pari vārāṇi arṣa

original: RV_09.096.21.2{10} krīḷañcamvorā viśa pūyamāna indraṃ te raso madiro mamattu
analyzed: krīḍan camvā urāḥ viśa pūyamānaḥ indram te rasaḥ madiraḥ mamattu

original: RV_09.096.22.1{10} prāsya dhārā bṛhatīrasṛgrannakto gobhiḥ kalaśānā viveśa
analyzed: prāsya dhārāḥ bṛhatīḥ asṛgran naktaḥ gobhiḥ kalaśānā viveśa

original: RV_09.096.22.2{10} sāma kṛṇvan sāmanyo vipaścit krandannetyabhi sakhyurna jāmim
analyzed: sāma kṛṇvan sāmanyaḥ vipaścit krandan eti abhi sakhyuḥ na jāmim

original: RV_09.096.23.1{10} apaghnanneṣi pavamāna śatrūn priyāṃ na jāro abhigīta induḥ
analyzed: apaghnan eṣi pavamāna śatrūn priyām na jāraḥ abhigītaḥ induḥ

original: RV_09.096.23.2{10} sīdan vaneṣu śakuno na patvā somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sattā
analyzed: sīdan vaneṣu śakunaḥ na patvā somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sattā

original: RV_09.096.24.1{10} ā te rucaḥ pavamānasya soma yoṣeva yanti sudughāḥ sudhārāḥ
analyzed: ā te rucaḥ pavamānasya soma yoṣā iva yanti sudughāḥ su dhārāḥ

original: RV_09.096.24.2{10} harirānītaḥ puruvāro apsvacikradat kalaśe devayūnām
analyzed: hariḥ ānītaḥ puru vāraḥ apsu acikradat kalaśe devayūnām

original: RV_09.097.01.1{11} asya preṣā hemanā pūyamāno devo devebhiḥ samapṛkta rasam
analyzed: asya preṣā hemanā pūyamānaḥ devaḥ devebhiḥ samapṛkta rasam

original: RV_09.097.01.2{11} sutaḥ pavitraṃ paryeti rebhan miteva sadma paśumānti hotā
analyzed: sutaḥ pavitram paryeti rebhan mitā iva sadma paśumānti hotā

original: RV_09.097.02.1{11} bhadrā vastrā samanyā vasāno mahān kavirnivacanāni śaṃsan
analyzed: bhadrā vastrā samanyā vasānaḥ mahān kaviḥ nivacanāni śaṃsan

original: RV_09.097.02.2{11} ā vacyasva camvoḥ pūyamāno vicakṣaṇo jāgṛvirdevavītau
analyzed: ā vacyasva camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ jāgṛviḥ deva vītau

original: RV_09.097.03.1{11} samu priyo mṛjyate sāno avye yaśastaro yaśasāṃ kṣaito asme
analyzed: samu priyaḥ mṛjyate sāno avye yaśastaraḥ yaśasām kṣaitaḥ asme

original: RV_09.097.03.2{11} abhi svara dhanvā pūyamāno yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: abhi svara dhanva pūyamānaḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_09.097.04.1{11} pra gāyatābhyarcāma devān somaṃ hinota mahate dhanāya
analyzed: pra gāyata abhyarcāma devān somam hinota mahate dhanāya

original: RV_09.097.04.2{11} svāduḥ pavāte ati vāramavyamā sīdāti kalaśaṃ devayurnaḥ
analyzed: svāduḥ pavāte ati vāram avyamā sīdāti kalaśam devayuḥ naḥ

original: RV_09.097.05.1{11} indurdevānāmupa sakhyamāyan sahasradhāraḥ pavate madāya
analyzed: induḥ devānām upa sakhyam āyan sahasra dhāraḥ pavate madāya

original: RV_09.097.05.2{11} nṛbhiḥ stavāno anu dhāma pūrvamagannindraṃ mahate saubhagāya
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ stavānaḥ anu dhāma pūrvam agan indram mahate saubhagāya

original: RV_09.097.06.1{12} stotre rāye harirarṣā punāna indraṃ mado gachatu te bharāya
analyzed: stotre rāye hariḥ arṣa punānaḥ indram madaḥ gacchatu te bharāya

original: RV_09.097.06.2{12} devairyāhi sarathaṃ rādho achā yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: devaiḥ yāhi sa ratham rādhaḥ achā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_09.097.07.1{12} pra kāvyamuśaneva bruvāṇo devo devānāṃ janimā vivakti
analyzed: pra kāvyam uśanā iva bruvāṇaḥ devaḥ devānām janimā vivakti

original: RV_09.097.07.2{12} mahivrataḥ śucibandhuḥ pāvakaḥ padā varāho abhyeti rebhan
analyzed: mahi vrataḥ śuci bandhuḥ pāvakaḥ padā varāhaḥ abhyeti rebhan

original: RV_09.097.08.1{12} pra haṃsāsastṛpalaṃ manyumachāmādastaṃ vṛṣagaṇā ayāsuḥ
analyzed: pra haṃsāsaḥ tṛpalam manyum achāmādaḥ tam vṛṣagaṇāḥ ayāsuḥ

original: RV_09.097.08.2{12} āṅgūṣyaṃ pavamānaṃ sakhāyo durmarṣaṃ sākaṃ pravadanti vāṇam
analyzed: āṅgūṣyam pavamānam sakhāyaḥ durmarṣam sākam pravadanti vāṇam

original: RV_09.097.09.1{12} sa raṃhata urugāyasya jūtiṃ vṛthā krīḷantaṃ mimate na gāvaḥ
analyzed: sa raṃhate uru gāyasya jūtim vṛthā krīḍantam mimate na gāvaḥ

original: RV_09.097.09.2{12} parīṇasaṃ kṛṇute tigmaśṛṅgo divā harirdadṛśe naktam ṛjraḥ
analyzed: parīṇasam kṛṇute tigma śṛṅgaḥ divā hariḥ dadṛśe naktam ṛjraḥ

original: RV_09.097.10.1{12} indurvājī pavate gonyoghā indre somaḥ saha invan madāya
analyzed: induḥ vājī pavate gonyoghāḥ indre somaḥ sahaḥ invan madāya

original: RV_09.097.10.2{12} hanti rakṣo bādhate paryarātīrvarivaḥ kṛṇvan vṛjanasya rājā
analyzed: hanti rakṣaḥ bādhate pari arātīḥ varivaḥ kṛṇvan vṛjanasya rājā

original: RV_09.097.11.1{13} adha dhārayā madhvā pṛcānastiro roma pavate adridugdhaḥ
analyzed: adha dhārayā madhvā pṛcānaḥ tiras roma pavate adri dugdhaḥ

original: RV_09.097.11.2{13} indurindrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇo devo devasya matsaro madāya
analyzed: induḥ indrasya sakhyam juṣāṇaḥ devaḥ devasya matsaraḥ madāya

original: RV_09.097.12.1{13} abhi priyāṇi pavate punāno devo devān svena rasena pṛñcan
analyzed: abhi priyāṇi pavate punānaḥ devaḥ devān svena rasena pṛñcan

original: RV_09.097.12.2{13} indurdharmāṇy ṛtuthā vasāno daśa kṣipo avyata sāno avye
analyzed: induḥ dharmāṇi ṛtuthā vasānaḥ daśa kṣipaḥ avyata sāno avye

original: RV_09.097.13.1{13} vṛṣā śoṇo abhikanikradad gā nadayanneti pṛthivīmuta dyām
analyzed: vṛṣā śoṇaḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ nadayan eti pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: RV_09.097.13.2{13} indrasyeva vagnurā śṛṇva ājau pracetayannarṣati vācamemām
analyzed: indrasya iva vagnuḥ ā śṛṇve ājau pracetayan arṣati vācam emām

original: RV_09.097.14.1{13} rasāyyaḥ payasā pinvamāna īrayanneṣi madhumantamaṃśum
analyzed: rasāyyaḥ payasā pinvamānaḥ īrayan eṣi madhumantam aṃśum

original: RV_09.097.14.2{13} pavamānaḥ santanimeṣi kṛṇvannindrāya soma pariṣicyamānaḥ
analyzed: pavamānaḥ santanim eṣi kṛṇvan indrāya soma pariṣicyamānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.15.1{13} evā pavasva madiro madāyodagrābhasya namayan vadhasnaiḥ
analyzed: eva pavasva madiraḥ madāya udagrābhasya namayan vadhasnaiḥ

original: RV_09.097.15.2{13} pari varṇaṃ bharamāṇo ruśantaṃ gavyurno arṣa pari soma siktaḥ
analyzed: pari varṇam bharamāṇaḥ ruśantam gavyuḥ naḥ arṣa pari soma siktaḥ

original: RV_09.097.16.1{14} juṣṭvī na indo supathā sugānyurau pavasva varivāṃsi kṛṇvan
analyzed: juṣṭvī naḥ indo su pathā sugāni urau pavasva varivāṃsi kṛṇvan

original: RV_09.097.16.2{14} ghaneva viṣvag duritāni vighnannadhi ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye
analyzed: ghanā iva viṣvak duritāni vighnan adhi snunā dhanva sāno avye

original: RV_09.097.17.1{14} vṛṣṭiṃ no arṣa divyāṃ jigatnumiḷāvatīṃ śaṃgayīṃ jīradānum
analyzed: vṛṣṭim naḥ arṣa divyām jigatnum iḷāvatīm śaṃgayīm jīra dānum

original: RV_09.097.17.2{14} stukeva vītā dhanvā vicinvan bandhūnrimānavarānindo vāyūn
analyzed: stukā iva vītā dhanva vicinvan bandhūn rimān avarān indo vāyūn

original: RV_09.097.18.1{14} granthiṃ na vi ṣya grathitaṃ punāna ṛjuṃ ca gātuṃ vṛjinaṃ ca soma
analyzed: granthim na vi sya grathitam punānaḥ ṛjum ca gātum vṛjinam ca soma

original: RV_09.097.18.2{14} atyo na krado harirā sṛjāno maryo deva dhanva pastyāvān
analyzed: atyaḥ na kradaḥ harirā sṛjānaḥ maryaḥ deva dhanva pastyāvān

original: RV_09.097.19.1{14} juṣṭo madāya devatāta indo pari ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ madāya devatāte indo pari snunā dhanva sāno avye

original: RV_09.097.19.2{14} sahasradhāraḥ surabhiradabdhaḥ pari srava vājasātau nṛṣahye
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ surabhiḥ adabdhaḥ pari srava vājasātau nṛṣahye

original: RV_09.097.20.1{14} araśmāno ye 'rathā ayuktā atyāso na sasṛjānāsa ājau
analyzed: a raśmānaḥ ye rathāḥ a yuktāḥ atyāsaḥ na sasṛjānāsaḥ ājau

original: RV_09.097.20.2{14} ete śukrāso dhanvanti somā devāsastānupa yātā pibadhyai
analyzed: ete śukrāsaḥ dhanvanti somāḥ devāsaḥ tān upa yātā pibadhyai

original: RV_09.097.21.1{15} evā na indo abhi devavītiṃ pari srava nabho arṇaścamūṣu
analyzed: eva naḥ indo abhi deva vītim pari srava nabhaḥ arṇaḥ camūṣu

original: RV_09.097.21.2{15} somo asmabhyaṃ kāmyaṃ bṛhantaṃ rayiṃ dadātu vīravantamugram
analyzed: somaḥ asmabhyam kāmyam bṛhantam rayim dadātu vīravantam ugram

original: RV_09.097.22.1{15} takṣad yadī manaso venato vāg jyeṣṭhasya vā dharmaṇi kṣoranīke
analyzed: takṣat yadī manasaḥ venataḥ vāc jyeṣṭhasya vā dharmaṇi kṣoḥ anīke

original: RV_09.097.22.2{15} ādīmāyan varamā vāvaśānā juṣṭaṃ patiṃ kalaśe gāva indum
analyzed: ādīmāyan varamāḥ vāvaśānāḥ juṣṭam patim kalaśe gāvaḥ indum

original: RV_09.097.23.1{15} pra dānudo divyo dānupinva ṛtam ṛtāya pavate sumedhāḥ
analyzed: pra dānudaḥ divyaḥ dānu pinvaḥ ṛtam ṛtāya pavate sumedhāḥ

original: RV_09.097.23.2{15} dharmā bhuvad vṛjanyasya rājā pra raśmibhirdaśabhirbhāri bhūma
analyzed: dharmā bhuvat vṛjanyasya rājā pra raśmibhiḥ daśabhiḥ bhāri bhūma

original: RV_09.097.24.1{15} pavitrebhiḥ pavamāno nṛcakṣā rājā devānāmuta martyānām
analyzed: pavitrebhiḥ pavamānaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ rājā devānām uta martyānām

original: RV_09.097.24.2{15} dvitā bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām ṛtaṃ bharat subhṛtaṃ cārvinduḥ
analyzed: dvitā bhuvat rayi patiḥ rayīṇām ṛtam bharat su bhṛtam cāru induḥ

original: RV_09.097.25.1{15} arvāniva śravase sātimachendrasya vāyorabhi vītimarṣa
analyzed: arvān iva śravase sātimachā indrasya vāyoḥ abhi vītimarṣa

original: RV_09.097.25.2{15} sa naḥ sahasrā bṛhatīriṣo dā bhavā soma draviṇovit punānaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ sahasrā bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ dāḥ bhava soma draviṇaḥ vid punānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.26.1{16} devāvyo naḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ kṣayaṃ suvīraṃ dhanvantu somāḥ
analyzed: devāvyaḥ naḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ kṣayam su vīram dhanvantu somāḥ

original: RV_09.097.26.2{16} āyajyavaḥ sumatiṃ viśvavārā hotāro na diviyajo mandratamāḥ
analyzed: āyajyavaḥ sumatim viśva vārāḥ hotāraḥ na diviyajaḥ mandratamāḥ

original: RV_09.097.27.1{16} evā deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarase devapānaḥ
analyzed: eva deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarase deva pānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.27.2{16} mahaścid dhi ṣmasi hitāḥ samarye kṛdhi suṣṭhāne rodasī punānaḥ
analyzed: mahaścit hi smasi hitāḥ samarye kṛdhi suṣṭhāne rodasī punānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.28.1{16} aśvo no krado vṛṣabhiryujānaḥ siṃho na bhīmo manaso javīyān
analyzed: aśvaḥ naḥ kradaḥ vṛṣabhiḥ yujānaḥ siṃhaḥ na bhīmaḥ manasaḥ javīyān

original: RV_09.097.28.2{16} arvācīnaiḥ pathibhirye rajiṣṭhā ā pavasva saumanasaṃ na indo
analyzed: arvācīnaiḥ pathibhiḥ ye rajiṣṭhāḥ ā pavasva saumanasam naḥ indo

original: RV_09.097.29.1{16} śataṃ dhārā devajātā asṛgran sahasramenāḥ kavayo mṛjanti
analyzed: śatam dhārāḥ deva jātāḥ asṛgran sahasram enāḥ kavayaḥ mṛjanti

original: RV_09.097.29.2{16} indo sanitraṃ diva ā pavasva puraetāsi mahato dhanasya
analyzed: indo sanitram divaḥ ā pavasva puraetā asi mahataḥ dhanasya

original: RV_09.097.30.1{16} divo na sargā asasṛgramahnāṃ rājā na mitraṃ pra minātidhīraḥ
analyzed: divaḥ na sargāḥ asasṛgram ahnām rājā na mitram pra mināti dhīraḥ

original: RV_09.097.30.2{16} piturna putraḥ kratubhiryatāna ā pavasva viśeasyā ajītim
analyzed: pituḥ na putraḥ kratubhiḥ yatānaḥ ā pavasva viśeasyai ajītim

original: RV_09.097.31.1{17} pra te dhārā madhumatīrasṛgran vārān yat pūto atyeṣyavyān
analyzed: pra te dhārāḥ madhumatīḥ asṛgran vārān yat pūtaḥ atyeṣyavyān

original: RV_09.097.31.2{17} pavamāna pavase dhāma gonāṃ jajñānaḥ sūryamapinvo arkaiḥ
analyzed: pavamāna pavase dhāma gonām jajñānaḥ sūryam apinvaḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_09.097.32.1{17} kanikradadanu panthām ṛtasya śukro vi bhāsyamṛtasya dhāma
analyzed: kanikradat anu panthām ṛtasya śukraḥ vi bhāsyam ṛtasya dhāma

original: RV_09.097.32.2{17} sa indrāya pavase matsaravān hinvāno vācaṃ matibhiḥ kavīnām
analyzed: saḥ indrāya pavase matsaravān hinvānaḥ vācam matibhiḥ kavīnām

original: RV_09.097.33.1{17} divyaḥ suparṇo 'va cakṣi soma pinvan dhārāḥ karmaṇā devavītau
analyzed: divyaḥ suparṇaḥ va cakṣi soma pinvan dhārāḥ karmaṇā deva vītau

original: RV_09.097.33.2{17} endo viśa kalaśaṃ somadhānaṃ krandannihi sūryasyopa raśmim
analyzed: ā indo viśa kalaśam soma dhānam krandan ihi sūryasya upa raśmim

original: RV_09.097.34.1{17} tisro vāca īrayati pra vahnir{ṛ}tasya dhītiṃ brahmaṇo manīṣām
analyzed: tisraḥ vācaḥ īrayati pra vahniḥ ṛtasya dhītim brahmaṇaḥ manīṣām

original: RV_09.097.34.2{17} gāvo yanti gopatiṃ pṛchamānāḥ somaṃ yanti matayo vāvaśānāḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ yanti gopatim pṛcchamānāḥ somam yanti matayaḥ vāvaśānāḥ

original: RV_09.097.35.1{17} somaṃ gāvo dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ somaṃ viprā matibhiḥ pṛchamānāḥ
analyzed: somam gāvaḥ dhenavaḥ vāvaśānāḥ somam viprāḥ matibhiḥ pṛcchamānāḥ

original: RV_09.097.35.2{17} somaḥ sutaḥ pūyate ajyamānaḥ some arkāstriṣṭubhiḥ saṃ navante
analyzed: somaḥ sutaḥ pūyate ajyamānaḥ some arkāḥ triṣṭubhiḥ sam navante

original: RV_09.097.36.1{18} evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāna ā pavasva pūyamānaḥ svasti
analyzed: eva naḥ soma pariṣicyamānaḥ ā pavasva pūyamānaḥ svasti

original: RV_09.097.36.2{18} indramā viśa bṛhatā raveṇa vardhayā vācaṃ janayā purandhim
analyzed: indra mā viśa bṛhatā raveṇa vardhaya vācam janaya purandhim

original: RV_09.097.37.1{18} ā jāgṛvirvipra ṛtā matīnāṃ somaḥ punāno asadaccamūṣu
analyzed: ā jāgṛviḥ vipraḥ ṛtā matīnām somaḥ punānaḥ asadat camūṣu

original: RV_09.097.37.2{18} sapanti yaṃ mithunāso nikāmā adhvaryavo rathirāsaḥ suhastāḥ
analyzed: sapanti yam mithunāsaḥ nikāmāḥ adhvaryavaḥ rathirāsaḥ su hastāḥ

original: RV_09.097.38.1{18} sa punāna upa sūre na dhātobhe aprā rodasī vi ṣa āvaḥ
analyzed: sa punānaḥ upa sūre na dhātā ubhe aprāḥ rodasī vi saḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_09.097.38.2{18} priyā cid yasya priyasāsa ūtī sa tū dhanaṃ kāriṇena pra yaṃsat
analyzed: priyā cit yasya priyasāsaḥ ūtī sa tu dhanam kāriṇena pra yaṃsat

original: RV_09.097.39.1{18} sa vardhitā vardhanaḥ pūyamānaḥ somo mīḍhvānabhi no jyotiṣāvīt
analyzed: sa vardhitā vardhanaḥ pūyamānaḥ somaḥ mīḍhvān abhi naḥ jyotiṣā āvīt

original: RV_09.097.39.2{18} yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñāḥ svarvido abhi gā adrimuṣṇan
analyzed: yena naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pada jñāḥ svar vidaḥ abhi gāḥ adrim uṣṇan

original: RV_09.097.40.1{18} akrān samudraḥ prathame vidharmañ janayan prajā bhuvanasyarājā
analyzed: akrān samudraḥ prathame vidharmam janayan prajāḥ bhuvanasya rājā

original: RV_09.097.40.2{18} vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avye bṛhat somo vāvṛdhe suvāna induḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avye bṛhat somaḥ vāvṛdhe suvānaḥ induḥ

original: RV_09.097.41.1{19} mahat tat somo mahiṣaścakārāpāṃ yad garbho 'vṛṇīta devān
analyzed: mahat tat somaḥ mahiṣaḥ cakāra apām yat garbhaḥ vṛṇīta devān

original: RV_09.097.41.2{19} adadhādindre pavamāna ojo 'janayat sūrye jyotirinduḥ
analyzed: adadhāt indre pavamānaḥ ojaḥ janayat sūrye jyotiḥ induḥ

original: RV_09.097.42.1{19} matsi vāyumiṣṭaye rādhase ca matsi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ
analyzed: matsi vāyum iṣṭaye rādhase ca matsi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.42.2{19} matsi śardho mārutaṃ matsi devān matsi dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma
analyzed: matsi śardhaḥ mārutam matsi devān matsi dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma

original: RV_09.097.43.1{19} ṛjuḥ pavasva vṛjinasya hantāpāmīvāṃ bādhamāno mṛdhaśca
analyzed: ṛjuḥ pavasva vṛjinasya hantā apa amīvām bādhamānaḥ mṛdhaḥ ca

original: RV_09.097.43.2{19} abhiśrīṇan payaḥ payasābhi gonāmindrasya tvaṃ tava vayaṃ sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: abhiśrīṇan payaḥ payasā abhi gonām indrasya tvam tava vayam sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_09.097.44.1{19} madhvaḥ sūdaṃ pavasva vasva utsaṃ vīraṃ ca na ā pavasvā bhagaṃ ca
analyzed: madhvaḥ sūdam pavasva vasvaḥ utsam vīram ca naḥ ā pavasva bhagam ca

original: RV_09.097.44.2{19} svadasvendrāya pavamāna indo rayiṃ ca na ā pavasvā samudrāt
analyzed: svadasva indrāya pavamānaḥ indoḥ rayim ca naḥ ā pavasva samudrāt

original: RV_09.097.45.1{19} somaḥ suto dhārayātyo na hitvā sindhurna nimnamabhi vājyakṣāḥ
analyzed: somaḥ sutaḥ dhāraya atyaḥ na hitvā sindhuḥ na nimnam abhi vājī akṣāḥ

original: RV_09.097.45.2{19} ā yoniṃ vanyamasadat punānaḥ samindurgobhirasarat samadbhiḥ
analyzed: ā yonim vanyam asadat punānaḥ sam induḥ gobhiḥ asarat samadbhiḥ

original: RV_09.097.46.1{20} eṣa sya te pavata indra somaścamūṣu dhīra uśate tavasvān
analyzed: eṣa sya te pavate indra somaḥ camūṣu dhīraḥ uśate tavasvān

original: RV_09.097.46.2{20} svarcakṣā rathiraḥ satyaśuṣmaḥ kāmo na yo devayatāmasarji
analyzed: svar cakṣāḥ rathiraḥ satya śuṣmaḥ kāmaḥ na yaḥ devayatām asarji

original: RV_09.097.47.1{20} eṣa pratnena vayasā punānastiro varpāṃsi duhiturdadhānaḥ
analyzed: eṣa pratnena vayasā punānaḥ tiras varpāṃsi duhituḥ dadhānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.47.2{20} vasānaḥ śarma trivarūthamapsu hoteva yāti samaneṣurebhan
analyzed: vasānaḥ śarma tri varūtham apsu hotā iva yāti samaneṣuḥ ebhan

original: RV_09.097.48.1{20} nū nastvaṃ rathiro deva soma pari srava camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ
analyzed: nu naḥ tvam rathiraḥ deva soma pari srava camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.48.2{20} apsu svādiṣṭho madhumān ṛtāvā devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā
analyzed: apsu svādiṣṭhaḥ madhumān ṛtāvā devaḥ na yaḥ savitā satya manmā

original: RV_09.097.49.1{20} abhi vāyuṃ vītyarṣā gṛṇāno 'bhi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ
analyzed: abhi vāyum vītyarṣa gṛṇānaḥ bhi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.49.2{20} abhī naraṃ dhījavanaṃ ratheṣṭhāmabhīndraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhum
analyzed: abhi naram dhī javanam ratheṣṭhām abhi indram vṛṣaṇam vajra bāhum

original: RV_09.097.50.1{20} abhi vastrā suvasanānyarṣābhi dhenūḥ sudughāḥ pūyamānaḥ
analyzed: abhi vastrā su vasanāni arṣa abhi dhenūḥ su dughāḥ pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.50.2{20} abhi candrā bhartave no hiraṇyābhyaśvān rathino deva soma
analyzed: abhi candrā bhartave naḥ hiraṇyā abhi aśvān rathinaḥ deva soma

original: RV_09.097.51.1{21} abhī no arṣa divyā vasūnyabhi viśvā pārthivā pūyamānaḥ
analyzed: abhi naḥ arṣa divyā vasūni abhi viśvā pārthivā pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.51.2{21} abhi yena draviṇamaśnavāmābhyarṣeyaṃ jamadagnivannaḥ
analyzed: abhi yena draviṇam aśnavāma abhyarṣeyam jamadagni vat naḥ

original: RV_09.097.52.1{21} ayā pavā pavasvainā vasūni māṃścatva indo sarasi pra dhanva
analyzed: ayā pavā pavasva enā vasūni māṃścatve indo sarasi pra dhanva

original: RV_09.097.52.2{21} bradhnaścidatra vāto na jātaḥ purumedhaścit takave naraṃ dāt
analyzed: bradhnaḥ cit atra vātaḥ na jātaḥ puru medhaḥ cit takave naram dāt

original: RV_09.097.53.1{21} uta na enā pavayā pavasvādhi śrute śravāyyasya tīrthe
analyzed: uta naḥ enā pavayā pavasva adhi śrute śravāyyasya tīrthe

original: RV_09.097.53.2{21} ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā naiguto vasūni vṛkṣaṃ na pakvaṃ dhūnavad raṇāya
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim sahasrā naigutaḥ vasūni vṛkṣam na pakvam dhūnavat raṇāya

original: RV_09.097.54.1{21} mahīme asya vṛṣanāma śūṣe māṃścatve vā pṛśane vā vadhatre
analyzed: mahi ime asya vṛṣa nāma śūṣe māṃścatve vā pṛśane vā vadhatre

original: RV_09.097.54.2{21} asvāpayan nigutaḥ snehayaccāpāmitrānapācito acetaḥ
analyzed: asvāpayat nigutaḥ snehayat ca apa amitra anapā citaḥ acetaḥ

original: RV_09.097.55.1{21} saṃ trī pavitrā vitatānyeṣyanvekaṃ dhāvasi pūyamānaḥ
analyzed: sam trī pavitrā vitatāni eṣi anu ekam dhāvasi pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_09.097.55.2{21} asi bhago asi dātrasya dātāsi maghavā maghavadbhya indo
analyzed: asi bhagaḥ asi dātrasya dātā asi maghavā maghavadbhyaḥ indo

original: RV_09.097.56.1{22} eṣa viśvavit pavate manīṣī somo viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā
analyzed: eṣa viśva vid pavate manīṣī somaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā

original: RV_09.097.56.2{22} drapsānīrayan vidatheṣvindurvi vāramavyaṃ samayāti yāti
analyzed: drapsān īrayan vidatheṣu induḥ vi vāram avyam samayā ati yāti

original: RV_09.097.57.1{22} induṃ rihanti mahiṣā adabdhāḥ pade rebhanti kavayo na gṛdhrāḥ
analyzed: indum rihanti mahiṣāḥ adabdhāḥ pade rebhanti kavayaḥ na gṛdhrāḥ

original: RV_09.097.57.2{22} hinvanti dhīrā daśabhiḥ kṣipābhiḥ samañjate rūpamapāṃ rasena
analyzed: hinvanti dhīrāḥ daśabhiḥ kṣipābhiḥ samañjate rūpam apām rasena

original: RV_09.097.58.1{22} tvayā vayaṃ pavamānena soma bhare kṛtaṃ vi cinuyāma śaśvat
analyzed: tvayā vayam pavamānena soma bhare kṛtam vi cinuyāma śaśvat

original: RV_09.097.58.2{22} tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantāmaditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivīuta dyauḥ
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_09.098.01.1{23} abhi no vājasātamaṃ rayimarṣa puruspṛham
analyzed: abhi naḥ vāja sātamam rayi marṣa puruspṛham

original: RV_09.098.01.2{23} indo sahasrabharṇasaṃ tuvidyumnaṃ vibhvāsaham
analyzed: indo sahasrabharṇasam tuvi dyumnam vibhvāsaham

original: RV_09.098.02.1{23} pari ṣya suvāno:
analyzed: pari sya suvānaḥ

original: avyayaṃ rathe na varmāvyata
analyzed: avyayam rathe na varma āvyata

original: RV_09.098.02.2{23} indurabhidruṇā hito hiyāno dhārābhirakṣāḥ
analyzed: induḥ abhidruṇā hitaḥ hiyānaḥ dhārā abhirakṣāḥ

original: RV_09.098.03.1{23} pari ṣya suvāno akṣā induravye madacyutaḥ
analyzed: pari sya suvānaḥ akṣāḥ indu ravye mada cyutaḥ

original: RV_09.098.03.2{23} dhārā ya ūrdhvo adhvare bhrājā naiti gavyayuḥ
analyzed: dhārā yaḥ ūrdhvaḥ adhvare bhrājā na eti gavyayuḥ

original: RV_09.098.04.1{23} sa hi tvaṃ deva śaśvate vasu martāya dāśuṣe
analyzed: sa hi tvam deva śaśvate vasu martāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_09.098.04.2{23} indo sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ śatātmānaṃ vivāsasi
analyzed: indo sahasriṇam rayim śata ātmānam vivāsasi

original: RV_09.098.05.1{23} vayaṃ te asya vṛtrahan vaso vasvaḥ puruspṛhaḥ
analyzed: vayam te asya vṛtra han vaso vasvaḥ puruspṛhaḥ

original: RV_09.098.05.2{23} ni nediṣṭhatamā iṣaḥ syāma sumnasyādhrigo
analyzed: ni nediṣṭhatamāḥ iṣaḥ syāma sumnasya adhrigo

original: RV_09.098.06.1{23} dviryaṃ pañca svayaśasaṃ svasāro adrisaṃhatam
analyzed: dvis yam pañca sva yaśasam svasāraḥ adri saṃhatam

original: RV_09.098.06.2{23} priyamindrasya kāmyaṃ prasnāpayantyūrmiṇam
analyzed: priyam indrasya kāmyam prasnāpayanti ūrmiṇam

original: RV_09.098.07.1{24} pari tyaṃ haryataṃ hariṃ babhruṃ punanti vāreṇa
analyzed: pari tyam haryatam harim babhrum punanti vāreṇa

original: RV_09.098.07.2{24} yo devān viśvānit pari madena saha gachati
analyzed: yaḥ devān viśvān id pari madena saha gacchati

original: RV_09.098.08.1{24} asya vo hyavasā pānto dakṣasādhanam
