analyzed: asya vaḥ hi avasā pāntaḥ dakṣa sādhanam

original: RV_09.098.08.2{24} yaḥ sūriṣu śravobṛhad dadhe svarṇa haryataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sūriṣu śravaḥ bṛhat dadhe svarṇa haryataḥ

original: RV_09.098.09.1{24} sa vāṃ yajñeṣu mānavī indurjaniṣṭa rodasī
analyzed: sa vām yajñeṣu mānavī induḥ janiṣṭa rodasī

original: RV_09.098.09.2{24} devo devī giriṣṭhā asredhan taṃ tuviṣvaṇi
analyzed: devaḥ devī giriṣṭhāḥ asredhan tam tuviṣvaṇi

original: RV_09.098.10.1{24} indrāya soma pātave vṛtraghne pari ṣicyase
analyzed: indrāya soma pātave vṛtra ghne pari sicyase

original: RV_09.098.10.2{24} nare ca dakṣiṇāvate devāya sadanāsade
analyzed: nare ca dakṣiṇāvate devāya sadanāsade

original: RV_09.098.11.1{24} te pratnāso vyuṣṭiṣu somāḥ pavitre akṣaran
analyzed: te pratnāsaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu somāḥ pavitre akṣaran

original: RV_09.098.11.2{24} apaprothantaḥ sanutarhuraścitaḥ prātastānapracetasaḥ
analyzed: apaprothantaḥ sanutar huraścitaḥ prātastāna pracetasaḥ

original: RV_09.098.12.1{24} taṃ sakhāyaḥ purorucaṃ yūyaṃ vayaṃ ca sūrayaḥ
analyzed: tam sakhāyaḥ purorucam yūyam vayam ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_09.098.12.2{24} aśyāma vājagandhyaṃ sanema vājapastyam
analyzed: aśyāma vājagandhyam sanema vāja pastyam

original: RV_09.099.01.1{25} ā haryatāya dhṛṣṇave dhanustanvanti pauṃsyam
analyzed: ā haryatāya dhṛṣṇave dhanuḥ tanvanti pauṃsyam

original: RV_09.099.01.2{25} śukrāṃvayantyasurāya nirṇijaṃ vipāmagre mahīyuvaḥ
analyzed: śukrām vayanti asurāya nirṇijam vipām agre mahīyuvaḥ

original: RV_09.099.02.1{25} adha kṣapā pariṣkṛto vājānabhi pra gāhate
analyzed: adha kṣapā pariṣkṛtaḥ vājān abhi pra gāhate

original: RV_09.099.02.2{25} yadī vivasvato dhiyo hariṃ hinvanti yātave
analyzed: yadī vivasvataḥ dhiyaḥ harim hinvanti yātave

original: RV_09.099.03.1{25} tamasya marjayāmasi mado ya indrapātamaḥ
analyzed: tamasya marjayāmasi madaḥ yaḥ indra pātamaḥ

original: RV_09.099.03.2{25} yaṃ gāva āsabhirdadhuḥ purā nūnaṃ ca sūrayaḥ
analyzed: yam gāvaḥ āsabhiḥ dadhuḥ purā nūnam ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_09.099.04.1{25} taṃ gāthayā purāṇyā punānamabhyanūṣata
analyzed: tam gāthayā purāṇyā punānam abhyanūṣata

original: RV_09.099.04.2{25} uto kṛpantadhītayo devānāṃ nāma bibhratīḥ
analyzed: uta u kṛpanta dhītayaḥ devānām nāma bibhratīḥ

original: RV_09.099.05.1{25} tamukṣamāṇamavyaye vāre punanti dharṇasim
analyzed: tam ukṣamāṇam avyaye vāre punanti dharṇasim

original: RV_09.099.05.2{25} dūtaṃ na pūrvacittaya ā śāsate manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: dūtam na pūrvacittaye ā śāsate manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_09.099.06.1{26} sa punāno madintamaḥ somaścamūṣu sīdati
analyzed: sa punānaḥ madintamaḥ somaḥ camūṣu sīdati

original: RV_09.099.06.2{26} paśau na reta ādadhat patirvacasyate dhiyaḥ
analyzed: paśau na retaḥ ādadhat patiḥ vacasyate dhiyaḥ

original: RV_09.099.07.1{26} sa mṛjyate sukarmabhirdevo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: sa mṛjyate su karmabhiḥ devaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_09.099.07.2{26} vide yadāsu sandadirmahīrapo vi gāhate
analyzed: vide yadāsu sandadiḥ mahīḥ apaḥ vi gāhate

original: RV_09.099.08.1{26} suta indo pavitra ā nṛbhiryato vi nīyase
analyzed: sutaḥ indo pavitre ā nṛbhiḥ yataḥ vi nīyase

original: RV_09.099.08.2{26} indrāya matsarintamaścamūṣvā ni ṣīdasi
analyzed: indrāya matsarintamaḥ camū uṣva ā ni sīdasi

original: RV_09.100.01.1{27} abhī navante adruhaḥ priyamindrasya kāmyam
analyzed: abhi navante adruhaḥ priyam indrasya kāmyam

original: RV_09.100.01.2{27} vatsaṃ na pūrva āyuni jātaṃ rihanti mātaraḥ
analyzed: vatsam na pūrve āyuni jātam rihanti mātaraḥ

original: RV_09.100.02.1{27} punāna indavā bhara soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim
analyzed: punānaḥ indavā bhara soma dvibarhasam rayim

original: RV_09.100.02.2{27} tvaṃ vasūnipuṣyasi viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe
analyzed: tvam vasūni puṣyasi viśvāni dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_09.100.03.1{27} tvaṃ dhiyaṃ manoyujaṃ sṛjā vṛṣṭiṃ na tanyatuḥ
analyzed: tvam dhiyam manaḥ yujam sṛja vṛṣṭim na tanyatuḥ

original: RV_09.100.03.2{27} tvaṃ vasūni pārthivā divyā ca soma puṣyasi
analyzed: tvam vasūni pārthivā divyā ca soma puṣyasi

original: RV_09.100.04.1{27} pari te jigyuṣo yathā dhārā sutasya dhāvati
analyzed: pari te jigyuṣaḥ yathā dhārā sutasya dhāvati

original: RV_09.100.04.2{27} raṃhamāṇāvyavyayaṃ vāraṃ vājīva sānasiḥ
analyzed: raṃhamāṇa avi avyayam vāram vājī iva sānasiḥ

original: RV_09.100.05.1{27} kratve dakṣāya naḥ kave pavasva soma dhārayā
analyzed: kratve dakṣāya naḥ kave pavasva soma dhārayā

original: RV_09.100.05.2{27} indrāya pātave suto mitrāya varuṇāya ca
analyzed: indrāya pātave sutaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya ca

original: RV_09.100.06.1{28} pavasva vājasātamaḥ pavitre dhārayā sutaḥ
analyzed: pavasva vāja sātamaḥ pavitre dhārayā sutaḥ

original: RV_09.100.06.2{28} indrāya somaviṣṇave devebhyo madhumattamaḥ
analyzed: indrāya soma viṣṇave devebhyaḥ madhumattamaḥ

original: RV_09.100.07.1{28} tvāṃ rihanti mātaro hariṃ pavitre adruhaḥ
analyzed: tvām rihanti mātaraḥ harim pavitre adruhaḥ

original: RV_09.100.07.2{28} vatsaṃ jātaṃna dhenavaḥ pavamāna vidharmaṇi
analyzed: vatsam jātaṃna dhenavaḥ pavamāna vidharmaṇi

original: RV_09.100.08.1{28} pavamāna mahi śravaścitrebhiryāsi raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: pavamāna mahi śravaḥ citrebhiḥ yāsi raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_09.100.08.2{28} śardhan tamāṃsi jighnase viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe
analyzed: śardhan tamāṃsi jighnase viśvāni dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_09.100.09.1{28} tvaṃ dyāṃ ca mahivrata pṛthivīṃ cāti jabhriṣe
analyzed: tvam dyām ca mahi vrata pṛthivīm ca ati jabhriṣe

original: RV_09.100.09.2{28} prati drāpimamuñcathāḥ pavamāna mahitvanā
analyzed: prati drāpim amuñcathāḥ pavamāna mahitvanā

original: RV_09.101.01.1{01} purojitī vo andhasaḥ sutāya mādayitnave
analyzed: purojitī vaḥ andhasaḥ sutāya mādayitnave

original: RV_09.101.01.2{01} apa śvānaṃ śnathiṣṭana sakhāyo dīrghajihvyam
analyzed: apa śvānam śnathiṣṭana sakhāyaḥ dīrghajihvyam

original: RV_09.101.02.1{01} yo dhārayā pāvakayā pariprasyandate sutaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ dhārayā pāvakayā pariprasyandate sutaḥ

original: RV_09.101.02.2{01} induraśvo na kṛtvyaḥ
analyzed: induḥ aśvaḥ na kṛtvyaḥ

original: RV_09.101.03.1{01} taṃ duroṣamabhī naraḥ somaṃ viśvācyā dhiyā
analyzed: tam duroṣam abhi naraḥ somam viśvācyā dhiyā

original: RV_09.101.03.2{01} yajñaṃ hinvantyadribhiḥ
analyzed: yajñam hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_09.101.04.1{01} sutāso madhumattamāḥ somā indrāya mandinaḥ
analyzed: sutāsaḥ madhumattamāḥ somāḥ indrāya mandinaḥ

original: RV_09.101.04.2{01} pavitravantoakṣaran devān gachantu vo madāḥ
analyzed: pavitravantaḥ akṣaran devān gachantu vaḥ madāḥ

original: RV_09.101.05.1{01} indurindrāya pavata iti devāso abruvan
analyzed: induḥ indrāya pavate iti devāsaḥ abruvan

original: RV_09.101.05.2{01} vācas patirmakhasyate viśvasyeśāna ojasā
analyzed: vācaḥ patiḥ makhasyate viśvasya īśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_09.101.06.1{02} sahasradhāraḥ pavate samudro vācamīṅkhayaḥ
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ pavate samudraḥ vācamīṅkhayaḥ

original: RV_09.101.06.2{02} somaḥ patī rayīṇāṃ sakhendrasya dive-dive
analyzed: somaḥ patiḥ rayīṇām sakhā indrasya dive dive

original: RV_09.101.07.1{02} ayaṃ pūṣā rayirbhagaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati
analyzed: ayam pūṣā rayiḥ bhagaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_09.101.07.2{02} patirviśvasya bhūmano vyakhyad rodasī ubhe
analyzed: patiḥ viśvasya bhūmanaḥ vyakhyat rodasī ubhe

original: RV_09.101.08.1{02} samu priyā anūṣata gāvo madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ
analyzed: samu priyāḥ anūṣata gāvaḥ madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ

original: RV_09.101.08.2{02} somāsaḥ kṛṇvate pathaḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ
analyzed: somāsaḥ kṛṇvate pathaḥ pavamānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_09.101.09.1{02} ya ojiṣṭhastamā bhara pavamana śravāyyam
analyzed: yaḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ tam ā bhara pavamana śravāyyam

original: RV_09.101.09.2{02} yaḥ pañcacarṣaṇīrabhi rayiṃ yena vanāmahai
analyzed: yaḥ pañcacarṣaṇīḥ abhi rayim yena vanāmahai

original: RV_09.101.10.1{02} somāḥ pavanta indavo 'smabhyaṃ gātuvittamaḥ
analyzed: somāḥ pavante indavaḥ smabhyam gātu vittamaḥ

original: RV_09.101.10.2{02} mitrāḥ suvānā arepasaḥ svādhyaḥ svarvidaḥ
analyzed: mitrāḥ suvānāḥ arepasaḥ svādhyaḥ svar vidaḥ

original: RV_09.101.11.1{03} suṣvāṇāso vyadribhiścitānā goradhi tvaci
analyzed: suṣvāṇāsaḥ vyadribhiḥ citānāḥ goḥ adhi tvaci

original: RV_09.101.11.2{03} iṣamasmabhyamabhitaḥ samasvaran vasuvidaḥ
analyzed: iṣam asmabhyam abhitas samasvaran vasu vidaḥ

original: RV_09.101.12.1{03} ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ
analyzed: ete pūtāḥ vipaścitaḥ somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_09.101.12.2{03} sūryāso na darśatāso jigatnavo dhruvā ghṛte
analyzed: sūryāsaḥ na darśatāsaḥ jigatnavaḥ dhruvāḥ ghṛte

original: RV_09.101.13.1{03} pra sunvānasyāndhaso marto na vṛta tad vacaḥ
analyzed: pra sunvānasya andhasaḥ martaḥ na vṛta tat vacaḥ

original: RV_09.101.13.2{03} apa śvānamarādhasaṃ hatā makhaṃ na bhṛgavaḥ
analyzed: apa śvānam arādhasam hatāḥ makham na bhṛgavaḥ

original: RV_09.101.14.1{03} ā jāmiratke avyata bhuje na putra oṇyoḥ
analyzed: ā jāmiratke avyata bhuje na putraḥ oṇyoḥ

original: RV_09.101.14.2{03} sarajjāro na yoṣaṇāṃ varo na yonimāsadam
analyzed: sarat jāraḥ na yoṣaṇām varaḥ na yonim āsadam

original: RV_09.101.15.1{03} sa vīro dakṣasādhano vi yastastambha rodasī
analyzed: sa vīraḥ dakṣa sādhanaḥ vi yastastambha rodasī

original: RV_09.101.15.2{03} hariḥ pavitre avyata vedhā na yonimāsadam
analyzed: hariḥ pavitre avyata vedhāḥ na yonim āsadam

original: RV_09.101.16.1{03} avyo vārebhiḥ pavate somo gavye adhi tvaci
analyzed: avyaḥ vārebhiḥ pavate somaḥ gavye adhi tvaci

original: RV_09.101.16.2{03} kanikradad vṛṣā haririndrasyābhyeti niṣkṛtam
analyzed: kanikradat vṛṣā hariḥ indrasya abhyeti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_09.102.01.1{04} krāṇā śiśurmahīnāṃ hinvannṛtasya dīdhitim
analyzed: krāṇā śiśuḥ mahīnām hinvan nṛtasya dīdhitim

original: RV_09.102.01.2{04} viśvāpari priyā bhuvadadha dvitā
analyzed: viśvā apari priyā bhuvat adha dvitā

original: RV_09.102.02.1{04} upa tritasya pāṣyorabhakta yad guhā padam
analyzed: upa tritasya pāṣyoḥ abhakta yat guhā padam

original: RV_09.102.02.2{04} yajñasya sapta dhāmabhiradha priyam
analyzed: yajñasya sapta dhāmabhiḥ adha priyam

original: RV_09.102.03.1{04} trīṇi tritasya dhārayā pṛṣṭheṣverayā rayim
analyzed: trīṇi tritasya dhāraya pṛṣṭheṣu ā iraya rayim

original: RV_09.102.03.2{04} mimīte asya yojanā vi sukratuḥ
analyzed: mimīte asya yojanā vi sukratuḥ

original: RV_09.102.04.1{04} jajñānaṃ sapta mātaro vedhāmaśāsata śriye
analyzed: jajñānam sapta mātaraḥ vedhām aśāsata śriye

original: RV_09.102.04.2{04} ayaṃ dhruvo rayīṇāṃ ciketa yat
analyzed: ayam dhruvaḥ rayīṇām ciketa yat

original: RV_09.102.05.1{04} asya vrate sajoṣaso viśve devāso adruhaḥ
analyzed: asya vrate sajoṣasaḥ viśve devāsaḥ adruhaḥ

original: RV_09.102.05.2{04} spārhā bhavanti rantayo juṣanta yat
analyzed: spārhāḥ bhavanti rantayaḥ juṣanta yat

original: RV_09.102.06.1{05} yamī garbham ṛtāvṛdho dṛśe cārumajījanan
analyzed: yamī garbham ṛtāvṛdhaḥ dṛśe cārum ajījanan

original: RV_09.102.06.2{05} kaviṃ maṃhiṣṭhamadhvare puruspṛham
analyzed: kavim maṃhiṣṭham adhvare puruspṛham

original: RV_09.102.07.1{05} samīcīne abhi tmanā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā
analyzed: samīcīne abhi tmanā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā

original: RV_09.102.07.2{05} tanvānā yajñamānuṣag yadañjate
analyzed: tanvānāḥ yajña mānuṣak yat añjate

original: RV_09.102.08.1{05} kratvā śukrebhirakṣabhir{ṛ}ṇorapa vrajaṃ divaḥ
analyzed: kratvā śukrebhiḥ akṣabhiḥ ṛṇoḥ apa vrajam divaḥ

original: RV_09.102.08.2{05} hinvannṛtasya dīdhitiṃ prādhvare
analyzed: hinvan ṛtasya dīdhitim pra adhvare

original: RV_09.103.01.1{06} pra punānāya vedhase somāya vaca udyatam
analyzed: pra punānāya vedhase somāya vacaḥ udyatam

original: RV_09.103.01.2{06} bhṛtiṃ na bharā matibhirjujoṣate
analyzed: bhṛtim na bharā matibhiḥ jujoṣate

original: RV_09.103.02.1{06} pari vārāṇyavyayā gobhirañjāno arṣati
analyzed: pari vārāṇi avyayā gobhiḥ añjānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_09.103.02.2{06} trī ṣadhasthā punānaḥ kṛṇute hariḥ
analyzed: trī sadhasthā punānaḥ kṛṇute hariḥ

original: RV_09.103.03.1{06} pari kośaṃ madhuścutamavyaye vāre arṣati
analyzed: pari kośam madhuścutam avyaye vāre arṣati

original: RV_09.103.03.2{06} abhi vāṇīr{ṛ}ṣīṇāṃ sapta nūṣata
analyzed: abhi vāṇīḥ ṛṣīṇām sapta nūṣata

original: RV_09.103.04.1{06} pari ṇetā matīnāṃ viśvadevo adābhyaḥ
analyzed: pari netā matīnām viśva devaḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_09.103.04.2{06} somaḥ punānaścamvorviśad dhariḥ
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ camvoḥ viśat hariḥ

original: RV_09.103.05.1{06} pari daivīranu svadhā indreṇa yāhi saratham
analyzed: pari daivīḥ anu svadhāḥ indreṇa yāhi sa ratham

original: RV_09.103.05.2{06} punāno vāghad vāghadbhiramartyaḥ
analyzed: punānaḥ vāghat vāghadbhiḥ amartyaḥ

original: RV_09.103.06.1{06} pari saptirna vājayurdevo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: pari saptiḥ na vājayuḥ devaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_09.103.06.2{06} vyānaśiḥ pavamāno vi dhāvati
analyzed: vyānaśiḥ pavamānaḥ vi dhāvati

original: RV_09.104.01.1{07} sakhāya ā ni śīdata punānāya pra gāyata
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ ā ni śīdata punānāya pra gāyata

original: RV_09.104.01.2{07} śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ pari bhūṣata śriye
analyzed: śiśum na yajñaiḥ pari bhūṣata śriye

original: RV_09.104.02.1{07} samī vatsaṃ na mātṛbhiḥ sṛjatā gayasādhanam
analyzed: samī vatsam na mātṛbhiḥ sṛjatā gaya sādhanam

original: RV_09.104.02.2{07} devāvyammadamabhi dviśavasam
analyzed: devāvyam madam abhi dvi śavasam

original: RV_09.104.03.1{07} punātā dakṣasādhanaṃ yathā śardhāya vītaye
analyzed: punāta dakṣa sādhanam yathā śardhāya vītaye

original: RV_09.104.03.2{07} yathā mitrāya varuṇāya śantamaḥ
analyzed: yathā mitrāya varuṇāya śantamaḥ

original: RV_09.104.04.1{07} asmabhyaṃ tvā vasuvidamabhi vāṇīranūṣata
analyzed: asmabhyam tvā vasu vidam abhi vāṇīḥ anūṣata

original: RV_09.104.04.2{07} gobhiṣ ṭe varṇamabhi vāsayāmasi
analyzed: gobhiḥ te varṇam abhi vāsayāmasi

original: RV_09.104.05.1{07} sa no madānāṃ pata indo devapsarā asi
analyzed: sa naḥ madānām pate indo deva psarāḥ asi

original: RV_09.104.05.2{07} sakheva sakhye gātuvittamo bhava
analyzed: sakhā iva sakhye gātu vittamaḥ bhava

original: RV_09.104.06.1{07} sanemi kṛdhyasmadā rakṣasaṃ kaṃ cidatriṇam
analyzed: sanemi kṛdhī asmadā rakṣasam kam cit atriṇam

original: RV_09.104.06.2{07} apādevaṃ dvayumaṃho yuyodhi naḥ
analyzed: dvayum aṃhaḥ yuyodhi naḥ

original: RV_09.105.01.1{08} taṃ vaḥ sakhāyo madāya punānamabhi gāyata
analyzed: tam vaḥ sakhāyaḥ madāya punānam abhi gāyata

original: RV_09.105.01.2{08} śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ svadayanta gūrtibhiḥ
analyzed: śiśum na yajñaiḥ svadayanta gūrtibhiḥ

original: RV_09.105.02.1{08} saṃ vatsa iva mātṛbhirindurhinvāno ajyate
analyzed: sam vatsaḥ iva mātṛbhiḥ induḥ hinvānaḥ ajyate

original: RV_09.105.02.2{08} devāvīrmadomatibhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ
analyzed: pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_09.105.03.1{08} ayaṃ dakṣāya sādhano 'yaṃ śardhāya vītaye
analyzed: ayam dakṣāya sādhanaḥ yam śardhāya vītaye

original: RV_09.105.03.2{08} ayaṃ devebhyo madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: ayam devebhyaḥ madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_09.105.04.1{08} goman na indo aśvavat sutaḥ sudakṣa dhanva
analyzed: gomat naḥ indo aśvavat sutaḥ su dakṣa dhanva

original: RV_09.105.04.2{08} śuciṃ te varṇamadhi goṣu dīdharam
analyzed: śucim te varṇam adhi goṣu dīdharam

original: RV_09.105.05.1{08} sa no harīṇāṃ pata indo devapsarastamaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ harīṇām pate indo deva psarastamaḥ

original: RV_09.105.05.2{08} sakheva sakhye naryo ruce bhava
analyzed: sakhā iva sakhye naryaḥ ruce bhava

original: RV_09.105.06.1{08} sanemi tvamasmadānadevaṃ kaṃ cidatriṇam
analyzed: sanemi tvam asmad ānadevam kam cit atriṇam

original: RV_09.105.06.2{08} sāhvānindo pari bādho apa dvayum
analyzed: sāhvā anindo pari bādhaḥ apa dvayum

original: RV_09.106.01.1{09} indramacha sutā ime vṛṣaṇaṃ yantu harayaḥ
analyzed: indram acha sutāḥ ime vṛṣaṇam yantu harayaḥ

original: RV_09.106.01.2{09} śruṣṭī jātāsa indavaḥ svarvidaḥ
analyzed: śruṣṭī jātāsaḥ indavaḥ svar vidaḥ

original: RV_09.106.02.1{09} ayaṃ bharāya sānasirindrāya pavate sutaḥ
analyzed: ayam bharāya sānasiḥ indrāya pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_09.106.02.2{09} somo jaitrasyacetati yathā vide
analyzed: somaḥ jaitrasya cetati yathā vide

original: RV_09.106.03.1{09} asyedindro madeṣvā grābhaṃ gṛbhṇīta sānasim
analyzed: asya id indraḥ mada iṣvā grābham gṛbhṇīta sānasim

original: RV_09.106.03.2{09} vajraṃca vṛṣaṇaṃ bharat samapsujit
analyzed: vajraṃca vṛṣaṇam bharat sam apsujit

original: RV_09.106.04.1{09} pra dhanvā soma jāgṛvirindrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: pra dhanva soma jāgṛviḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.106.04.2{09} dyumantaṃ śuṣmamā bharā svarvidam
analyzed: dyumantam śuṣmam ā bhara svar vidam

original: RV_09.106.05.1{09} indrāya vṛṣaṇaṃ madaṃ pavasva viśvadarśataḥ
analyzed: indrāya vṛṣaṇam madam pavasva viśva darśataḥ

original: RV_09.106.05.2{09} sahasrayāmā pathikṛd vicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sahasra yāmā pathikṛt vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_09.106.06.1{10} asmabhyaṃ gātuvittamo devebhyo madhumattamaḥ
analyzed: asmabhyam gātu vittamaḥ devebhyaḥ madhumattamaḥ

original: RV_09.106.06.2{10} sahasraṃ yāhipathibhiḥ kanikradat
analyzed: sahasram yāhi pathibhiḥ kanikradat

original: RV_09.106.07.1{10} pavasva devavītaya indo dhārābhirojasā
analyzed: pavasva deva vītaye indo dhārābhiḥ ojasā

original: RV_09.106.07.2{10} ā kalaśaṃ madhumān soma naḥ sadaḥ
analyzed: ā kalaśam madhumān soma naḥ sadaḥ

original: RV_09.106.08.1{10} tava drapsā udapruta indraṃ madāya vāvṛdhuḥ
analyzed: tava drapsāḥ uda prutaḥ indram madāya vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_09.106.08.2{10} tvāṃ devāso amṛtāya kaṃ papuḥ
analyzed: tvām devāsaḥ amṛtāya kam papuḥ

original: RV_09.106.09.1{10} ā naḥ sutāsa indavaḥ punānā dhāvatā rayim
analyzed: ā naḥ sutāsaḥ indavaḥ punānāḥ dhāvata rayim

original: RV_09.106.09.2{10} vṛṣṭidyāvorītyāpaḥ svarvidaḥ
analyzed: svar vidaḥ

original: RV_09.106.10.1{10} somaḥ punāna ūrmiṇāvyo vāraṃ vi dhāvati
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ ūrmiṇā avyaḥ vāram vi dhāvati

original: RV_09.106.10.2{10} agre vācaḥpavamānaḥ kanikradat
analyzed: agre vācaḥpavamānaḥ kanikradat

original: RV_09.106.11.1{11} dhībhirhinvanti vājinaṃ vane krīḷantamatyavim
analyzed: dhībhiḥ hinvanti vājinam vane krīḍantam atyavim

original: RV_09.106.11.2{11} abhi tripṛṣṭhaṃ matayaḥ samasvaran
analyzed: abhi tri pṛṣṭham matayaḥ samasvaran

original: RV_09.106.12.1{11} asarji kalaśānabhi mīḷhe saptirna vājayuḥ
analyzed: asarji kalaśān abhi mīḍhe saptiḥ na vājayuḥ

original: RV_09.106.12.2{11} punāno vācaṃ janayannasiṣyadat
analyzed: punānaḥ vācam janayan asiṣyadat

original: RV_09.106.13.1{11} pavate haryato harirati hvarāṃsi raṃhyā
analyzed: pavate haryataḥ hariḥ ati hvarāṃsi raṃhyā

original: RV_09.106.13.2{11} abhyarṣan stotṛbhyo vīravad yaśaḥ
analyzed: abhyarṣan stotṛbhyaḥ vīravat yaśaḥ

original: RV_09.106.14.1{11} ayā pavasva devayurmadhordhārā asṛkṣata
analyzed: ayā pavasva devayuḥ madhoḥ dhārāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_09.106.14.2{11} rebhan pavitramparyeṣi viśvataḥ
analyzed: rebhan pavitram paryeṣi viśvatas

original: RV_09.107.01.1{12} parīto ṣiñcatā sutaṃ somo ya uttamaṃ haviḥ
analyzed: pari itas siñcata sutam somaḥ yaḥ uttamam haviḥ

original: RV_09.107.01.2{12} dadhanvānyo naryo apsvantarā suṣāva somamadribhiḥ
analyzed: dadhanva anyaḥ naryaḥ apsu antarā suṣāva somam adribhiḥ

original: RV_09.107.02.1{12} nūnaṃ punāno 'vibhiḥ pari sravādabdhaḥ surabhintaraḥ
analyzed: nūnam punānaḥ vibhiḥ pari srava adabdhaḥ surabhintaraḥ

original: RV_09.107.02.2{12} sute cit tvāpsu madāmo andhasā śrīṇanto gobhiruttaram
analyzed: sute cit tvā apsu madāmaḥ andhasā śrīṇantaḥ gobhiḥ uttaram

original: RV_09.107.03.1{12} pari suvānaścakṣase devamādanaḥ kraturindurvicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: pari suvānaḥ cakṣase deva mādanaḥ kratuḥ induḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_09.107.04.1{12} punānaḥ soma dhārayāpo vasāno arṣasi
analyzed: punānaḥ soma dhārayā apaḥ vasānaḥ arṣasi

original: RV_09.107.04.2{12} ā ratnadhā yonimṛtasya sīdasyutso deva hiraṇyayaḥ
analyzed: ā ratna dhāḥ yoni mṛtasya sīdasi utsaḥ deva hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_09.107.05.1{12} duhāna ūdhardivyaṃ madhu priyaṃ pratnaṃ sadhasthamāsadat
analyzed: duhānaḥ ūdhar divyam madhu priyam pratnam sadhastham āsadat

original: RV_09.107.05.2{12} āpṛchyaṃ dharuṇaṃ vājyarṣati nṛbhirdhūto vicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: āpṛchyam dharuṇam vājī arṣati nṛbhiḥ dhūtaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_09.107.06.1{13} punānaḥ soma jāgṛviravyo vāre pari priyaḥ
analyzed: punānaḥ soma jāgṛviḥ avyaḥ vāre pari priyaḥ

original: RV_09.107.06.2{13} tvaṃ viproabhavo 'ṅgirastamo madhvā yajñaṃ mimikṣa naḥ
analyzed: tvam vipraḥ abhavaḥ ṅgirastamaḥ madhvā yajñam mimikṣa naḥ

original: RV_09.107.07.1{13} somo mīḍhvān pavate gātuvittama ṛṣirvipro vicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: somaḥ mīḍhvān pavate gātu vittamaḥ ṛṣiḥ vipraḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_09.107.07.2{13} tvaṃ kavirabhavo devavītama ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi
analyzed: tvam kaviḥ abhavaḥ deva vītamaḥ ā sūryam rohayaḥ divi

original: RV_09.107.08.1{13} soma u ṣuvāṇaḥ sotṛbhiradhi ṣṇubhiravīnām
analyzed: somaḥ u suvānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ adhi snubhiḥ avīnām

original: RV_09.107.08.2{13} aśvayevaharita yāti dhārayā mandrayā yāti dhārayā
analyzed: yāti dhārayā mandrayā yāti dhārayā

original: RV_09.107.09.1{13} anūpe gomān gobhirakṣāḥ somo dugdhābhirakṣāḥ
analyzed: anūpe gomān gobhirakṣāḥ somaḥ dugdha abhirakṣāḥ

original: RV_09.107.09.2{13} samudraṃ na saṃvaraṇānyagman mandī madāya tośate
analyzed: samudram na saṃvaraṇāni agman mandī madāya tośate

original: RV_09.107.10.1{13} ā soma suvāno adribhistiro vārāṇyavyayā
analyzed: ā soma suvānaḥ adribhiḥ tiras vārāṇi avyayā

original: RV_09.107.10.2{13} jano na puri camvorviśad dhariḥ sado vaneṣu dadhiṣe
analyzed: janaḥ na puri camvoḥ viśat hariḥ sadaḥ vaneṣu dadhiṣe

original: RV_09.107.11.1{14} sa māmṛje tiro aṇvāni meṣyo mīḷhe saptirna vajayuḥ
analyzed: sa māmṛje tiras aṇvāni meṣyaḥ mīḍhe saptiḥ na vajayuḥ

original: RV_09.107.11.2{14} anumādyaḥ pavamāno manīṣibhiḥ somo viprebhir{ṛ}kvabhiḥ
analyzed: anumādyaḥ pavamānaḥ manīṣibhiḥ somaḥ viprebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ

original: RV_09.107.12.1{14} pra soma devavītaye sindhurna pipye arṇasā aṃśoḥ payasāmadiro na jāgṛvirachā kośaṃ madhuścutam
analyzed: pra soma deva vītaye sindhuḥ na pipye arṇasā aṃśoḥ payasā madiraḥ na jāgṛviḥ acha kośam madhuścutam

original: RV_09.107.13.1{14} ā haryato arjune atke avyata priyaḥ sūnurna marjyaḥ
analyzed: ā haryataḥ arjune atke avyata priyaḥ sūnuḥ na marjyaḥ

original: RV_09.107.13.2{14} tamīṃ hinvantyapaso yathā rathaṃ nadīṣvā gabhastyoḥ
analyzed: tamīm hinvanti apasaḥ yathā ratham nadīṣva ā gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_09.107.14.1{14} abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyaṃ madam
analyzed: abhi somāsaḥ āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam

original: RV_09.107.14.2{14} samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi manīṣiṇo matsarāsaḥ svarvidaḥ
analyzed: samudrasya adhi viṣṭapi manīṣiṇaḥ matsarāsaḥ svar vidaḥ

original: RV_09.107.15.1{14} tarat samudraṃ pavamāna ūrmiṇā rājā deva ṛtaṃ bṛhat
analyzed: tarat samudram pavamānaḥ ūrmiṇā rājā devaḥ ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_09.107.15.2{14} arṣan mitrasya varuṇasya dharmaṇā pra hinvāna ṛtaṃ bṛhat
analyzed: arṣat mitrasya varuṇasya dharmaṇā pra hinvānaḥ ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_09.107.16.1{15} nṛbhiryemāno haryato vicakṣaṇo rājā devaḥ samudriyaḥ
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ haryataḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ rājā devaḥ samudriyaḥ

original: RV_09.107.17.1{15} indrāya pavate madaḥ somo marutvate sutaḥ
analyzed: indrāya pavate madaḥ somaḥ marutvate sutaḥ

original: RV_09.107.17.2{15} sahasradhāro atyavyamarṣati tamīṃ mṛjantyāyavaḥ
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ tamīm mṛjanti āyavaḥ

original: RV_09.107.18.1{15} punānaścamū janayan matiṃ kaviḥ somo deveṣu raṇyati
analyzed: punānaḥ camū janayan matim kaviḥ somaḥ deveṣu raṇyati

original: RV_09.107.18.2{15} apo vasānaḥ pari gobhiruttaraḥ sīdan vaneṣvavyata
analyzed: apaḥ vasānaḥ pari gobhiḥ uttaraḥ sīdan vaneṣu avyata

original: RV_09.107.19.1{15} tavāhaṃ soma rāraṇa sakhya indo dive-dive
analyzed: tava aham soma rāraṇa sakhye indo dive dive

original: RV_09.107.19.2{15} purūṇi babhro ni caranti māmava paridhīnrati tānihi
analyzed: purūṇi babhro ni caranti mām ava paridhīn rati tānihi

original: RV_09.107.20.1{15} utāhaṃ naktamuta soma te divā sakhyāya babhra ūdhani
analyzed: uta aham naktam uta soma te divā sakhyāya babhro ūdhani

original: RV_09.107.20.2{15} ghṛṇā tapantamati sūryaṃ paraḥ śakunā iva paptima
analyzed: ghṛṇā tapantam ati sūryam paras śakunāḥ iva paptima

original: RV_09.107.21.1{16} mṛjyamānaḥ suhastya samudre vācaminvasi
analyzed: mṛjyamānaḥ su hastya samudre vācam invasi

original: RV_09.107.21.2{16} rayiṃ piśangaṃ bahulaṃ puruspṛhaṃ pavamānābhyarṣasi
analyzed: rayim piśangam bahulam puruspṛham pavamāna abhyarṣasi

original: RV_09.107.22.1{16} mṛjāno vāre pavamano avyaye vṛṣāva cakrado vane
analyzed: mṛjānaḥ vāre pavamanaḥ avyaye vṛṣā ava cakradaḥ vane

original: RV_09.107.22.2{16} devānāṃ soma pavamāna niṣkṛtaṃ gobhirañjāno arṣasi
analyzed: devānām soma pavamāna niṣkṛtam gobhiḥ añjānaḥ arṣasi

original: RV_09.107.23.1{16} pavasva vājasātaye 'bhi viśvāni kāvyā
analyzed: pavasva vājasātaye bhi viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_09.107.23.2{16} tvaṃ samudraṃ prathamo vi dhārayo devebhyaḥ soma matsaraḥ
analyzed: tvam samudram prathamaḥ vi dhārayaḥ devebhyaḥ soma matsaraḥ

original: RV_09.107.24.1{16} sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ rajo divyā ca soma dharmabhiḥ
analyzed: sa tu pavasva pari pārthivam rajaḥ divyā ca soma dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_09.107.24.2{16} tvāṃ viprāso matibhirvicakṣaṇa śubhraṃ hinvanti dhītibhiḥ
analyzed: tvām viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ vicakṣaṇa śubhram hinvanti dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_09.107.25.1{16} pavamānā asṛkṣata pavitramati dhārayā
analyzed: pavamānāḥ asṛkṣata pavitramati dhārayā

original: RV_09.107.25.2{16} marutvanto matsarā indriyā hayā medhāmabhi prayāṃsi ca
analyzed: marutvantaḥ matsarāḥ indriyāḥ hayāḥ medhām abhi prayāṃsi ca

original: RV_09.107.26.1{16} apo vasānaḥ pari kośamarṣatindurhiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ
analyzed: apaḥ vasānaḥ pari kośa marṣa tinduḥ hiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ

original: RV_09.107.26.2{16} janayañ jyotirmandanā avīvaśad gāḥ kṛṇvāno na nirṇijam
analyzed: janayam jyotiḥ mandanāḥ avīvaśat gāḥ kṛṇvānaḥ na nirṇijam

original: RV_09.108.01.1{17} pavasva madhumattama indrāya soma kratuvittamo madaḥ
analyzed: pavasva madhumattamaḥ indrāya soma kratu vittamaḥ madaḥ

original: RV_09.108.01.2{17} mahi dyukṣatamo madaḥ
analyzed: mahi dyukṣatamaḥ madaḥ

original: RV_09.108.02.1{17} yasya te pītvā vṛṣabho vṛṣāyate 'sya pītā svarvidaḥ
analyzed: yasya te pītvā vṛṣabhaḥ vṛṣāyate sya pītā svar vidaḥ

original: RV_09.108.02.2{17} sa supraketo abhyakramīdiśo 'chā vājaṃ naitaśaḥ
analyzed: sa su praketaḥ abhyakramīt iśaḥ chā vājam na etaśaḥ

original: RV_09.108.03.1{17} tvaṃ hyanga daivyā pavamāna janimāni dyumattamaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi anga daivyā pavamāna janimāni dyumattamaḥ

original: RV_09.108.03.2{17} amṛtatvāya ghoṣayaḥ
analyzed: amṛta tvāya ghoṣayaḥ

original: RV_09.108.04.1{17} yenā navagvo dadhyannaporṇute yena viprāsa āpire
analyzed: yena navagvaḥ dadhi an aporṇute yena viprāsaḥ āpire

original: RV_09.108.04.2{17} devānāṃ sumne amṛtasya cāruṇo yena śravāṃsyānaśuḥ
analyzed: devānām sumne amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ yena śravāṃsi ānaśuḥ

original: RV_09.108.05.1{17} eṣa sya dhārayā suto 'vyo vārebhiḥ pavate madintamaḥ
analyzed: eṣa sya dhārayā sutaḥ vyaḥ vārebhiḥ pavate madintamaḥ

original: RV_09.108.05.2{17} krīḷannūrmirapāmiva
analyzed: krīḍan ūrmiḥ apām iva

original: RV_09.108.06.1{18} ya usriyā apyā antaraśmano nirgā akṛntadojasā
analyzed: yaḥ usriyāḥ apyāḥ antar aśmanaḥ nirgāḥ akṛntat ojasā

original: RV_09.108.06.2{18} abhivrajaṃ tatniṣe gavyamaśvyaṃ varmīva dhṛṣṇavā ruja
analyzed: abhivrajam tatniṣe gavyam aśvyam varmī iva dhṛṣṇavā ruja

original: RV_09.108.07.1{18} ā sotā pari ṣiñcatāśvaṃ na stomamapturaṃ rajasturam
analyzed: ā sotā pari siñcata aśvam na stomam apturam rajasturam

original: RV_09.108.07.2{18} vanaṛkṣamudaprutam
analyzed: vana ṛkṣam uda prutam

original: RV_09.108.08.1{18} sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ payovṛdhaṃ priyaṃ devāya janmane
analyzed: sahasra dhāram vṛṣabham payaḥ vṛdham priyam devāya janmane

original: RV_09.108.08.2{18} ṛtena ya ṛtajāto vivāvṛdhe rājā deva ṛtaṃ bṛhat
analyzed: ṛtena yaḥ ṛta jātaḥ vivāvṛdhe rājā devaḥ ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_09.108.09.1{18} abhi dyumnaṃ bṛhad yaśa iṣas pate didīhi deva devayuḥ
analyzed: abhi dyumnam bṛhat yaśaḥ iṣaḥ pate didīhi deva devayuḥ

original: RV_09.108.09.2{18} vikośaṃ madhyamaṃ yuva
analyzed: vi kośam madhyamam yuva

original: RV_09.108.10.1{18} ā vacyasva sudakṣa camvoḥ suto viśāṃ vahnirna viśpatiḥ
analyzed: ā vacyasva su dakṣa camvoḥ sutaḥ viśām vahniḥ na viśpatiḥ

original: RV_09.108.10.2{18} vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pavasva rītimapāṃ jinvā gaviṣṭaye dhiyaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṭim divaḥ pavasva rītim apām jinva gaviṣṭaye dhiyaḥ

original: RV_09.108.11.1{19} etamu tyaṃ madacyutaṃ sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ divo duhuḥ
analyzed: etam u tyam mada cyutam sahasra dhāram vṛṣabham divaḥ duhuḥ

original: RV_09.108.11.2{19} viśvā vasūni bibhratam
analyzed: viśvā vasūni bibhratam

original: RV_09.108.12.1{19} vṛṣā vi jajñe janayannamartyaḥ pratapañ jyotiṣā tamaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā vi jajñe janayan amartyaḥ pratapam jyotiṣā tamaḥ

original: RV_09.108.12.2{19} sa suṣṭutaḥ kavibhirnirṇijaṃ dadhe tridhātvasya daṃsasā
analyzed: sa suṣṭutaḥ kavibhiḥ nirṇijam dadhe tri dhātvasya daṃsasā

original: RV_09.108.13.1{19} sa sunve yo vasūnāṃ yo rāyāmānetā ya iḷānām
analyzed: sa sunve yaḥ vasūnām yaḥ rāyām ānetā yaḥ iḷānām

original: RV_09.108.13.2{19} somoyaḥ sukṣitīnām
analyzed: somaḥ ūyaḥ su kṣitīnām

original: RV_09.108.14.1{19} yasya na indraḥ pibād yasya maruto yasya vāryamaṇā bhagaḥ
analyzed: yasya naḥ indraḥ pibāt yasya marutaḥ yasya vā aryamaṇā bhagaḥ

original: RV_09.108.14.2{19} ā yena mitrāvaruṇā karāmaha endramavase mahe
analyzed: ā yena mitrāvaruṇā karāmahe ā indram avase mahe

original: RV_09.108.15.1{19} indrāya soma pātave nṛbhiryataḥ svāyudho madintamaḥ
analyzed: indrāya soma pātave nṛbhiḥ yataḥ su āyudhaḥ madintamaḥ

original: RV_09.108.15.2{19} pavasva madhumattamaḥ
analyzed: pavasva madhumattamaḥ

original: RV_09.108.16.1{19} indrasya hārdi somadhānamā viśa samudramiva sindhavaḥ
analyzed: indrasya hārdi soma dhānam ā viśa samudram iva sindhavaḥ

original: RV_09.108.16.2{19} juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave divo viṣṭambha uttamaḥ
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave divaḥ viṣṭambhaḥ uttamaḥ

original: RV_09.109.01.1{20} pari pra dhanvendrāya soma svādur mitrāya pūṣṇe bhagāya
analyzed: pari pra dhanva indrāya soma svāduḥ mitrāya pūṣṇe bhagāya

original: RV_09.109.02.1{20} indras te soma sutasya peyāḥ kratve dakṣāya viśve ca devāḥ
analyzed: indraḥ te soma sutasya peyāḥ kratve dakṣāya viśve ca devāḥ

original: RV_09.109.03.1{20} evāmṛtāya mahe kṣayāya sa śukro arṣa divyaḥ pīyūṣaḥ
analyzed: eva amṛtāya mahe kṣayāya sa śukraḥ arṣa divyaḥ pīyūṣaḥ

original: RV_09.109.04.1{20} pavasva soma mahān samudraḥ pitā devānāṃ viśvābhi dhāma
analyzed: pavasva soma mahān samudraḥ pitā devānām viśvā abhi dhāma

original: RV_09.109.05.1{20} śukraḥ pavasva devebhyaḥ soma dive pṛthivyai śaṃ ca prajāyai
analyzed: śukraḥ pavasva devebhyaḥ soma dive pṛthivyai śam ca prajāyai

original: RV_09.109.06.1{20} divo dhartāsi śukraḥ pīyūṣaḥ satye vidharman vājī pavasva
analyzed: divaḥ dhartā asi śukraḥ pīyūṣaḥ satye vidharman vājī pavasva

original: RV_09.109.07.1{20} pavasva soma dyumnī sudhāro mahām avīnām anu pūrvyaḥ
analyzed: pavasva soma dyumnī su dhāraḥ mahām avīnām anu pūrvyaḥ

original: RV_09.109.08.1{20} nṛbhir yemāno jajñānaḥ pūtaḥ kṣarad viśvāni mandraḥ svarvit
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ jajñānaḥ pūtaḥ kṣarat viśvāni mandraḥ svar vid

original: RV_09.109.09.1{20} induḥ punānaḥ prajām urāṇaḥ karad viśvāni draviṇāni naḥ
analyzed: induḥ punānaḥ prajām urāṇaḥ karat viśvāni draviṇāni naḥ

original: RV_09.109.10.1{20} pavasva soma kratve dakṣāyāśvo na nikto vājī dhanāya
analyzed: pavasva soma kratve dakṣāya aśvaḥ na niktaḥ vājī dhanāya

original: RV_09.109.11.1{21} taṃ te sotāro rasam madāya punanti somam mahe dyumnāya
analyzed: tam te sotāraḥ rasam madāya punanti somam mahe dyumnāya

original: RV_09.109.12.1{21} śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ harim mṛjanti pavitre somaṃ devebhya indum
analyzed: śiśum jajñānam harim mṛjanti pavitre somam devebhyaḥ indum

original: RV_09.109.13.1{21} induḥ paviṣṭa cārur madāyāpām upasthe kavir bhagāya
analyzed: induḥ paviṣṭa cāruḥ madāya apām upasthe kaviḥ bhagāya

original: RV_09.109.14.1{21} bibharti cārv indrasya nāma yena viśvāni vṛtrā jaghāna
analyzed: bibharti cāru indrasya nāma yena viśvāni vṛtrā jaghāna

original: RV_09.109.15.1{21} pibanty asya viśve devāso gobhiḥ śrītasya nṛbhiḥ sutasya
analyzed: pibanti asya viśve devāsaḥ gobhiḥ śrītasya nṛbhiḥ sutasya

original: RV_09.109.16.1{21} pra suvāno akṣāḥ sahasradhāras tiraḥ pavitraṃ vi vāram avyam
analyzed: pra suvānaḥ akṣār sahasra dhāraḥ tiras pavitram vi vāram avyam

original: RV_09.109.17.1{21} sa vājy akṣāḥ sahasraretā adbhir mṛjāno gobhiḥ śrīṇānaḥ
analyzed: sa vājī akṣār sahasra retāḥ adbhiḥ mṛjānaḥ gobhiḥ śrīṇānaḥ

original: RV_09.109.18.1{21} pra soma yāhīndrasya kukṣā nṛbhir yemāno adribhiḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: pra soma yāhi indrasya kukṣā nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ adribhiḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_09.109.19.1{21} asarji vājī tiraḥ pavitram indrāya somaḥ sahasradhāraḥ
analyzed: asarji vājī tiras pavitram indrāya somaḥ sahasra dhāraḥ

original: RV_09.109.20.1{21} añjanty enam madhvo rasenendrāya vṛṣṇa indum madāya
analyzed: añjanti enam madhvaḥ rasena indrāya vṛṣṇe indum madāya

original: RV_09.109.21.1{21} devebhyas tvā vṛthā pājase 'po vasānaṃ harim mṛjanti
analyzed: devebhyaḥ tvā vṛthā pājase po vasānam harim mṛjanti

original: RV_09.109.22.1{21} indur indrāya tośate ni tośate śrīṇann ugro riṇann apaḥ
analyzed: induḥ indrāya tośate ni tośate śrīṇan ugraḥ riṇan apaḥ

original: RV_09.110.01.1{22} paryū ṣu pra dhanva vājasātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ
analyzed: pari u su pra dhanva vāja sātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_09.110.01.2{22} dviṣastaradhyā ṛṇayā na īyase
analyzed: dviṣaḥ taradhyai ṛṇayāḥ naḥ īyase

original: RV_09.110.02.1{22} anu hi tvā sutaṃ soma madāmasi mahe samaryarājye
analyzed: anu hi tvā sutam soma madāmasi mahe samarya rājye

original: RV_09.110.02.2{22} vājānabhi pavamāna pra gāhase
analyzed: vājān abhi pavamāna pra gāhase

original: RV_09.110.03.1{22} ajījano hi pavamāna sūryaṃ vidhāre śakmanā payaḥ
analyzed: ajījanaḥ hi pavamāna sūryam vidhāre śakmanā payaḥ

original: RV_09.110.03.2{22} gojīrayā raṃhamānaḥ purandhyā
analyzed: go jīrayā raṃhamānaḥ purandhyā

original: RV_09.110.04.1{22} ajījano amṛta martyeṣvā ṛtasya dharmannamṛtasya cāruṇaḥ
analyzed: ajījanaḥ amṛta martyeṣvā ṛtasya dharman amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ

original: RV_09.110.04.2{22} sadāsaro vājamachā saniṣyadat
analyzed: sadā saraḥ vājam achā saniṣyadat

original: RV_09.110.05.1{22} abhy-abhi hi śravasā tatardithotsaṃ na kaṃ cijjanapānamakṣitam
analyzed: abhi abhi hi śravasā tatarditha utsam na kam cit jana pānam akṣitam

original: RV_09.110.05.2{22} śaryābhirna bharamāṇo gabhastyoḥ
analyzed: śaryābhiḥ na bharamāṇaḥ gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_09.110.06.1{22} ādīṃ ke cit paśyamānāsa āpyaṃ vasuruco divyā abhyanūṣata
analyzed: ādīm ke cit paśyamānāsaḥ āpyam vasu rucaḥ divyāḥ abhyanūṣata

original: RV_09.110.06.2{22} vāraṃ na devaḥ savitā vyūrṇute
analyzed: vāram na devaḥ savitā vyūrṇute

original: RV_09.110.07.1{23} tve soma prathamā vṛktabarhiṣo mahe vājāya śravase dhiyandadhuḥ
analyzed: tve soma prathamāḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ mahe vājāya śravase dhiyan dadhuḥ

original: RV_09.110.07.2{23} sa tvaṃ no vīra vīryāya codaya
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ vīra vīryāya codaya

original: RV_09.110.08.1{23} divaḥ pīyūṣaṃ pūrvyaṃ yadukthyaṃ maho gāhād diva āniradhukṣata
analyzed: divaḥ pīyūṣam pūrvyam yat ukthyam mahaḥ gāhāt divaḥ āniradhukṣata

original: RV_09.110.08.2{23} indramabhi jāyamānaṃ samasvaran
analyzed: indram abhi jāyamānam samasvaran

original: RV_09.110.09.1{23} adha yadime pavamāna rodasī imā ca viśvā bhuvanābhi majmanā
analyzed: adha yat ime pavamāna rodasī imā ca viśvā bhuvanā abhi majmanā

original: RV_09.110.09.2{23} yūthe na niṣṭhā vṛṣabho vi tiṣṭhase
analyzed: yūthe na niṣṭhāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vi tiṣṭhase

original: RV_09.110.10.1{23} somaḥ punāno avyaye vāre śiśurna krīḷan pavamāno akṣāḥ
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ avyaye vāre śiśuḥ na krīḍan pavamānaḥ akṣār

original: RV_09.110.10.2{23} sahasradhāraḥ śatavāja induḥ
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ śata vājaḥ induḥ

original: RV_09.110.11.1{23} eṣa punāno madhumān ṛtāvendrāyenduḥ pavate svādurūrmiḥ
analyzed: eṣa punānaḥ madhumān ṛtāvā indrāya induḥ pavate svāduḥ ūrmiḥ

original: RV_09.110.11.2{23} vājasanirvarivovid vayodhāḥ
analyzed: vāja saniḥ varivaḥ vid vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_09.110.12.1{23} sa pavasva sahamānaḥ pṛtanyūn sedhan rakṣāṃsyapa durgahāṇi
analyzed: sa pavasva sahamānaḥ pṛtanyūn sedhan rakṣāṃsi apa durgahāṇi

original: RV_09.110.12.2{23} svāyudhaḥ sāsahvān soma śatrūn
analyzed: su āyudhaḥ sāsahvān soma śatrūn

original: RV_09.111.01.1{24} ayā rucā hariṇyā punāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi tarati svayugvabhiḥ sūro na svayugvabhiḥ dhārā sutasya rocate punāno aruṣo hariḥ
analyzed: ayā rucā hariṇyā punānaḥ viśvā dveṣāṃsi tarati svayugvabhiḥ sūraḥ na svayugvabhiḥ dhārā sutasya rocate punānaḥ aruṣaḥ hariḥ

original: RV_09.111.01.2{24} viśvā yad rūpā pariyāty ṛkvabhiḥ saptāsyebhir{ṛ}kvabhiḥ
analyzed: viśvā yat rūpā pariyāti ṛkvabhiḥ sapta āsyebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ

original: RV_09.111.02.1{24} tvaṃ tyat paṇīnāṃ vido vasu saṃ mātṛbhirmarjayasi sva ā dama ṛtasya dhītibhirdame parāvato na sāma tad yatrāraṇanti dhītayaḥ
analyzed: tvam tyad paṇīnām vidaḥ vasu sam mātṛbhiḥ marjayasi sve ā dame ṛtasya dhītibhiḥ dame parāvataḥ na sāma tat yatra araṇanti dhītayaḥ

original: RV_09.111.02.2{24} tridhātubhiraruṣībhirvayo dadhe rocamāno vayo dadhe
analyzed: tri dhātubhiḥ aruṣībhiḥ vayaḥ dadhe rocamānaḥ vayaḥ dadhe

original: RV_09.111.03.1{24} pūrvāmanu pradiśaṃ yāti cekitat saṃ raśmibhiryatate darśato ratho daivyo darśato rathaḥ agmannukthāni pauṃsyendraṃ jaitrāya
analyzed: pūrvām anu pradiśam yāti cekitat sam raśmibhiḥ yatate darśataḥ rathaḥ daivyaḥ darśataḥ rathaḥ agman ukthāni pauṃsyā indram jaitrāya

original: RV_09.111.03.2{24} vajraśca yad bhavatho anapacyutāsamatsvanapacyutā
analyzed: vajraḥ ca yat bhavathaḥ an apacyutā a samatsu an apacyutā

original: RV_09.112.01.1{25} nānānaṃ vā u no dhiyo vi vratāni janānām
analyzed: nānānam vai u naḥ dhiyaḥ vi vratāni janānām

original: RV_09.112.01.2{25} takṣā riṣṭaṃ rutaṃ bhiṣag brahmā sunvantamichatīndrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: takṣā riṣṭam rutam bhiṣaj brahmā sunvantam ichati indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.112.02.1{25} jaratībhiroṣadhībhiḥ parṇebhiḥ śakunānām
analyzed: jaratībhiḥ oṣadhībhiḥ parṇebhiḥ śakunānām

original: RV_09.112.02.2{25} kārmāro aśmabhirdyubhirhiraṇyavantamichatīndrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: kārmāraḥ aśmabhiḥ dyubhiḥ hiraṇyavantam icchati indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.112.03.1{25} kārurahaṃ tato bhiṣagupalaprakṣiṇī nanā
analyzed: kāruḥ aham tatas bhiṣaj upala prakṣiṇī nanā

original: RV_09.112.03.2{25} nānādhiyovasūyavo 'nu gā iva tasthimendrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: nānā dhiyaḥ vasūyavaḥ nu gāḥ iva tasthima indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.112.04.1{25} aśvo voḷhā sukhaṃ rathaṃ hasanāmupamantriṇaḥ
analyzed: aśvaḥ voḍhā sukham ratham hasanām upamantriṇaḥ

original: RV_09.112.04.2{25} śepo romaṇvantau bhedau vārin maṇḍūka ichatīndrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: śepaḥ romaṇvantau bhedau vārin maṇḍūkaḥ ichati indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.113.01.1{26} śaryaṇāvati somamindraḥ pibatu vṛtrahā
analyzed: śaryaṇāvati somam indraḥ pibatu vṛtrahā

original: RV_09.113.01.2{26} balaṃ dadhāna ātmani kariṣyan vīryaṃ mahadindrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: balam dadhānaḥ ātmani kariṣyan vīryam mahat indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.113.02.1{26} ā pavasva diśāṃ pata ārjīkāt soma mīḍhvaḥ
analyzed: ā pavasva diśām pate ārjīkāt soma mīḍhvaḥ

original: RV_09.113.02.2{26} ṛtavākena satyena śraddhayā tapasā suta indrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: ṛtavākena satyena śraddhayā tapasā sutaḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.113.03.1{26} parjanyavṛddhaṃ mahiṣaṃ taṃ sūryasya duhitābharat
analyzed: parjanya vṛddham mahiṣam tam sūryasya duhitā abharat

original: RV_09.113.03.2{26} taṃ gandharvāḥ pratyagṛbhṇan taṃ some rasamādadhurindrāyendopari srava
analyzed: tam gandharvāḥ pratyagṛbhṇan tam some rasam ādadhuḥ indrāya indo upari srava

original: RV_09.113.04.1{26} ṛtaṃ vadannṛtadyumna satyaṃ vadan satyakarman
analyzed: ṛtam vadan ṛtadyumna satyam vadan satya karman

original: RV_09.113.04.2{26} śraddhāṃ vadan soma rājan dhātrā soma pariṣkṛta indrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: śraddhām vadan soma rājan dhātrā soma pariṣkṛtaḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.113.05.1{26} satyamugrasya bṛhataḥ saṃ sravanti saṃsravāḥ
analyzed: satyam ugrasya bṛhataḥ sam sravanti saṃsravāḥ

original: RV_09.113.05.2{26} saṃ yanti rasino rasāḥ punāno brahmaṇā hara indrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: sam yanti rasinaḥ rasāḥ punānaḥ brahmaṇā haraḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.113.06.1{27} yatra brahmā pavamāna chandasyāṃ vācaṃ vadan
analyzed: yatra brahmā pavamāna chandasyām vācam vadan

original: RV_09.113.06.2{27} grāvṇā some mahīyate somenānandaṃ janayannindrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: grāvṇā some mahīyate somena ānandam janayan indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.113.07.1{27} yatra jyotirajasraṃ yasmin loke svarhitam
analyzed: yatra jyotiḥ ajasram yasmin loke svarhitam

original: RV_09.113.07.2{27} tasmin māṃ dhehi pavamānāmṛte loke akṣita indrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: tasmin mām dhehi pavamāna amṛte loke akṣite indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.113.08.1{27} yatra rājā vaivasvato yatrāvarodhanaṃ divaḥ
analyzed: yatra rājā vaivasvataḥ yatra avarodhanam divaḥ

original: RV_09.113.08.2{27} yatrāmūryahvatīrāpastatra māmamṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: yatra amūḥ yahvatīḥ āpaḥ tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.113.09.1{27} yatrānukāmaṃ caraṇaṃ trināke tridive divaḥ
analyzed: yatra anukāmam caraṇam trināke tridive divaḥ

original: RV_09.113.09.2{27} lokā yatra jyotiṣmantastatra māmamṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: lokāḥ yatra jyotiṣmantaḥ tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.113.10.1{27} yatra kāmā nikāmāśca yatra bradhnasya viṣṭapam
analyzed: yatra kāmāḥ nikāmāḥ ca yatra bradhnasya viṣṭapam

original: RV_09.113.10.2{27} svadhā ca yatra tṛptiśca tatra māmamṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo parisrava
analyzed: svadhā ca yatra tṛptiḥ ca tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi indrāya indo parisrava

original: RV_09.113.11.1{27} yatrānandāśca modāśca mudaḥ pramuda āsate
analyzed: yatra ānandāḥ ca modāḥ ca mudaḥ pramudaḥ āsate

original: RV_09.113.11.2{27} kāmasya yatrāptāḥ kāmāstatra māmamṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: kāmasya yatra āptāḥ kāmāḥ tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.114.01.1{28} ya indoḥ pavamānasyānu dhāmānyakramīt
analyzed: yaḥ indoḥ pavamānasya anu dhāmāni akramīt

original: RV_09.114.01.2{28} tamāhuḥ suprajā iti yaste somāvidhan mana indrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: tam āhuḥ suprajāḥ iti yaḥ te soma avidhat manaḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_09.114.02.1{28} ṛṣe mantrakṛtāṃ stomaiḥ kaśyapodvardhayan giraḥ
analyzed: ṛṣe mantra kṛtām stomaiḥ kaśyapa udvardhayan giraḥ

original: RV_09.114.02.2{28} somaṃnamasya rājānaṃ yo jajñe vīrudhāṃ patirindrāyendo parisrava
analyzed: somaṃnamasya rājānam yaḥ jajñe vīrudhām patiḥ indrāya indo parisrava

original: RV_09.114.03.1{28} sapta diśo nānāsūryāḥ sapta hotāra ṛtvijaḥ
analyzed: sapta diśaḥ nānā sūryāḥ sapta hotāraḥ ṛtvijaḥ

original: RV_09.114.03.2{28} devā ādityā ye sapta tebhiḥ somābhi rakṣa na indrayendo pari srava
analyzed: devāḥ ādityāḥ ye sapta tebhiḥ soma abhi rakṣa naḥ indrayā indo pari srava

original: RV_09.114.04.1{28} yat te rājañchṛtaṃ havistena somābhi rakṣa naḥ
analyzed: yat te rājan śṛtam haviḥ tena soma abhi rakṣa naḥ

original: RV_09.114.04.2{28} arātīvā mā nastārīn mo ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamadindrāyendo parisrava
analyzed: arātīvā mā naḥ tārīt mā u ca naḥ kim cana amamat indrāya indo parisrava
